voice_actor_name: Kobayashi, Yuusuke, Van Santfoort, Maxime, Leonardo, José, Hörmann, Arne

name: Hofen, Jodok
name_kanji: ヨドーク・ホーフェン
about: He is the commander of 213th/49th(movie) Mage Battalion, belonging to 3rd Division of Eastern Army Group. His mage unit along with 3rd and 32nd Divisions were surrounded in Tiegenhoff during the Russy Invasion of the Empire.
voice_actor_name: Terasoma, Masaki, Mullenaerts, Bruno, Fernández, Dafnis, Jilka, Gerhard

name: Momonga
about:
Ainz Ooal Gown (アインズ・ウール・ゴウン), formerly known as Momonga (モモンガ), is the main protagonist of the Overlord series. He is the guild master of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.

A cautious and stingy person, Momonga always tries to plan and control details, avoiding any haphazard actions. Because he doesn't underestimate his opponents, he will usually overkill them. Since being transferred to a new world and becoming an actual Undead being, Momonga could feel himself becoming very cold and calculating, his emotions repressed.

Loyal to his friends and creations, since becoming Lord Ruler of Nazarick in the new world he acts with a certain degree of nobility for his devoted followers. Momonga only does things that will benefit Nazarick or himself, whether it's information or prestige. Although he does have a sense of justice and doesn't hate humans as much as his followers, he holds no attachment to them, and he feels nothing toward their deaths.


(Source: Overlord Wikia)

name: Aicler, Eclair Acleir
name_kanji: エクレア・エクレール・エイクレアー
about:
An assistant butler in the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

Eclair has an appearance of a rockhopper penguin. He moves in shuffling steps, so he is always carried by another servant when he wants to get around. He was created by Ankoro Mocchi Mochi. His personality settings were set to have the desire to conquer Nazarick as a joke.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Albedo
about:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Floor Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervises the activities of the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above all the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the sister of Nigredo and Spinel. She was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist is a pair of black angel wings.

Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands, and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest. In combat, she wears an impressive black full plate armor with a unique helm and carries a battle-axe with her.

Like Shalltear, Albedo has a true form as a heteromorphic race NPC. Shalltear called her a "big mouthed gorilla" when they quarreled, so her true form may be quite large in size.

Extremely loyal and extremely in love, Albedo is completely infatuated with Momonga, often showing obsessive tendencies when it comes to his affairs. She is always vying for Momonga's affection, showcasing outbursts of jealousy whenever anyone else appears to be getting close to him. This is because the last thing Momonga did in Yggdrasil was to use his administrative privileges to edit her character history, adding the she is "madly in love" with him.

Among all the Guardians, Albedo is the most vocal when it comes to expressing opinions. She will openly denounce any statement or action deemed inappropriate, reaching the point where Momonga sometimes considers it an annoyance.

As the Overseer of the Floor Guardians, she is very levelheaded. Albedo can make calm and collected judgments that Ainz, sometimes, doesn't think of. She takes Ainz's orders as top priority and absolute, punishing anyone, even a Floor Guardian, who'd dare belittle his orders. Like many others in Nazarick, she absolutely loathes humans and views them as an inferior species.

In the web novel version, Albedo does not exist.


(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Alpha, Yuri
name_kanji: ユリ・アルファ / yuri・α
about:
Yuri is the vice-captain of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a beauty with an intelligent look, wearing glasses and a choker. She wears her hair tied into a low-cropped bun at the back of her head. Lacking a metal plate in front of her skirt, her dress emphasizes mobility rather than defense. She is equipped with spiked gauntlets.

As shown in her karma value, Yuri is good-hearted and one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Thus, she felt relief when Ainz said not to kill humans without proper reason. When given permission to do as she pleases, she chooses to help people in destitution. She uses "boku" as a first-person pronoun when speaking in private, revealing a somewhat childish nature.

Her behavior is strict like a teacher's. Due to her personality, she often works as a chairperson.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Beta, Lupusregina
name_kanji: ルプスレギナ・ベータ
about:
Lupusreginais a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a brown-skinned beauty with a sporty look and red hair tied in two long braids. Lupusregina wears a maid uniform with short sleeves and long black gloves, with a skirt that has a long slit on it's left side, revealing thigh high white stockings. She is equipped with an imposing black and silver scepter slung across her back.

Lupusregina has a very bright and outgoing personality but is also able to conduct herself like a perfect lady. She is sociable and friendly toward humans, though it is only a mask to conceal her brutal and cunning personality. She also likes to make lewd jokes.

She had a tendency to suddenly appear behind people and disappear without notice.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Bloodfallen, Shalltear
name_kanji: シャルティア・ブラッドフォールン
about:
Height: 140cm (4'7")
Race: Heteromorphic Race, Undead, True Vampire
Occupation: 1st~3rd Floor Guardian
Karma: Negative 450 (Very~Extremely Evil)
Creator: Peroroncino

Shalltear is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino.

Shalltear has a very flirtatious personality and is very open with her sexual preferences, often to other characters' discomfort. Despite her apparent shamelessness, she can be quite innocent about certain things. She has a complex about her small figure, which she attempts to cover up by using breast pads.

As a true vampire, Shalltear is extremely proud and takes her position as a Floor Guardian very seriously. She has no patience for failure and will often burst into fits of rage at signs of an unfavorable situation. She will not hesitate to kill any servant who disappoints her; however, she will not punish others for failing in tasks that are impossible to begin with.

Shalltear is completely loyal to Momonga and is also a love rival to Albedo for his affections. She takes great joy in being able to prove her worth and fantasizes about the praise she expects to receive. When a situation doesn't go in her favor, she panics about the scolding she believes that she will get.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Cocytus
about:
Cocytus is the floor guardian of the fifth floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He is a hybrid between a mantis and an ant. He was created by Takemikazuchi.

Having an enormous body size of 2.5m, Cocytus has the appearance of an insect walking on two feet—a fusion between a mantis and an ant.

With a tail twice as long as his height, Cocytus is covered with sharp spikes like icicles and has a strong jaw that can easily snap people's hands. Two of his hands hold a silver halberd, while the remaining two hands hold a mace emitting black light and a crooked shape sheath which seems to be for a broadsword. With a breathtaking cold air, the pale blue, hardened bone armor oozes out diamond dust like bright light. His shoulders and back look like an uplifted iceberg.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: CZ2128 Delta
name_kanji: シーゼットニイチニハチ・デルタ/CZ2128・Δ
about:
CZ2128 is a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a short girl with red-gold straight long hair. She wears an eyepatch over her left eye, while her right eye has an emerald color and target-mark on the pupil. She wears accessories with military camouflage patterns. While her face is beautiful, she does not show her emotions and talks in a flat tone.

CZ2128 appears emotionless and has a silent nature. Her Karma is relatively high, which makes her, along with Yuri Alpha, one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Though she usually ignores conversations from humans, sometimes there is a possibility to communicate with her. She hates cannibalism and likes cute things, such as Eclair.

CZ2128's creator was one of the Supreme Beings, other than Tabula Smaragdina, responsible for the design of Treasury security systems. Thus her character settings are set to be familiar with Nazarick's mechanism unlocking methods.

In the web novel version, she was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Demiurge
about:
Dressed as gentleman, Demiurge is a floor guardian on the seventh floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick and the Commander of the NPC Defenses. He was created by Ulbert Alain Odle.

As a member of the Demon race, Demiurge is one of the cruelest members in Nazarick, taking great joy in the suffering of other races. He enthusiastically performs magic experiments on the prisoners sent to him, viewing them as nothing but toys, and enjoys inciting hateful feelings and treacherous thoughts among them.

Demiurge works closely with the other servants of Nazarick and is loyal to the creators, thinking of them as important companions. However, due to their conflicting personalities, he and Sebas Tian do not appear to get along well.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Epsilon, Solution
name_kanji: ソリュシャン・イプシロン
about:
Solution is a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a blonde beauty with spiral curls and clothing that emphasizes sex appeal. She is said to rival the most beautiful woman in Re-Estize Kingdom, the Golden Princess. As her race is slime, she can change her appearance as she wishes.

Solution thinks of humans as food and toys. She loves to swallow humans alive and enjoys the suffering and struggling of her victims. She does not like the screams of humans so she shuts her victims' throat with her body. She is, with Narberal Gamma, one of the two "extremely dangerous" Pleiades.

She is also good at disguising her nature, acting like a childish and rude lady when she was out to get information with Sebas Tian. It seems that her true nature is quite logical, suggested by her complaint about inefficient behaviors of Sebas or Entoma.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Diablo
name_kanji: ディアブロ / 坂本 拓真
about: Originally a shut-in gamer who went by the name "Diablo" in the MMO "Cross Reverie." Having spent hours playing, he could defeat any player using his superior equipment and overwhelming skill. After being summoned one day to another world where he had the body of his in-game character, he finds himself the owner of two girls, a Pantherian and an elf, due to their invocation magic reflecting back at them due to an item of his.
voice_actor_name: Mizunaka, Masaaki, Vale, Eric, Uchimura, Fumiko, Derksen, Simon

name: Galleu, Rem
about: She is a Pantherian who became an invoker and had no choice but to become an adventurer and continue to demonstrate its strength, saying to aim to exterminate the Demon King Krebskrem.

name: L. Greenwood, Shera
name_kanji: シェラ・L・グリーンウッド
about: She is an Elf who is one of the two Summoners who summoned Diablo. The reason she summoned him was to have the strength to live free.
voice_actor_name: Serizawa, Yuu, Wiedenheft, Sarah, May, Moira

name: Baudelaire, Celestine
name_kanji: セレスティーヌ・ボードレール

name: Bichelberger, Emile
name_kanji: エミール・ビュシェルベルジェール
about: A human who is known as the strongest in the Adventurer's Guild.

name: Cristela, Alicia
name_kanji: アリシア・クリステラ
about: She is an Imperial Knight. She was born as a daughter of a duke house.
voice_actor_name: Hara, Yumi, Ragsdale, Sara, Oeffinger, Marieke

name: Pauline
about:
A 14-year-old mage specializing in healing and water magic, she is the daughter of a merchant and the resident bookkeeper of the Crimson Vow. Despite her miserly manner, she typically has a gentle appearance and demeanor but is known to show fits of ruthlessness when called for. Her family's company is called the Beckett Company, although whether Pauline's surname is the same has not been confirmed.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Reina
about:
Also known as Crimson Reina, she is a mage specializing in fire magic. She was born to a travelling merchant, and became a hunter at an early age, giving her the most practical knowledge and experience amongst the Crimson Vow party members. She has a signature fire spell called Crimson Hellfire. Despite being fifteen years old at the start of the series, she is assumed to be a similar age to Mile, the youngest member of their group, due to her height and appearance which is a source of anger for her.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: von Ascham, Adele
name_kanji: アデル・フォン・アスチャム
about:
Adele von Ascham is the protagonist of the series. Before dying, she was a Japanese girl named Misato Kurihara. Though she had forgotten about her previous life for the first few years since her birth, one day when she was ten, she remembered everything with a strong headache. She is told about Nanomachines by The Creator, and realizes that she can talk with them.

At that time, Adele's thought wave output is about half of the elder dragon species (about 6800 times as strong as the usual human), and the authority level to use Nanomachines is 5 (normal creatures are basically level 1).

She entered Eckland Academy under the guise of living as an ordinary girl, but she failed to hide her ability. Due to this, Adele deserted Eckland Academy and left her home country. Signing up to be a Hunter, she gave herself the alias of Mile and proceeded to attend the Hunters' Prep School on the recommendations of Hunter staff where she met members of her party, The Crimson Vow.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: von Austien, Mavis
name_kanji: メーヴィス・フォン・オースティン
about:
The official leader of the Crimson Vow (although it is always Reina that does the actual "leading"), a swordswoman of noble birth. After running away from home in the hopes of becoming a knight, she met the other members of the Crimson Vow at the Hunters' Prep School and helped to form the party. She is tall and has an androgynous appearance, making her popular with other girls.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Arledy
about:
Arledy is the boss of the kidnappers group. She's a corrupt noble who uses her power to kidnap little children to create a harem group to serve her.

She is said to be an A-rank hunter in the past.

(Source: Anime)

name: Kurihara, Keiko
about:
Keiko Kurihara is the younger sister of Kurihara Misato during Adele's previous life in Japan.

Keiko Kurihara loves her sister Misato, though she dislikes how her family is a bunch of Otakus.

Keiko Kurihara has brown hair in a bob cut and navy blue eyes. She dressed in a typical schoolgirl uniform.

(Source: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average Wiki)

name: Marcela
about:
The third daughter of a baron and a friend of Adele's.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Monica
about:
The daughter of a merchant and a friend of Adele's.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Nano
about:
A mysterious creature that only communicates with Adele. It watches over the nanomachines that make up people's magic in the other world. In the manga, it appears as a tiny, sphere-bodied robot, while in the anime it looks like a young cat. Nano's character is a personification of the nanomachines featured in the novel series, where their manifestations are far more impersonal.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Tempest, Rimuru
about:
Race: Human (past life) → Slime → Demon Slime 
Age: 37 (past life) → 2 (anime/manga), 3 (light novel)
Sex: male (past life) → Sexless
Title: Ruler of Monsters, Jura-Tempest Federation Chancellor, 
Divine protection: Storm Crest
Magic: Element Magic archive, Spirit Magic archive, Greater Spirit summoning, Greater Demon summoning, 
Ability:
Species Skill - Universal Sense, Universal Thread, Universal Shapeshift, Infinite Regeneration, Demon Lord Haki, Enhanced Replication
Ultimate Skill - Wisdom King Raphael, King of Gluttony Beelzebuth, Covenant King Uriel, Storm King Veldora, 
Resistance: Physical Attack Nullification, Natural Effects Nullification, Abnormal Condition Nullification, Spiritual/Mental Attack Resistance, Holy-Demonic Attack Resistance

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)
voice_actor_name: Okasaki, Miho, Karbowski, Brittney, Nogueira, Bruna, Seyad, Shérine, Mendoza, Monserrat, Pollow, Peggy, Giorgio, Elisa
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), French, Spanish, German, Italian

name: Abil
about:
Relatives:
Gabil (Son)
Souka (Daughter)
Occupations: Lizardmen Chief

He has a bold personality, but with enough humility.
He is a serious person, but he also has many good qualities about him and is a good leader.
voice_actor_name: Lognay, Pierre, Guedes, Jonathan, Sabat, Christopher, Shimura, Tomoyuki, del Roble, Daniel, Sesana, Paolo
voice_actor_lang: French, Portuguese (BR), English, Japanese, Spanish, Italian

name: Aubert, Chloe
about:
Chloe is an introverted girl, who likes to pass her time reading picture books or manga. While she appears rather cold and stoic most of the time, appearing brutal and merciless even, she can also be very emotional at times.

(Source: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Tadokoro, Azusa, Tavares, Amanda, Neves, Emily, May, Moira, Carrillo, Regina, Haugness, Pauline, Bonanomi, Giada
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), English, German, Spanish, French, Italian

name: Benimaru
about:
Race: Fair Oni [EP: 213.000]
Divine protection: Tempest (Protection of the Storm)
Title: Oni King
Height: 180 cm
Ability:
Resistance: Physical Damage Nullification, Pain Nullification, Status Change Nullification, Spirit Attack Resistance, Nature Effects Resistance

Benimaru is a majin in the service of Rimuru Tempest. He is the Minister of Defense for the Jura-Tempest Federation, acting as the Commander-in-Chief for its military during wartime. He holds a place in the Twelve Guardian Lords, as well as the Big Four, being its leader and being counted as one of Rimuru's Top Three strongest subordinates, alongside Diablo and Zegion.
voice_actor_name: Furukawa, Makoto, Fajardo, Ricco, Van Santfoort, Maxime, Rossatto, Raphael, Cataño, Arturo, Vivolo, Ezio, Wolko, Roman
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, French, Portuguese (BR), Spanish, Italian, German

name: Carrion
about:
The King of Beast Kingdom Eurazania and former Demon Lord of the Ten Great Demon Lords, now serving as Milim Nava's aide alongside Frey.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Takumi, Yasuaki, Marques, Guilherme, Grünspan, Erwin, Stimac, Marcus D., Orozco, Alejandro, Baldoin, Diego
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), French, English, Spanish, Italian

name: Charys
about:
Charys, formerly known as Ifrit, is a greater spirit; the ruler of flames which was sealed within Shizue Izawa by Demon Lord Leon Cromwell.

He used to live in Dwelling of the Spirit before he was stolen by the "Platinum Devil" Leon Cromwell. After that, he was sealed within Shizue Izawa. As a result of this, it gave Shizue an extended lifespan.



Abilities:
Charys as Ifrit was a greater spirit with a rank that of Special A.

A maelstrom of flames surrounds the Flame Giant, protecting it at all times. The heat of these flames are so intense that an attack like Rimuru's water blade evaporates before it even makes contact.

After being named and evolved, his magicules exploded and is said to be greater than unawakened demon lords such as Frey or Carrion.

Skills:
Fire Manipulation
Combustion
Ranged Barrier
Body Double
Flare Circle

Trivia
The name "Ifrit" comes from the supernatural creature of the same name in Middle Eastern stories and commonly associated with fire.

(Source: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Azevedo, Bruno, Guerrero, Chris, Yashiro, Taku

name: Clayman
about:
A former member of the Ten Great Demon Lords group and a self-proclaimed Demon Lord. Also known as the Marionette Master and with more than 500 years lived, he's a man that likes to manipulate his subordinates to make them do as he pleases.

(Source: Tensura Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Koyasu, Takehito, Bittencourt, Pierre, Burgmeier, John, Leguizamo, Elliot, Andreozzi, Ruggero

name: Cougar
about: Adventurer and old friend of Shizue.
voice_actor_name: Daunt, Ricardo, Bosch, Johnny Yong, Murata, Taishi, Vitelli, Omar

name: Cromwell, Leon
name_kanji: レオン・クロムウェル
about: One of the 8 Star Demon Lords. A cold and laid-back individual, he states that he didn't really care in regards to who being a demon lord or whatever.
voice_actor_name: Fukuyama, Jun, Augustus, Demétrios, Wehkamp, Christopher, Olguín, Javier, Egger, Bernd-Siegfried, Prata, Patrizio
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), English, Spanish, German, Italian

name: Daikenja
about:
Name: Great Sage (Daikenja)


Entity Type: Unique Skill

Appearance:
Great Sage does not possess a physical form. It exists as an inner voice or consciousness within the wielder, providing unparalleled guidance and analytical abilities.

Background:
Great Sage is a highly sophisticated and unique skill acquired by Rimuru Tempest upon his reincarnation into the Jura Forest as a slime. This skill manifested as an advanced, sentient form of intelligence, designed to aid and guide Rimuru through his journey in this fantastical world.

Role and Contributions:

Advisor and Strategist:
Great Sage serves as the primary advisor to Rimuru, offering insights and strategies to navigate complex situations. Its analytical prowess allows for informed decision-making, ensuring Rimuru can effectively manage both peaceful and combative scenarios.

Skill Enhancement and Evolution:
Great Sage plays a crucial role in enhancing Rimuru's abilities. Over time, it evolves into the Ultimate Skill Raphael, significantly amplifying its capabilities and support functions.

Combat and Defense:
In combat, Great Sage is indispensable. It devises tactics, analyzes opponents' weaknesses, and suggests optimal strategies. This ensures that Rimuru can utilize his vast array of skills and powers to their fullest potential.

Knowledge and Information Processing:
Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.



Significance:
Great Sage is the cornerstone of Rimuru Tempest's success and growth. Its guidance and support are instrumental in Rimuru's rise from a simple slime to a powerful leader and protector. Great Sage embodies the blend of intellect, strategy, and emotional support, making it an indispensable part of Rimuru's journey and the thriving nation he builds.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Toyoguchi, Megumi, Rodak, Mallorie, Vechin, Gisele, Luna, Circe, Loriaux, Fabienne, Franzoso, Giulia
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), Spanish, French, Italian

name: Felicia
about:
Felicia is a well-endowed woman with amazing beauty. She wears clothing appropriate to Yggdrasil. Felicia has long blonde hair with light blue eyes. 

She also securely harbors a crush on Yuuto, taking every opportunity to seduce him with her beauty. 
She is one of the Wolf Clan's Einherjars and Yuuto's sworn younger sister.

name: Siegrune
nicknames: Rune, Mánagarmr the Strongest Silver Wolf
about:
Siegrune, or more commonly referred to as Rune, is a strong willed warrior of the Wolf Clan, thus giving her some personality traits that come off as somewhat stubborn in some situations, but she is also extremely loyal and protective of those she cares about. 

She has silver hair and red eyes, and a slender but toned physique which is the result of her many hours of hard work training her body for battle She often carries around her weapon and wears clothes which are fitting of the people in Yggdrasil. 

She is especially protective of her sworn father Yuuto Suou. She did not approve of him at first due to him being physically weaker than most wolf clan warriors, but as time goes on and she sees his battle prowess along side his kind well mannered way of living, she begins to develop feelings for him. 

She is also one of the Einherjars, which is a group of magic wielding warriors. They posses runes which give them certain superhuman abilities varying from enhanced physical strength to actual magic. She fights with a katana which was a gift from Yuuto.  

(Source: Hyakuren no Haou to Seiyaku no Valkyria Wiki)

name: Albertina
about:
One of the princesses of the Claw Clan and the older twin sister of Christina. In contrast to her sister, she is innocent and slow-minded.

She is an Einherjar who's rune allows her to move at superhuman speeds and conceal her presence a little, making her an excellent assassin. She became Yuuto sworn daughter merely because her sister did so as well.

(Source: The Master of Ragnarok & Blesser of Einherjar Wiki)

name: Christina
about:
One of the princesses of the Claw Clan and the younger twin sister of Albertina. In contrast to her sister, she is mischievous and intelligent.

She is an Eingerjar who's rune allows her to conceal her presence and increase her speed a little, which, along with her information gathering skills, makes her an excellent spy. She became Yuuto's sworn daughter due to her respecting his leadership skills.

(Source: The Master of Ragnarok & Blesser of Einherjar Wiki)

name: Loptr
about: Brother to Felicia, and would be patriarch  of the wolf clan, feeling betrayed by Yuuto Suoh, he has pledge his life to by all means necessary to kill Uuuto and reclaim the nation that he feels is rightfully his.

name: Momonga
about:
Ainz Ooal Gown (アインズ・ウール・ゴウン), formerly known as Momonga (モモンガ), is the main protagonist of the Overlord series. He is the guild master of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.

A cautious and stingy person, Momonga always tries to plan and control details, avoiding any haphazard actions. Because he doesn't underestimate his opponents, he will usually overkill them. Since being transferred to a new world and becoming an actual Undead being, Momonga could feel himself becoming very cold and calculating, his emotions repressed.

Loyal to his friends and creations, since becoming Lord Ruler of Nazarick in the new world he acts with a certain degree of nobility for his devoted followers. Momonga only does things that will benefit Nazarick or himself, whether it's information or prestige. Although he does have a sense of justice and doesn't hate humans as much as his followers, he holds no attachment to them, and he feels nothing toward their deaths.


(Source: Overlord Wikia)
voice_actor_name: Hino, Satoshi, Guerrero, Chris, Silva, Dláigelles, Mendiant, Charles, Mena, Héctor, Aguilar, Víctor Hugo, Merluzzo, Maurizio
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), French, Spanish, Spanish, Italian

name: Agu
about: Agu is a hobgoblin and also a member of the Gigu Tribe that originated from the Great Forest of Tob.
voice_actor_name: Kowaka, Wakana, Sutton, Kristin, Niverd, Victor, Keller, Patrick, Scianca, Patrizia, Lua, Bianca

name: Aicler, Eclair Acleir
name_kanji: エクレア・エクレール・エイクレアー
about:
An assistant butler in the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

Eclair has an appearance of a rockhopper penguin. He moves in shuffling steps, so he is always carried by another servant when he wants to get around. He was created by Ankoro Mocchi Mochi. His personality settings were set to have the desire to conquer Nazarick as a joke.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Hiyama, Nobuyuki, Rinaldi, André, Fort-Junca, Benoît, Phillips, Kyle, De Santis, Paolo, Flores, Luba, Breuer, Pascal
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), French, English, Italian, Spanish, German

name: Aindra, Lakyus Alvein Dale
name_kanji: ラキュース・アルベイン・デイル・アインドラ
about:
Lakyus is an adamantite ranked adventurer and the leader of Blue Rose. She is part of the nobility, friend of the Re-Estize Royal Family, and loyal to the people of Re-Estize Kingdom. She acts as a faith based magic caster and warrior priestess of her adventurer group.

She is described as a young woman that has long blonde hair with green eyes and pink lips that showed a healthy gleam. Her beauty falls short of Renner but overflows with a different charm.

Lakyus is a very bright person who enjoys adventuring with her friends. She sometimes acts weird like wearing apparently meaningless rings or fighting against her dark personality, making her other team members worry about her actually becoming evil. When Lakyus was a young girl, she decided to become an adventurer after hearing the adventure stories about Red Drop. She ran away from home to have an adventure, while she was still inexperienced, she was saved by Gagaran and the two became partners.

Lakyus becomes one of the strongest adventurers of the kingdom at the age of 19 for her near Heroic-level abilities. She is also one of the few users of revival magic.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Koshimizu, Ami, Saxton, Jad, Victória, Cláudia, Jaurez, Mireya, Pacotto, Emanuela

name: Albedo
about:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Floor Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervises the activities of the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above all the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the sister of Nigredo and Spinel. She was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist is a pair of black angel wings.

Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands, and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest. In combat, she wears an impressive black full plate armor with a unique helm and carries a battle-axe with her.

Like Shalltear, Albedo has a true form as a heteromorphic race NPC. Shalltear called her a "big mouthed gorilla" when they quarreled, so her true form may be quite large in size.

Extremely loyal and extremely in love, Albedo is completely infatuated with Momonga, often showing obsessive tendencies when it comes to his affairs. She is always vying for Momonga's affection, showcasing outbursts of jealousy whenever anyone else appears to be getting close to him. This is because the last thing Momonga did in Yggdrasil was to use his administrative privileges to edit her character history, adding the she is "madly in love" with him.

Among all the Guardians, Albedo is the most vocal when it comes to expressing opinions. She will openly denounce any statement or action deemed inappropriate, reaching the point where Momonga sometimes considers it an annoyance.

As the Overseer of the Floor Guardians, she is very levelheaded. Albedo can make calm and collected judgments that Ainz, sometimes, doesn't think of. She takes Ainz's orders as top priority and absolute, punishing anyone, even a Floor Guardian, who'd dare belittle his orders. Like many others in Nazarick, she absolutely loathes humans and views them as an inferior species.

In the web novel version, Albedo does not exist.


(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Hara, Yumi, Maxwell, Elizabeth, Bachère, Valérie, Marciano, Thayná, Hugo, Uschi, Macedo López, Guadalupe, Magnaghi, Debora
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, French, Portuguese (BR), German, Spanish, Italian

name: Alpha, Yuri
name_kanji: ユリ・アルファ / yuri・α
about:
Yuri is the vice-captain of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a beauty with an intelligent look, wearing glasses and a choker. She wears her hair tied into a low-cropped bun at the back of her head. Lacking a metal plate in front of her skirt, her dress emphasizes mobility rather than defense. She is equipped with spiked gauntlets.

As shown in her karma value, Yuri is good-hearted and one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Thus, she felt relief when Ainz said not to kill humans without proper reason. When given permission to do as she pleases, she chooses to help people in destitution. She uses "boku" as a first-person pronoun when speaking in private, revealing a somewhat childish nature.

Her behavior is strict like a teacher's. Due to her personality, she often works as a chairperson.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Igarashi, Hiromi, Rochet, Bérangère, Maciel, Silvia, Jaurez, Mireya, Rodgers, Whitney, Caggiula, Beatrice
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, French, Portuguese (BR), Spanish, English, Italian

name: Arche Eeb Rile Furt
name_kanji: アルシェ・イーブ・リリッツ・フルト
about: Arche Eeb Rile Furt is a worker and magic caster of Foresight who volunteered to explore and investigate the mysterious large tomb. She was a former noble and student of the Imperial Magic Academy.
voice_actor_name: Shindou, Kei, Tavares, Amanda, Combes, Caroline, Mendoza, Rose, Sudberg, Corinne, Morese, Deborah
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), French, Spanish, English, Italian

name: Bareare, Nfirea
name_kanji: ンフィーレア・バレアレ
about:
Nfirea is a famous pharmacist in E-Rantel. He is the grandson of Lizzie and the childhood friend of Enri Emmot whom he holds romantic feelings towards.

He is a young boy with short blonde hair that half-covered of his face like a bowl cut. He is dressed in ragged work clothes from the potion making workshop. Nfirea is described as a nice, calm and timid person. He also works hard at making potions with his grandmother every day.

Nfirea was originally a girl named Fay in the web novel, but his gender and name changed when the series was published into a light novel.

(Source: Overlord Wikia)
voice_actor_name: Murase, Ayumu, Berry, Morgan, Laisné, Grégory, Tamburrini, Sebastiano, Galvão, Felipe

name: Beta, Lupusregina
name_kanji: ルプスレギナ・ベータ
about:
Lupusreginais a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a brown-skinned beauty with a sporty look and red hair tied in two long braids. Lupusregina wears a maid uniform with short sleeves and long black gloves, with a skirt that has a long slit on it's left side, revealing thigh high white stockings. She is equipped with an imposing black and silver scepter slung across her back.

Lupusregina has a very bright and outgoing personality but is also able to conduct herself like a perfect lady. She is sociable and friendly toward humans, though it is only a mask to conceal her brutal and cunning personality. She also likes to make lewd jokes.

She had a tendency to suddenly appear behind people and disappear without notice.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Komatsu, Mikako, Tipton, Alexis, Maia, Melissa, Anne Paillié, Mélanie, Pérez, Monserrat, Bersani, Giulia
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), French, Spanish, Italian

name: Bloodfallen, Shalltear
name_kanji: シャルティア・ブラッドフォールン
about:
Height: 140cm (4'7")
Race: Heteromorphic Race, Undead, True Vampire
Occupation: 1st~3rd Floor Guardian
Karma: Negative 450 (Very~Extremely Evil)
Creator: Peroroncino

Shalltear is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino.

Shalltear has a very flirtatious personality and is very open with her sexual preferences, often to other characters' discomfort. Despite her apparent shamelessness, she can be quite innocent about certain things. She has a complex about her small figure, which she attempts to cover up by using breast pads.

As a true vampire, Shalltear is extremely proud and takes her position as a Floor Guardian very seriously. She has no patience for failure and will often burst into fits of rage at signs of an unfavorable situation. She will not hesitate to kill any servant who disappoints her; however, she will not punish others for failing in tasks that are impossible to begin with.

Shalltear is completely loyal to Momonga and is also a love rival to Albedo for his affections. She takes great joy in being able to prove her worth and fantasizes about the praise she expects to receive. When a situation doesn't go in her favor, she panics about the scolding she believes that she will get.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Uesaka, Sumire, Angelle, Felecia, Ruis, Carolina, Soares, Clara, Martínez, Azucena, Cherubelli, Laura
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), French, Spanish, Italian

name: Aerial
about:
The Queen of Wind spirits who becomes bonded to Taichi. Originally she introduces herself as a simple Wind spirit named Aerial, but as Taichi's power rises, she finally evolves into her true identity.

(Source: Isekai Chiito Majutsushi Wiki)

name: Almeda
about: Almeda is the innkeeper's young daughter of the "Mythril Inn" of Azpire. She befriends Taichi and Rin when they lodge into her parent's inn after becoming official adventurers.

name: Anastasia
about:
She has greenish-yellow hair with clear blue eyes. She is introduced in a black cloak with a hood, but once she was captured and later released she wore a revealing green dress with blue earrings and cloth "arm covers?"

(Source: Isekai Cheat Magician Wiki)

name: Cassim
about: Cassim is one of the antagonists in the Isekai Cheat Magician series. An evil magician and servant to Lodra.

name: Gerard
about:
The dwarf guild master of the Azpire Adventurer Guild.

(Source: Isekai Chiito Majutsushi Wiki)

Lupusreginais a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a brown-skinned beauty with a sporty look and red hair tied in two long braids. Lupusregina wears a maid uniform with short sleeves and long black gloves, with a skirt that has a long slit on it's left side, revealing thigh high white stockings. She is equipped with an imposing black and silver scepter slung across her back.

Lupusregina has a very bright and outgoing personality but is also able to conduct herself like a perfect lady. She is sociable and friendly toward humans, though it is only a mask to conceal her brutal and cunning personality. She also likes to make lewd jokes.

She had a tendency to suddenly appear behind people and disappear without notice.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Bloodfallen, Shalltear
name_kanji: シャルティア・ブラッドフォールン
about:
Height: 140cm (4'7")
Race: Heteromorphic Race, Undead, True Vampire
Occupation: 1st~3rd Floor Guardian
Karma: Negative 450 (Very~Extremely Evil)
Creator: Peroroncino

Shalltear is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino.

Shalltear has a very flirtatious personality and is very open with her sexual preferences, often to other characters' discomfort. Despite her apparent shamelessness, she can be quite innocent about certain things. She has a complex about her small figure, which she attempts to cover up by using breast pads.

As a true vampire, Shalltear is extremely proud and takes her position as a Floor Guardian very seriously. She has no patience for failure and will often burst into fits of rage at signs of an unfavorable situation. She will not hesitate to kill any servant who disappoints her; however, she will not punish others for failing in tasks that are impossible to begin with.

Shalltear is completely loyal to Momonga and is also a love rival to Albedo for his affections. She takes great joy in being able to prove her worth and fantasizes about the praise she expects to receive. When a situation doesn't go in her favor, she panics about the scolding she believes that she will get.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Cocytus
about:
Cocytus is the floor guardian of the fifth floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He is a hybrid between a mantis and an ant. He was created by Takemikazuchi.

Having an enormous body size of 2.5m, Cocytus has the appearance of an insect walking on two feet—a fusion between a mantis and an ant.

With a tail twice as long as his height, Cocytus is covered with sharp spikes like icicles and has a strong jaw that can easily snap people's hands. Two of his hands hold a silver halberd, while the remaining two hands hold a mace emitting black light and a crooked shape sheath which seems to be for a broadsword. With a breathtaking cold air, the pale blue, hardened bone armor oozes out diamond dust like bright light. His shoulders and back look like an uplifted iceberg.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: CZ2128 Delta
name_kanji: シーゼットニイチニハチ・デルタ/CZ2128・Δ
about:
CZ2128 is a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a short girl with red-gold straight long hair. She wears an eyepatch over her left eye, while her right eye has an emerald color and target-mark on the pupil. She wears accessories with military camouflage patterns. While her face is beautiful, she does not show her emotions and talks in a flat tone.

CZ2128 appears emotionless and has a silent nature. Her Karma is relatively high, which makes her, along with Yuri Alpha, one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Though she usually ignores conversations from humans, sometimes there is a possibility to communicate with her. She hates cannibalism and likes cute things, such as Eclair.

CZ2128's creator was one of the Supreme Beings, other than Tabula Smaragdina, responsible for the design of Treasury security systems. Thus her character settings are set to be familiar with Nazarick's mechanism unlocking methods.

In the web novel version, she was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Demiurge
about:
Dressed as gentleman, Demiurge is a floor guardian on the seventh floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick and the Commander of the NPC Defenses. He was created by Ulbert Alain Odle.

As a member of the Demon race, Demiurge is one of the cruelest members in Nazarick, taking great joy in the suffering of other races. He enthusiastically performs magic experiments on the prisoners sent to him, viewing them as nothing but toys, and enjoys inciting hateful feelings and treacherous thoughts among them.

Demiurge works closely with the other servants of Nazarick and is loyal to the creators, thinking of them as important companions. However, due to their conflicting personalities, he and Sebas Tian do not appear to get along well.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Epsilon, Solution
name_kanji: ソリュシャン・イプシロン
about:
Solution is a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a blonde beauty with spiral curls and clothing that emphasizes sex appeal. She is said to rival the most beautiful woman in Re-Estize Kingdom, the Golden Princess. As her race is slime, she can change her appearance as she wishes.

Solution thinks of humans as food and toys. She loves to swallow humans alive and enjoys the suffering and struggling of her victims. She does not like the screams of humans so she shuts her victims' throat with her body. She is, with Narberal Gamma, one of the two "extremely dangerous" Pleiades.

She is also good at disguising her nature, acting like a childish and rude lady when she was out to get information with Sebas Tian. It seems that her true nature is quite logical, suggested by her complaint about inefficient behaviors of Sebas or Entoma.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Yuge, Itsuki
about:
Race: Human
Age: Unknown
Gender: Male
Hair: Black
Eye: pink

Itsuki is an unmotivated high school student and for that reason, he's prone to making cold statements. Despite his attitude, he has a strong sense of justice and has taken the duty to raising star children and to develop bonds with the star maidens.

name: Kumoko
about:
Kumoko was formerly a female high school student in modern day Japan. She died and reincarnated into the form of a spider. 

In her former life, she lived as a shut-in and immersed herself in video games, but now she uses her remarkable mental strength to fight for survival. She uses battle tactics that make up for her low stats with her mastery of agility, spider thread, and poison fangs.

(Source: Official Site)


Light novel spoiler:
voice_actor_name: Yuuki, Aoi, Knickerbocker, Brianna, Marroquín Payró, Romina, Rodrigues, Pamella, Hervieux, Charlotte, Bäcker, Manuela
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Spanish, Portuguese (BR), French, German

name: Anabald, Karnatia Seri
name_kanji: カルナータ・アナバルト
about:
Karnatia Seri Anabald is one of the students that reincarnated. Born a boy name Kanata Ooshima (大島 叶多) in her previous life, now she has reincarnated as a beautiful girl and the daughter of the Duke of Anabald.

She's a prodigy on a par with Shun, and has been his best friend since their former life. Her speech is normally elegant and refined, but when talking with others who have reincarnated, she talks like a boy.

(Source: Kumo desu ga, Nani ka? Wiki, Official Site)

name: Analeit, Leston
name_kanji: レストン・アナレイト
about: The third prince of Analeit, born to a different concubine than Julius and Shun.
voice_actor_name: Toki, Shunichi, Machado, Yago, Tindle, Austin

name: Ariel
about: Ariel is the current king of the demons. She is usually lenient and carefree, shoving her work onto her secretary, Balto. According to Balto, she is the strongest being in the world, excluding the gods.
voice_actor_name: Uesaka, Sumire, Darazi, Estelle, Saddy, Flávia, Malvárez, Wendy, Taylor, Veronica

name: Basgath
about:
Basgath is a renowned former guide of the Great Elroe Labyrinth's Upper Stratum, and is now retired. He is the father of Goyef, who is also a knowledgeable guide.

(Source: So I'm a Spider, So What? Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Souterelle, Frédéric, Ono, Atsushi, Fonseca, Eduardo

name: Buirimus
about:
Buirimus is a summoner and part a scouting unit from the Renxandt Imperial Army. Not only does he have great ability as a summoner, he is a skilled leader and a first-class warrior.

(Source: So I'm a Spider, So What? Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Azevedo, Pedro, Hirakawa, Daisuke, Minthe, Jonas

name: Cylis
about: Shun's responsible older brother, the first prince of Analeit, the eldest son of the queen and thus first in line to the throne. His father, Meiges, thought that Analeit would be in good hands were Cylis to become king. Shun is unnerved by his seriousness.
voice_actor_name: Kondo, Takashi, Bougleux, Erick, Velázquez, Alan Fernando, Baulain, Sébastien, Grimm, Jesse

name: D
about: She is a self proclaimed evil god.
voice_actor_name: Hayami, Saori, Medeiros, Gabriela, Mendoza, Monserrat, Kartner, Virginie, Draeger, Kerstin, Sands, Tara
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), Spanish, French, German, English

name: Feirune
about:
Fei is Shun's pet Earth Wyrm.

In her previous life, she was a girl named Mirei Shinohara (漆原 美麗), but she reincarnated as a monster instead of a human.

As a monster, her stats grow at a very fast rate, and she has excellent situational judgment. She has a cheerful, open personality, but she was a bully in her former life, and this shows in her behavior.

(Source: Official Site)
voice_actor_name: Kitamura, Eri, Southerland, Stephanie, Eikermann, Elise, Bescht, Valérie, Carvalho, Thati

name: Harrifenas, Filimøs
name_kanji: フィリメス・ハァイフェナス
about:
In her previous life, she was Kanami Okazaki (岡崎 香奈美), the homeroom teacher to the kids who were reincarnated, and they affectionately called her "Oka-chan." 

After reincarnating, she began attending school with Shun and the others as their classmate. Since she reincarnated as an elf, she looks younger than she actually is. 

She's a caring teacher who continues to follow her students after their reincarnation, but she has many secrets.

(Source: Official Site)
voice_actor_name: Okuno, Kaya, Leigh, Cherami, Papineschi, Alexia, Moreno, Susana, Palomanes, Helena

name: Aqua
about:
Birthday: August 1
Height: 158 cm
Weight: 49 kg
Three sizes: B83-W56-H83

The goddess of water who judged humans to send to the RPG world, up until Kazuma dragged her along with him. She is an energetic and simpleminded girl who likes to receive reverence for her status and gets upset easily. As an Archpriest and a goddess, she is powerful against demons and the undead, and is able to resurrect recently deceased people as well as purify water supplies. Rather than learning skills which would benefit her party, she spends most of her skill points learning Party Tricks.

(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Amamiya, Sora, Mata, Faye, Molina, Daniela, González, Nycolle, Caruso, Lisa, Pazete, Natali
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, German, Spanish, French, Portuguese (BR)

name: Dustiness, Lalatina Ford
name_kanji: ダスティネス・フォード・ララティーナ / ダクネス
about:
Age: 18
Birthday: April 6

A crusader who possesses powerful offense and defense, but lacks the accuracy to deliver her attacks. She is a masochist who dreams of being ravaged by monsters or married to an abusive husband; regardless, she is serious with issues involving her friends.


(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Kayano, Ai, Alves, Natália, Valenzuela, Cristina, Mendoza, Mireya, Lacombe, Lila, Oeffinger, Marieke
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), English, Spanish, French, German

name: Megumin
about:
Age: 13–14
Birthday: December 4

An arch wizard who is descended from crimson demons; powerful humanoids who possess black hair and red eyes, and sport chuunibyou characteristics. Megumin only knows a single skill, the incredibly powerful explosion magic that immediately incapacitates her for the rest of the day when cast, and refuses to learn any other skills.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)
voice_actor_name: Takahashi, Rie, Mendez, Erica, Kalbhenn, Lea, Malvárez, Wendy, Quilichini, Clara, Simi, Isabella
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, German, Spanish, French, Portuguese (BR)

name: Satou, Kazuma
about:
Age: 17 Height: 165 cm

The main protagonist of KonoSuba. A sixteen-year-old Japanese teenager who became a game-obsessed shut-in after having his heart broken over his childhood friend during middle school. He is sent to the parallel reality after dying from acute stress reaction, forcing Aqua to come with him after she irritates him with her attitude. Kazuma is classed as an Adventurer which, despite being the lowest ranked class, allows him to learn various skills from other classes, albeit at an increased cost. With his ability, Kazuma learns basic skills such as stealing, archery, monster detection, and basic magic.

(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Fukushima, Jun, Bougleux, Erick, Pantoja, Arnie, Turba, David, Olguín, Javier, Bourlé, Bastien
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), English, German, Spanish, French

name: Arakuremono
about:
An anime-exclusive character. The first person Kazuma speaks with in Axel's guildhall.

(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Inada, Tetsu, Williams, Imari, Parisi, Milton

name: Arue
about: Arue is one of Megumin's old classmates, and third highest scoring student in her class, only trailing behind Megumin and Yunyun, respectively. She is also an aspiring author and, according to herself, the most voluptuous among the Crimson Demons.
voice_actor_name: Nazuka, Kaori, Lenti, Marissa, Figueroa, Samanta, Mouchel, Julie, Beatriz, Celina

name: Beldia
about:
A dullahan and one of the Devil King's generals. He becomes hostile towards Kazuma's party after Megumin keeps using his castle for explosion practice.


(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Yasumoto, Hiroki, Júnior, Francisco, Seitz, Patrick, Herlin, Simon, Reyes, Salvador

name: Bukkororii
about: Town house shoes store, son
voice_actor_name: Nakajima, Yoshiki, Orozco, Alejandro, Hervé, Glen, Machline, Daniel, Chiplock, Sean, Kluckert, Sebastian
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Spanish, French, Portuguese (BR), English, German

name: Chomusuke
about: Chomusuke is Megumin's familiar.
voice_actor_name: Nabatame, Hitomi, Verry, Clotilde, Bartley, Ryan, Portella, Tabata

name: Dodonko
about: Dodonko is a member of the Crimson Demon Clan. She is also one of Megumin's former classmates and is often seen next to Funifura. In school, she and Funifura would manipulate Yunyun into giving them lunch by saying "we're friends, right?"
voice_actor_name: Suzushiro, Sayumi, Bartley, Ryan, Trunte, Franziska, Robles, Jocelyn, Nunes, Karen, Berard, Mélissa
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, German, Spanish, Portuguese (BR), French

name: Ana
about:
A "Rogue Servant" with no Master who has been brought to Uruk by the Holy Grail. Her class is Lancer. She acts in tandem with Merlin to fulfill her own mysterious objectives. A girl who is calm, and avoids any interaction with other people. She harbors a special hatred for Merlin.

(Source: anime.fate-go.us)

name: Fujimaru, Ritsuka
about:
Ritsuka was a candidate for Master at the Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity, Chaldea. As one of the low-level novices, he was summoned to Chaldea simply to fill their quota for potential Masters. However, the tragic explosion that devastated Chaldea left him as mankind's sole surviving Master and since then, as he was the only one left capable of Rayshifting, he has taken up the mission to eliminate the Singularities and save humanity's future.

(Source: anime.fate-go.us)

name: Gilgamesh
name_kanji: ギルガメッシュ / アーチャー
nicknames: Archer, King of Heroes, King of Kings, Golden King, King of Babylon, Oldest King, AUO
about:
Height: 182 cm (6'0")
Weight: 68 kg
Armament: armor
Likes: himself, power
Dislikes: snakes
Famous quote: "'All the evils in the world'? Bring thrice as much if you want to stain me!"

An arrogant, selfish, and enigmatic Archer-class Servant. He appears familiar with Fuyuki City and claims to have a past relationship with Saber. Typically clad in an ornate golden armor, he possesses an immense number of Noble Phantasms, though none are representative of his true identity.

Gilgamesh is the great half-god, half-human king born from the union between the King of Uruk, Lugalbanda, and goddess Rimat-Ninsun. He ruled the Sumerian city-state of Uruk, the capital city of ancient Mesopotamia in the B.C. era. He was an ultimate, transcendent being so divine as to be two thirds god and one third human, and no others in the world could match him. He was a despot possessing high divinity who believed he was invincible. He is not merely a legend, and is said to have actually existed and ruled during the Sumer Dynasty five thousand years ago. He was the King of Heroes who possessed all things in the world, whose tale is recorded in mankind's oldest epic poem, the Epic of Gilgamesh which portrays Gilgamesh as a hero, destined to be king and achieve great feats, who is driven to meet his destiny, facing challenges together with his best friend Enkidu.

His title, King of Heroes, is not meant to call him a king who is a hero, but instead implies that he is the king over all heroes. He is mankind's oldest hero, the origin of all myths and model on which heroes are based, so his story is copied within the mythologies of all the countries of the world. The heroes of various myths are derived from his legend, so his Gate of Babylon possesses all of their Noble Phantasms. Though there are several heroes holding the title of "King," the King of Knights and King of Conquerors, he is the only one in all of heaven and earth crowned with the title of "King of All Heroes."


In Fate/kaleid liner PRISMA☆ILLYA, he's the Heroic Spirit sealed into the eighth Class Card. He manifests as his younger self due to Illya separating him from his shadow form half-way through his incarnation. While initially an adversary, he quickly becomes an ally to fulfill his objectives. Gilgamesh in his child form has a more easygoing attitude compared to his adult self. He asks Illya to call him Gil-kun.
voice_actor_name: Seki, Tomokazu, Vincent, David, Dawn-Claude, René

name: Ishtar
nicknames: Archer, Inanna, Goddess of Venus, Mistress of Heaven
about:
A goddess of beauty, good harvests and war from Mesopotamian mythology. Said to be the most pampered, or rather, most beloved goddess by the other deities. This form is not that of the goddess Ishtar herself, but a pseudo-Servant condition in which a human that has a wavelength close to her own was made into a vessel. She says that her role is to watch over humans in a way appropriate for a goddess, but that means to watch over while snickering.

(Source: Type-Moon Wiki)

name: Kyrielight, Mash
name_kanji: マシュ・キリエライト
about:
Servant class: Shielder
Birthday: July 25, 2000
Height: 158 cm
Weight: 46 kg

Mash is a mysterious, kind-hearted girl. She refers to the Protagonist as her senior, however, behind that smile belies a deep sorrow and resolve that has accepted her fate as a person with a set life-span.


(Source: Type-Moon Wiki)

name: Merlin
nicknames: Magus of Flowers, The Grand Caster
about:
He was the son of the Queen of Wales and an incubus. He is an incubus hybrid who served King Uther Pendragon. Uther loved Igraine, the wife of Duke Cornwall, so he secured Merlin's assistance in winning her love at the price of leaving his child in Merlin's care. Merlin told Uther a prophecy about his child, who would become his appointed successor during their war-torn times.

(Source: Type-Moon Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Sakurai, Takahiro, Daymond, Robbie, Stollberg, Dirk

name: Archaman, Romani
about:
Romani used to be the Chief of Chaldea's medical team, but after the explosion accident, he has been acting director of the organization. Also known as "Dr. Roman."
While he is rather weak struck and bit wimpy, he’s a reliable person who doesn’t mind lavishing labor to make the best of each trip (ray-shift?) of Fujimaru and his team.
He is a fan of the virtual idol, "Magi☆Mari."

(Source: anime.fate-go.us)

name: Arsimilat Animusphere, Olga-Marie
name_kanji: オルガマリー・アースミレイト・アニムスフィア
about: Daughter of the Lord of Astromancy.

name: Avenger
about:
Avenger is the goddess of revenge, leader of the Demonic Beasts.

She is Leader of the Three Goddess Alliance, and a Servant who seeks the total eradication of humanity. Her class is Avenger. Avenger is a monstrous creature with hair composed of snakes and could be called the Queen of Demonic Beasts. She is based in the mountainous region north of Uruk.

(Source: anime.fate-go.us, edited)

name: da Vinci, Leonardo
name_kanji: レオナルド・ダ・ヴィンチ
about:
Da Vinci is the third Servant that was summoned to Chaldea successfully. She's a Special Honorary Advisor of Chaldea's Tech Division. Her class is Caster.
She was called “the universal genius” that left achievements in many fields in Europe. She loves her own masterpiece “Mona Lisa” so much that she imitates Mona Lisa’s appearance while existing in this world. During the ray-shift, da Vinci supports the team as (with?) technical backup.

(Source: anime.fate-go.us)
voice_actor_name: Sakamoto, Maaya, Harlacher, Erika, Oeffinger, Marieke

name: Aku
about: A girl from the village. Her parents died from an illness when she was young and she was about to be persecuted in the village when Maou-sama came in to save her. She pure-heartedly honors Maou like a father.
voice_actor_name: Takao, Kanon, Hoover, Natalie, König, Samina

name: Elegant, Luna
about: Luna Elegant is the youngest of the "Three Saints." She has magical talent that is rare even among the saints. Because of that rare talent she grew up as if she were a rose among weeds. She is extraordinarily selfish.

name: Kunai, Hakuto
about:
Akira Oono, a.k.a. Hakuto Kunai (九内 伯斗, Kunai Hakuto), is the male protagonist of the series Maou-sama, Retry!. He was the creator of the game Infinity Game after 15 years the game was waxed, but he was dragged into another world trapped in the body of the Last Boss Hakuto Kunai.

(Source: Demon Lord, Retry! Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Tsuda, Kenjirou, Grelle, Jessie James, Welbat, Daniel

name: Queen, Killer
about: Older sister of Luna Elegant.
voice_actor_name: Tomatsu, Haruka, Glass, Caitlin, Meyer, Jenny Maria

name: Kirino, Yuu
about:
Yu Kirino is the NPC created by Akira Oono (Kunai Hakuto) of the series Maou-sama, Retry!. A woman cold like ice, Yu is truly sadistic and cruel who seeks knowledge about the body by cutting and dissecting all that fall into her hands. She got popularity from a number of masochistic players in the game. Yu is a prodigy doctor and a scientist. She has a sadistic personality and the hobby of "clarifying the mysteries of the body", as well as spitting out philosophy, and repeatedly doing many human experiments. Yu surveyed humans scientifically, and all of her documents were meticulously detailed, logging any and all changes and reactions. On the other hand, Yu had no regard for the subtleties of humans nor their hearts, no consideration for the ideals of the privileged nor the mindsets of the meek, and no care for their places in life. She considered it a waste of brain matter to think of such things.

(Source: Maou-sama, Retry! Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Satou, Rina, Barr, Katelyn, Böttcher, Jennifer

name: Kyon
about: A bunny from Rabi Village.
voice_actor_name: Grace, Kimberly, Aranami, Kazusa, Fölster, Julia

name: Mink
about: Mink is very energetic and always ready to buy a fight. Mink had the illness called eighth-grade syndrome (Chuunibyou). Despite being a priest who uses the power of light to purify and heal, her spell chants have macabre phrases that are not expected of a priest. Mink is a world celebrity, a Star Player. There's adventurers who have been drawn in by her chants and poses, and have even begun to imitate her.

name: Momo
about: A bunny from Rabi Village.
voice_actor_name: Stewart, Kylie, Landa, Leonie, Kubo, Yurika

name: Africanus, Scipio
name_kanji: スキピオ・アフリカヌス
about: Hannibal's Roman adversary during the Second Punic War, who is believed to have died around 183 BC. As a Drifter, he is as old as Hannibal, who he is seen constantly arguing with, claiming that "a winner takes all" since he won at Zama. Nevertheless, Scipio respects Hannibal greatly, saying he is worth a million men, because though a million men would not budge Rome, Hannibal nearly tore it down.

name: Kanno, Naoshi
about: During a battle with the Black King, with the Drifters' side under attack by dragons, World War II fighter pilot Naoshi Kanno is transported into the world in his plane. He decides to attack the dragons when their attacks remind him of the US bombing of Tokyo.

name: Abe no, Haruakira
about: A young man who is one of the head of the Octobrist who has allied himself with the Drifters against the Black King.

name: Akechi, Mitsuhide
about: Former general under Oda Nobunaga, Mitsuhide is famous for his betrayal the former master which led to Nobunaga's perishment. Naturally the animosity between Mitsuhide and Nobunaga that started on Earth did continue in the next realm of existence they've found themselves fighting as a Drifter and (in Mitsuhide's case) an End under the Black King's command.

name: Cassidy, Butch
about: Robert LeRoy Parker, better known as Butch Cassidy, is a well known American Wild West outlaw specialized in train and bank robbery. A leader of the Wild Bunch Gang, Sundance Kid's partner and now a Drifter fighting against the Black King.

name: Count Saint-Germi
about: A homosexual nobleman who owns a quarter of the Empire and was Hitler's closest ally in its formation. It is said that the Empire could not have existed without his "betrayal," and as such he is free to live as he pleases without criticism from any of his peers. Despite this position however, he is not loyal to the Empire and knows that its demise is near; as such, he plans to reach out to the elves and the Drifters that accompany them. As a side note, in spite of the fact he is well over fifty years old, as the Orte Empire was formed fifty years before the current storyline, Saint-Germi appears as a youthful drag queen with an effeminate personality. Likely the Count of St. Germain as a Drifter or Offscouring.

name: d'Arc, Jeanne
about: The hero of the Hundred Years War between France and England. Joan, who was driven insane after being burned at the stake, now desires nothing more than to see the world burn. As an Offscouring—with her Christian crosses now upside down—she has manifested the ability to manipulate fire. Surprisingly, she seems to be self-conscious of her (lacking) femininity, though this could be another result of her insanity.

name: Hijikata, Toshizou
about:
The former vice-commander of the Shinsengumi who died fighting in the name of the Tokugawa Bakufu during the Boshin War. Hijikata has the ability to use smoke in order to manifest ghostly images of members of the Shinsengumi and uses them to cut apart his enemies.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kafeto
about: The grand-master's assistant.

name: Albedo
about:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Floor Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervises the activities of the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above all the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the sister of Nigredo and Spinel. She was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist is a pair of black angel wings.

Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands, and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest. In combat, she wears an impressive black full plate armor with a unique helm and carries a battle-axe with her.

Like Shalltear, Albedo has a true form as a heteromorphic race NPC. Shalltear called her a "big mouthed gorilla" when they quarreled, so her true form may be quite large in size.

Extremely loyal and extremely in love, Albedo is completely infatuated with Momonga, often showing obsessive tendencies when it comes to his affairs. She is always vying for Momonga's affection, showcasing outbursts of jealousy whenever anyone else appears to be getting close to him. This is because the last thing Momonga did in Yggdrasil was to use his administrative privileges to edit her character history, adding the she is "madly in love" with him.

Among all the Guardians, Albedo is the most vocal when it comes to expressing opinions. She will openly denounce any statement or action deemed inappropriate, reaching the point where Momonga sometimes considers it an annoyance.

As the Overseer of the Floor Guardians, she is very levelheaded. Albedo can make calm and collected judgments that Ainz, sometimes, doesn't think of. She takes Ainz's orders as top priority and absolute, punishing anyone, even a Floor Guardian, who'd dare belittle his orders. Like many others in Nazarick, she absolutely loathes humans and views them as an inferior species.

In the web novel version, Albedo does not exist.


(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Aqua
about:
Birthday: August 1
Height: 158 cm
Weight: 49 kg
Three sizes: B83-W56-H83

The goddess of water who judged humans to send to the RPG world, up until Kazuma dragged her along with him. She is an energetic and simpleminded girl who likes to receive reverence for her status and gets upset easily. As an Archpriest and a goddess, she is powerful against demons and the undead, and is able to resurrect recently deceased people as well as purify water supplies. Rather than learning skills which would benefit her party, she spends most of her skill points learning Party Tricks.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Degurechaff, Tanya
name_kanji: ターニャ・デグレチャフ
about: Tanya Degurechaff is a cute, adorable and pretty-good looking little girl. But deep inside, she is highly power-hungry, amoral, ruthless, sadistic and hot-tempered. Especially when she is in battle against her enemies, she shows utter ruthlessness and bloodlust just to accomplish her missions. Tanya also strongly disapproves of failure and disobedience from her subordinates. She is loyal to her own job and always wants to finish it as soon as possible. Tanya will never let anyone discriminate her appearance because of how fast she goes through the ranks in the military.

name: Emilia
about:
Birthday: September 23
Height: 164 cm (5'4.5")

The main female protagonist. She is a silver-haired half-elf girl who is one of the candidates to become the next ruler in the royal election. Subaru first meets her when her insignia is stolen by Felt as she needs to possess it to be eligible to participate in the election. She introduces herself as Satella when she and Subaru met during the first timeline before introducing herself by her real name when she got her insignia back.

Emilia is good natured and likes to take care of others, though she herself refuses to admit it, instead thinking of it as her own selfishness. She is indifferent to her own appearance, leaving Puck to take care of her clothes and hair. Because her appearance is similar to the Witch of Envy, she has received unfair discrimination from others. She sometimes acts like a child and is unacquainted with the world as she used to live in the woods with other Elves, though despite this she still works hard to become a ruler.

name: Momonga
about:
Ainz Ooal Gown (アインズ・ウール・ゴウン), formerly known as Momonga (モモンガ), is the main protagonist of the Overlord series. He is the guild master of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.

A cautious and stingy person, Momonga always tries to plan and control details, avoiding any haphazard actions. Because he doesn't underestimate his opponents, he will usually overkill them. Since being transferred to a new world and becoming an actual Undead being, Momonga could feel himself becoming very cold and calculating, his emotions repressed.

Loyal to his friends and creations, since becoming Lord Ruler of Nazarick in the new world he acts with a certain degree of nobility for his devoted followers. Momonga only does things that will benefit Nazarick or himself, whether it's information or prestige. Although he does have a sense of justice and doesn't hate humans as much as his followers, he holds no attachment to them, and he feels nothing toward their deaths.


(Source: Overlord Wikia)

name: Natsuki, Subaru
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: April 1
Height: 173 cm (5'8")

On the way home from the convenience store, he suddenly finds himself transported into another world. He has the ability that he calls "Return by Death" to go back in time when he dies, with only himself being aware of the reversal of time. Despite being a hikikomori and gamer in his real world, Subaru does a bit of workout and seems to know basic hand-to-hand combat, making him not completely weak.

While Subaru tends to not read the situation, he is loyal to those he holds dear, willing to help them, even if that means taking the thorny path. He has his resolve confirmed through the many situations and circumstances he faces in the fantasy world, originally having been one to always take the "easy" route. As a hikikomori, he is hopeful of the possibilities that being sucked into a new realm brings, but later realizes the realities of the predicament he is in. Ultimately, he resolves himself to be faithful and protective of the ones that he cares most about.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Satou, Kazuma
about:
Age: 17 Height: 165 cm

The main protagonist of KonoSuba. A sixteen-year-old Japanese teenager who became a game-obsessed shut-in after having his heart broken over his childhood friend during middle school. He is sent to the parallel reality after dying from acute stress reaction, forcing Aqua to come with him after she irritates him with her attitude. Kazuma is classed as an Adventurer which, despite being the lowest ranked class, allows him to learn various skills from other classes, albeit at an increased cost. With his ability, Kazuma learns basic skills such as stealing, archery, monster detection, and basic magic.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Serebryakova, Viktoriya Ivanovna
name_kanji: ヴィクトーリヤ・イヴァーノヴナ・セレブリャコーフ
about:
Viktoriya Ivanovna Serebryakova is a mage and a conscript in the Empire's army, and in the past were a member of Platoon 3 under Tanya's leadership. After that, she joined the new Wing Battalion named "V601" to serve as Tanya's adjutant.

(Source: Youjo Senki Wikia)

name: Alpha, Yuri
name_kanji: ユリ・アルファ / yuri・α
about:
Yuri is the vice-captain of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a beauty with an intelligent look, wearing glasses and a choker. She wears her hair tied into a low-cropped bun at the back of her head. Lacking a metal plate in front of her skirt, her dress emphasizes mobility rather than defense. She is equipped with spiked gauntlets.

As shown in her karma value, Yuri is good-hearted and one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Thus, she felt relief when Ainz said not to kill humans without proper reason. When given permission to do as she pleases, she chooses to help people in destitution. She uses "boku" as a first-person pronoun when speaking in private, revealing a somewhat childish nature.

Her behavior is strict like a teacher's. Due to her personality, she often works as a chairperson.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Arakuremono
about:
An anime-exclusive character. The first person Kazuma speaks with in Axel's guildhall.

(Source: Wikipedia)

about:
Maria Campbell is the first commoner to enroll in magic school in over 100 years and possesses the rarest type of magic: light magic. She is the heroine of the otome game "Fortune Lover," the universe that they are currently in.

Due to differences in class, she is bullied heavily. Originally, she would be saved by the love interests, but Katarina instead takes on the role of protecting and befriending her. She loves to bake and Katarina encourages her to do so.

The only daughter of Duke Claes who regains her memories of her past life when she hits her head on a rock when she was eight. In her past life, she was an otaku and she remembered the night before she died, she was playing an Otome game called "Love Fortune" which is now the world she is in except she isn't the heroine. She is the main rival, and no matter which route she takes, she gets a terrible ending!

Her thoughts are sometimes portrayed by five chibi versions of herself that exist only in her mind. They are Happy Catarina, Studious Catarina, Fearless Catarina, Spineless Catarina, and Chairman Catarina.

name: Tempest, Rimuru
about:
Race: Human (past life) → Slime → Demon Slime 
Age: 37 (past life) → 2 (anime/manga), 3 (light novel)
Sex: male (past life) → Sexless
Title: Ruler of Monsters, Jura-Tempest Federation Chancellor, 
Divine protection: Storm Crest
Magic: Element Magic archive, Spirit Magic archive, Greater Spirit summoning, Greater Demon summoning, 
Ability:
Species Skill - Universal Sense, Universal Thread, Universal Shapeshift, Infinite Regeneration, Demon Lord Haki, Enhanced Replication
Ultimate Skill - Wisdom King Raphael, King of Gluttony Beelzebuth, Covenant King Uriel, Storm King Veldora, 
Resistance: Physical Attack Nullification, Natural Effects Nullification, Abnormal Condition Nullification, Spiritual/Mental Attack Resistance, Holy-Demonic Attack Resistance

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)

about:
Chloe is an introverted girl, who likes to pass her time reading picture books or manga. While she appears rather cold and stoic most of the time, appearing brutal and merciless even, she can also be very emotional at times.

(Source: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)

Title: Oni King
Height: 180 cm
Ability:
