Benimaru is a majin in the service of Rimuru Tempest. He is the Minister of Defense for the Jura-Tempest Federation, acting as the Commander-in-Chief for its military during wartime. He holds a place in the Twelve Guardian Lords, as well as the Big Four, being its leader and being counted as one of Rimuru's Top Three strongest subordinates, alongside Diablo and Zegion.
voice_actor_name: Van Santfoort, Maxime, Furukawa, Makoto, Fajardo, Ricco, Wolko, Roman

name: Daikenja
about:
Name: Great Sage (Daikenja)


Entity Type: Unique Skill

Appearance:
Great Sage does not possess a physical form. It exists as an inner voice or consciousness within the wielder, providing unparalleled guidance and analytical abilities.

Background:
Great Sage is a highly sophisticated and unique skill acquired by Rimuru Tempest upon his reincarnation into the Jura Forest as a slime. This skill manifested as an advanced, sentient form of intelligence, designed to aid and guide Rimuru through his journey in this fantastical world.

Role and Contributions:

Advisor and Strategist:
Great Sage serves as the primary advisor to Rimuru, offering insights and strategies to navigate complex situations. Its analytical prowess allows for informed decision-making, ensuring Rimuru can effectively manage both peaceful and combative scenarios.

Skill Enhancement and Evolution:
Great Sage plays a crucial role in enhancing Rimuru's abilities. Over time, it evolves into the Ultimate Skill Raphael, significantly amplifying its capabilities and support functions.

Combat and Defense:
In combat, Great Sage is indispensable. It devises tactics, analyzes opponents' weaknesses, and suggests optimal strategies. This ensures that Rimuru can utilize his vast array of skills and powers to their fullest potential.

Knowledge and Information Processing:
Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.



Significance:
Great Sage is the cornerstone of Rimuru Tempest's success and growth. Its guidance and support are instrumental in Rimuru's rise from a simple slime to a powerful leader and protector. Great Sage embodies the blend of intellect, strategy, and emotional support, making it an indispensable part of Rimuru's journey and the thriving nation he builds.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)

After getting kicked out by her family, she trains in solitude. And together with Louise, they joined the Adventurer School in Bleichbürg where they met Erwin and Wendelin.

name: Luo, Binghe
about:
Luo Binghe is is the protagonist in Proud Immortal Demon Way, and the main lead in Scum Villain's Self-Saving System. He is half Heavenly Demon and half human, and was a disciple on Qing Jing peak taught by Shen Qingqiu.

Luo Binghe is described as being a tall and extraordinarily handsome youth, with a pair of bright shiny eyes, a bright, sincere smile and a humble look about him. He often wore white clothing, this and his innocent personality leading to Shen Yuan often comparing him to a sheep. However, after his blackening, he frequently favors darker clothing and a less inviting demeanor. 

(Source: The Scum Villain's Self-Saving System Wiki)

name: Shen, Qingqiu
about:
Shen Qingqiu is the protagonist of The Scum Villain's Self-Saving System. He is the Qing Jing Peak Lord and a cultivation master.

Original Shen Qingqiu
Shen Jiu, the original, had a sharp and calculating mind and was not above using devious tricks. Even as a slave child, he fought using such underhanded means as poking his opponent's eyes.

He was often cold to others and carried himself in an aloof and elegant manner, as if he was hard to ruffle. This gave him the sense of being an unreachable immortal as described by Luo Binghe. He was also described by Luo as someone bitingly sarcastic.

Post Transmigration
Shen Yuan, who transmigrated into the body of Shen Jiu, is a sarcastic, somewhat nerdy millennial. He's a little spoiled, being the child of a rich family in his first life, and more than a little dense.

He has a colorful internal dialogue, arguing with the SYSTEM and complaining about his circumstances. Around Shang Qinghua, this part of his personality is especially obvious, as he yells at the author for the ridiculous plot points he wrote that the both of them now have to deal with.

(Source: The Scum Villain's Self-Saving System Wiki)

name: Gongyi, Xiao
about: Gonyi Xiao is a minor character in the Scum Villain's Self Saving System. He used to be the head disciple of Huan Hua palace. His first appearence was in the Immortal Alliance Conference.

name: Liu, Qingge
about:
Liu Qingge is the Bai Zhan Peak Lord.

He was originally killed by the real Shen Qingqiu during a qi deviation. When Shen Yuan transmigrated, he instead chose to save his life.

After that, Liu Qingge becomes an ally and a friend.

He's shown to have feelings for Shen Yuan and doesn't like Luo Binghe.

Personality
Liu Qingge is someone who is hot-blooded, arrogant and bold. He likes to fight and have bad blood with the original Shen Qingqiu. Due to his blunt personality, he may seem hard to approach.

However, he can also be undoubtingly persistent as shown when Luo Binghe was in possession of Shen Qingqiu's corpse, he went and attempt to retrieve it everyday without fail, even if he was defeated by Luo Binghe every time.

(Source: The Scum Villain's Self-Saving System Wiki)

name: Liu, Mingyan
about:
Liu Mingyan is a supporting character in Proud Immortal Demon's Way and in Scum Villain's Self-Saving System. She is the head disciple of Qi Qingqi on Xian Shu Peak. In the original story of Proud Immortal Demon's Way, Liu Mingyan is one of Luo Binghe's head wives in his 600+ strong harem. In the Scum Villain story, she does not marry Luo Binghe and instead continues to be the head disciple on Xian Shu Peak. She is the author of "Regret of Chunshan" and publishes smut of Shen Qingqiu and Luo Binghe under her pen name Liu Su Mian Hua.

Personality
Liu Mingyan is said to be very just and upright, with great character and intelligence. She has great tolerance, style and can understand overall situation quite well. 

(Source: The Scum Villain's Self-Saving System Wiki)

name: Meng, Mo
about:
Meng Mo is a dream demon who taught Luo Binghe about the power to control the dreaming world. Several hundred years ago he was a brilliant, famous, and outstanding elder among demons before divine punishment destroyed his physical body. However, his powerful spirit was completely undamaged, and from then on he became a parasite within others’ dream realms, subsisting by absorbing their spiritual energy and vitality. 

(Source: Chuan Shu Zijiu Zhinan Wiki)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Ming, Fan
about:
Ming Fan is the head discple of Qing Jing Peak. He is the chief bully who made Luo Binghe's life miserable within the sect. In the original Proud Immortal Demon's Way his treatment of Luo Binghe caused him to be resentful and in the end killed Ming Fan by throwing him into an ant pit until he died from the bites.

His treatment toward Luo Binghe during Scum Villain's Self-Saving System was not much better but later on they would come into a grudging comradeship after Shen Qingqiu expressed favoritism toward Luo Binghe.

(Source: Chuan Shu Zijiu Zhinan Wiki)

name: Mobei-jun
about:
Mobei-jun, also known as 漠北君, is a formidable figure characterized by his tall stature, strikingly handsome masculine features, and an aura described as godly, possessing an innate ability to repel others over vast distances. Despite his imposing appearance, Mobei-jun maintains a reticent demeanor and a cold attitude toward others, a demeanor that Shen Yuan notes softens slightly in rare instances, revealing glimpses of underlying kindness amidst his usual aloofness.

As a pure-blooded and legitimate second-generation offspring, Mobei-jun hails from a prestigious family that holds territory in the northern boundary of the Demon Realm. His enigmatic presence is akin to that of a shadow, as he moves effortlessly and independently, answering to none but Luo Binghe, whom he regards with unwavering loyalty.

Initially occupying the coveted position of Demon King, Mobei-jun's reign was abruptly disrupted when Luo Binghe decisively defeated him in a fateful confrontation, compelling Mobei-jun to bow his head in allegiance and pledge himself as Luo's right-hand man. This allegiance fuels Luo Binghe's ambitions, with Mobei-jun executing various nefarious tasks at his command, including acts of murder and arson, thereby solidifying their symbiotic relationship.

In addition to his strategic prowess and formidable combat skills, Mobei-jun possesses unique abilities derived from his demonic heritage. He has mastered the art of conjuring a fearsome black ice sword, capable of replication into formidable arrays numbering in the hundreds. Utilizing these ice swords, Mobei-jun can besiege enemies from all angles, rendering conventional defenses futile against the onslaught of pure demonic energy. However, unlike conventional cultivators, Mobei-jun lacks the ability to take flight upon these swords.

Furthermore, Mobei-jun demonstrates proficiency in teleportation, utilizing dark shadows as conduits to traverse vast distances instantaneously, further enhancing his mystique and strategic capabilities on the battlefield. Throughout his exploits, Mobei-jun remains an enigmatic and formidable presence, embodying a complex amalgamation of power, loyalty, and inherent darkness within the tumultuous realm of the Demon Realm.

(Source: Chuan Shu Zijiu Zhinan Wiki)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Shibata, Genzou
about:
Genzou is a pro wrestler and an animal lover, frequently accompanied by his small dog, Hiroyuki. Even mentions of harming an animal are enough to send him over the edge, and whoever voices such thoughts quickly finds themselves wishing they didn't.

When he is summoned by princess Altena to her world, Genzou refuses to comply with her demands of eradicating beasts and instead sets out to earn enough money to open up a pet shop (in a world that has no concept of pets) and save as many beasts as he can from being abused or killed.

However, this proves to be harder than he initially thought, as Genzou tends to pick up many (large and dangerous) animals without caring about food costs. This is a source of endless frustration for Shigure, who tags along and manages the household's finances.
voice_actor_name: Konishi, Katsuyuki, Rinehart, Tyson, Bassetti, Marco

name: Shigure
about:
Shigure is a wolf girl who tags along with Genzou in hopes of becoming rich. She is shrewd when it comes to money, usually picking up and selling other hunters' swords that they drop after being punched by Genzou for accidentally offending him. However, all her business ideas end badly, and she is in such grave debt at the start of the story that she agrees to sell herself into slavery to repay the loan. 

When it comes to making decisions, Shigure is frequently the voice of reason, as opposed to Genzou's style of "punch first, ask questions later". To her dismay, she is also apparently the only one who worries about the household's finances, since Genzou brings in animals without concerning himself with whether he'll actually be able to support them.
voice_actor_name: Sekine, Akira, Hornsby, Emily, Bologna, Jessica

name: Celes
about:
Celes is a lizard woman whose lizard genes manifest through scales covering only her stomach and back.

She begs Genzo to take her on as a disciple and teach her how to be stronger. After going through grueling training with him and the rest of the gang, Genzo bestows her with the wrestler name "Celes XXL".

name: Edgardo Latis, Altena
about:
Princess Altena is the one who summons Genzo to get rid of the demon king and the beasts in her kingdom.

Her servants nickname her "Shirihime" ("Princess Buttocks") after Genzo's German suplex exposes her butt to the royal court.

name: Hanako
about:
Lindabrea is a dragon, and the heir to a noble family. Displeased with only having orc meat to eat, she leaves her menacing-looking castle to roam the world in search of more delicious food. Lindabrea is accompanied by her vampire maid, Carmilla, whom she recognizes is "useless" (i.e. not very strong or apt in battle) but appreciates for her loyalty.

Joanna regards Lindabrea as a rival out of jealousy that Lindabrea seems to win battles effortlessly, while Joanna struggles and trains hard; Lindabrea, however, doesn't seem to pay Joanna too much attention, usually being distracted by food while Joanna is talking to her.

Since her name is too long and complicated for him to pronounce, Genzou nicknames her "Hanako".
voice_actor_name: Yagi, Yuki, Yu, Apphia, Maruffa, Beatrice

name: Hiroyuki
about: Hiroyuki is Genzou's small dog. The two are almost inseparable - except during the times Genzou instructs him to hold down the fort while he and his party are out to earn money. Since there are no dogs in the world him and Genzou were transported to, Hiroyuki is seen as a strange beast and is the target of Misha and Wolfgang, who want to capture and sell him off.

name: Asmodeus, Alice
name_kanji: アスモデウス ・アリス
about:
Gender: Male
Ability: Fire Magic
Familiar: Gorgon Snake
Nicknames: Azu-Kun, Azu-Azu

Asmodeus is the top student at Babirus Demon School and one of Iruma's closest friends. After being defeated by Iruma, he pledges loyalty to him.
voice_actor_name: Kimura, Ryouhei, Kametz, Billy, Leguizamo, Elliot, Pejon, Marcus

name: Suzuki, Iruma
about:
Iruma Suzuki is a 14-year-old human boy who is sent to the netherworld when his selfish parents sell him to a demon named Sullivan. He is a cheerful and mild-natured boy who has a habit of being a pushover and unable to turn down an earnest request.

Sullivan asks Iruma to be his grandson and enrolls him in the Babyls Demon School, where he is placed in the Misfit class along with his classmates, Asmodeus Alice and Clara Valac. Terrified of being found out as a human and being eaten, Iruma must learn to adjust to his new life in the netherworld and blend in with his demon classmates at school.

Possession: Gluttonous feeder ring
Familiar: Professor Kalego
voice_actor_name: Murase, Ayumu, Stahl, Laura, Becerril, Diego, Lucindo, Fábio, Frenchel, Vivian

name: Valac, Clara
about: Female friend of Iruma. Clara really likes playing games and has been exiled for her childish antics. Despite her care-free nature, she is very powerful.
voice_actor_name: Asai, Ayaka, Mills, Kayli, Dellamonica, Bia, Estrada, Azucena

name: Agares, Picero
about: Agares wears the typical school uniform except for the bow leaving his coat open. His sleeves are either longer than normal or simply too long for his arms, reaching up to his knuckles. Under his coat is what seems like a buttoned-up pajama shirt with sleeves reaching farther than his coat. He also doesn't wear any shoes, revealing his white socks. On his head he has what's either a self-conscious eye mask (probably like a familiar) or some sort of eyeglass akin to scuba goggles. He also has pointy ears, fangs that sometimes stick out, hair that is curly on the ends and is shaped like a cone, and wings.
voice_actor_name: Anderson, Brian, Yoshinaga, Takuto, Marques, Felipe, Bonilla, Carlos Enrique

name: Allocer, Schneider
name_kanji: アロケル・シュナイダー
voice_actor_name: McDonald, Landon, Toki, Shunichi, Horta, Rodrigo, Melgarejo Falconi, Gustavo

name: Ami, Kirio
about:
When he was a child, Kirio's magic power capacity was measured and found to be none, which worried and disappointed his family as their household was known for their notably high power capacity.

He was then sent to Demon Children's Garden, an elementary correctional institution that raises and exerts full control over young demons. There, he experiences a strict and harsh environment as he was told he was dirtying his family name and was bullied for it. Amidst the negativity in the garden, he met and befriended a girl around his age at that time who was similar to him in terms of grades. She let him touch her charm, her grandmother's earring, which she said would make him feel more cheerful. However, the bullies took it and threw it off the cliff. Kirio managed to catch it with his barrier, but it broke as he lost focus and the earring fell while the girl watched in despair. After the incident, the girl quit the Garden while Kirio was forced to remain by his parents.



(Source: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Oosaka, Ryouta, Le, Aleks, Mello, Vitor, Torres, José Ángel

name: Myne
about:
Former name (before reincarnation): Motosu Urano (本須 麗乃)

Originally a young woman from our world who just finished her studies to become a librarian and died buried in her own books after an earthquake caused her bookshelves to fall on her, she found herself reincarnated in a very frail body of a 5-year-old young girl called Myne in a fantasy world.

She loves books above everything else and living a quiet life surrounded by books is her long life goal.

She has read a massive amount of books in her former life and has a good memory of the content that especially interested her.

While originally her motivation was only books and she didn't care about anything else, she becomes more and more involved in many other things, as she start to care and love more and more her new family and many other peoples she encounters.

Her body is so frail that she easily get tired after walking for a bit, and whenever she forces herself too much she gets strong fevers that can last for days.

She has a strong talent to teach others and motivate them in their studies.

She is usually very level headed but will go berserk whenever books get involved. The peoples around her know that tendency and will try to reason her whenever she becomes too reckless. As time passes, she became more receptive to those words, especially when they come from Ferdinand and Lutz.
voice_actor_name: Iguchi, Yuka, Buhr, Reba, Ponzanelli, Valca

name: Benno
about:
Merchant and owner of the Gilberta Company, a major clothing and accessories store located on the north end of town. Corinna is his sister.

He is first introduced as Otto's acquaintance from when Otto was a trader. Later, it is revealed that he and Otto are brothers-in-law.

name: Eva
about: Myne and Turi's mother. She has green like jade hair and green close to yellow-green eyes. She works at a dyery.

name: Ferdinand
about:
Ferdinand is the head priest in the temple of Ehrenfest, as well as the patron and educator of Myne in the temple. Ferdinand teaches and guides her to be a 'proper' shrine maiden and noble lady.

Ferdinand is a serious, disciplined and pragmatic person. He has a bit of a fussy personality, leading him to take on all sorts of responsibilities, including Myne's education. Ferdinand is meritocratic in spite of his social status, despising incompetence and laziness the most, and earning him the reputation of a harsh disciplinarian who would cut off anyone who couldn't meet his standard. The same trait leads him to favor Myne ever since their first interaction, calling her worthwhile to educate.

(Source: Ascendance of a Bookworm Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Hayami, Show, Taylor, Armen, del Roble, Daniel

name: Fey
about: He has pink hair and looks like he plays a lot of pranks.

name: Frida
about: She is the guild master's granddaughter.

name: Ichijou, Aoi
about: A master swordswoman and member of the Seven Prodigies. She has inhumane reflexes and incredible physical strength. She often speaks using archaic language, such as replacing "desu" with "de gozaru".

name: Kanzaki, Keine
about: An extremely proficient doctor and member of the Seven Prodigies. She is capable of treating any type of wounds, synthesize medicines, and even carry out complex impromptu life-saving surgeries by herself.

name: Mikogami, Tsukasa
about:
Tsukasa is a prime minister while still in high school. His father was a former prime minister who used corrupted means to provide luxury for the family and holds absolute power, until Tsukasa disapproved of his actions and exposed his faults leading to his execution and his mother disowning him. Tsukasa is childhood friends with Masato and Shinobu. Tsukasa chooses to benefit others over self, family, friends & associates. After conquering the empire, Tsukasa takes charge in politics to avert foreseen war affairs. He has heterochromia.

(Source Wikipedia)

name: Oohoshi, Ringo
about: A prodigious engineer and inventor, and a member of the Seven Prodigies. She's considered to be the mastermind of her generation and is capable of memorizing blueprints and creating all sorts of technological items on her own.
voice_actor_name: Hidaka, Rina, Harlacher, Erika, Dichmann, Francis

name: Prince Akatsuki
about: A master illusionist and member of the Seven Prodigies. He can make things appear and disappear at will, and he can also levitate. He's often confused for a girl.

name: Sanada, Masato
about: An extremely successful entrepreneur and a member of the Seven Prodigies. He's considered to be the world's best businessman, and possesses a great ability and knowledge for investment and trading.

name: Sarutobi, Shinobu
about: A Shinobi journalist and a member of the Seven Prodigies. Considered to be the world's best journalist, she has great ability for information gathering, espionage and deception. She's also considerably agile and experienced in ninjutsu. She often fights using kunais and shurikens.

name: Airi
about: Zest Bernard's daughter.

name: Bernard, Zest
about: Leader of the Seven-Light Faith Knight Order.

nicknames: Rudy, Rudeus of the Quagmire, The Owner

name: Migurdia, Roxy
name_kanji: ロキシー・ミグルディア
about:
Roxy Migurdia is a talented Migurd mage, and a former magic tutor. Because she can't use telepathy, she leaves her village due to feeling isolated from her peers. Unable to make a stable living as an adventurer, she becomes a travelling tutor and eventually becomes Rudeus' teacher. After the Teleport Incident, Roxy helps Paul to search the world for survivors.

Roxy is a thin young Migurd woman of short height with pale skin and long, blue, water colored hair and eyes of the same color. Her outfit usually consists of a magicians hat and robe. Her hair is held in two ponytails that travel down her back.

She has a rather child like body which causes several people to think of her as a teenager rather than an adult.


(Source: Mushoku Tensei Wikia)

name: Tempest, Rimuru
about:
Race: Human (past life) → Slime → Demon Slime 
Age: 37 (past life) → 2 (anime/manga), 3 (light novel)
Sex: male (past life) → Sexless
Title: Ruler of Monsters, Jura-Tempest Federation Chancellor, 
Divine protection: Storm Crest
Magic: Element Magic archive, Spirit Magic archive, Greater Spirit summoning, Greater Demon summoning, 
Ability:
Species Skill - Universal Sense, Universal Thread, Universal Shapeshift, Infinite Regeneration, Demon Lord Haki, Enhanced Replication
Ultimate Skill - Wisdom King Raphael, King of Gluttony Beelzebuth, Covenant King Uriel, Storm King Veldora, 
Resistance: Physical Attack Nullification, Natural Effects Nullification, Abnormal Condition Nullification, Spiritual/Mental Attack Resistance, Holy-Demonic Attack Resistance

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)

A former member of the Ten Great Demon Lords group and a self-proclaimed Demon Lord. Also known as the Marionette Master and with more than 500 years lived, he's a man that likes to manipulate his subordinates to make them do as he pleases.

(Source: Tensura Wiki)

name: Daikenja
about:
Name: Great Sage (Daikenja)


Entity Type: Unique Skill

Appearance:
Great Sage does not possess a physical form. It exists as an inner voice or consciousness within the wielder, providing unparalleled guidance and analytical abilities.

Background:
Great Sage is a highly sophisticated and unique skill acquired by Rimuru Tempest upon his reincarnation into the Jura Forest as a slime. This skill manifested as an advanced, sentient form of intelligence, designed to aid and guide Rimuru through his journey in this fantastical world.

Role and Contributions:

Advisor and Strategist:
Great Sage serves as the primary advisor to Rimuru, offering insights and strategies to navigate complex situations. Its analytical prowess allows for informed decision-making, ensuring Rimuru can effectively manage both peaceful and combative scenarios.

Skill Enhancement and Evolution:
Great Sage plays a crucial role in enhancing Rimuru's abilities. Over time, it evolves into the Ultimate Skill Raphael, significantly amplifying its capabilities and support functions.

Combat and Defense:
In combat, Great Sage is indispensable. It devises tactics, analyzes opponents' weaknesses, and suggests optimal strategies. This ensures that Rimuru can utilize his vast array of skills and powers to their fullest potential.

Knowledge and Information Processing:
Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.



Significance:
Great Sage is the cornerstone of Rimuru Tempest's success and growth. Its guidance and support are instrumental in Rimuru's rise from a simple slime to a powerful leader and protector. Great Sage embodies the blend of intellect, strategy, and emotional support, making it an indispensable part of Rimuru's journey and the thriving nation he builds.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Toyoguchi, Megumi, Rodak, Mallorie, Vechin, Gisele, Luna, Circe, Loriaux, Fabienne, Franzoso, Giulia
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), Spanish, French, Italian

name: Diablo
about:
Race: Demon
Divine protection: Tempest (Protection of the Storm)
Title: Demon Duke (Demon Lord)
Resistances: Physical Attack Nullification, Natural Effect Nullification, Status Change Nullification, Spirit Attack Resistance, Holy Magic Attack Resistance

Primordial Demon Summoned by Rimuru. 

Abilities
- Unique Skill - Great Wiseman, Tempter
- Ex - Multiple Barrier, Spatial Transfer
- Daily Skill - Magic Perception, Demon Lord's Haki
- Battle Skill - Law Manipulation
voice_actor_name: Sakurai, Takahiro, Allard, Philippe, Mills, Daman, Castañeda, Arturo, Casemiro, Bruno, Oldani, Andrea
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, French, English, Spanish, Portuguese (BR), Italian

name: Dwargo, Gazeru
about:
Race: Dwarf
Blessings/Protection: Divine Protector of Ancestor
Titles: King of Armament Nation Dwargon, Hero King
Abilities: Swordsmen, Illusion Magic, Spirit Possession
voice_actor_name: Hashi, Takaya, Butts, Bill, Júnior, Garcia, Osorio, Dan, Moretti, Andrea

name: Emilia
about:
Birthday: September 23
Height: 164 cm (5'4.5")

The main female protagonist. She is a silver-haired half-elf girl who is one of the candidates to become the next ruler in the royal election. Subaru first meets her when her insignia is stolen by Felt as she needs to possess it to be eligible to participate in the election. She introduces herself as Satella when she and Subaru met during the first timeline before introducing herself by her real name when she got her insignia back.

Emilia is good natured and likes to take care of others, though she herself refuses to admit it, instead thinking of it as her own selfishness. She is indifferent to her own appearance, leaving Puck to take care of her clothes and hair. Because her appearance is similar to the Witch of Envy, she has received unfair discrimination from others. She sometimes acts like a child and is unacquainted with the world as she used to live in the woods with other Elves, though despite this she still works hard to become a ruler.
voice_actor_name: Takahashi, Rie, Mills, Kayli, Mendes, Lina, Leal, Lupita, Pietermann, Gabrielle

name: Natsuki, Subaru
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: April 1
Height: 173 cm (5'8")

On the way home from the convenience store, he suddenly finds himself transported into another world. He has the ability that he calls "Return by Death" to go back in time when he dies, with only himself being aware of the reversal of time. Despite being a hikikomori and gamer in his real world, Subaru does a bit of workout and seems to know basic hand-to-hand combat, making him not completely weak.

While Subaru tends to not read the situation, he is loyal to those he holds dear, willing to help them, even if that means taking the thorny path. He has his resolve confirmed through the many situations and circumstances he faces in the fantasy world, originally having been one to always take the "easy" route. As a hikikomori, he is hopeful of the possibilities that being sucked into a new realm brings, but later realizes the realities of the predicament he is in. Ultimately, he resolves himself to be faithful and protective of the ones that he cares most about.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Kobayashi, Yuusuke, Chiplock, Sean, Bautista, Ricardo, Crispim, Pedro, Schwarzmaier, Tim

name: Argyle, Felix
name_kanji: フェリックス・アーガイル / フェリス
about:
Age: 19→20
Birthday: January 16
Height: 172 cm (5'8")

Crusch's knight, who is skilled in water magic, which includes healing. He refuses to use a sword. Even though he has a feminine and cat-like appearance, Felix is male. Having stated that he is a man "in both body and soul." He often speaks in the third person, using both male and female pronouns for himself, but only using female denominators to tease the other characters. A "beast human" hybrid, Felix was locked up at birth and later rescued by Crusch herself.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)
voice_actor_name: Horie, Yui, Williams, Sarah, Monteiro, Christiane, Robles, Jocelyn, Alles, Sarah

name: Batenkaitos, Lye
name_kanji: ライ・バテンカイトス
about:
Lye Batenkaitos is a Sin Archbishop of the Witch Cult, representing the gourmet aspect of gluttony.





(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Kimerer, Erik, Kawanishi, Kengo, Granja, João Victor, Torres, José Ángel

name: Baumann, Frederica
name_kanji: フレデリカ・バウマン
about:
Frederica is a maid working for Roswaal L. Mathers and a member of the Emilia Camp.

(Source: Re:Zero Wikia)
voice_actor_name: Nazuka, Kaori, Bennett, Dawn M., Mesquita, Tonia, Sánchez, Georgina, Rust, Jessica

name: Beatrice
about: A mysterious mage who was hired by Roswaal to keep his ancient magical tomes safe in his enormous library. She has the ability to warp any room in the mansion to this library whenever she chooses, but can't completely leave the mansion. Despite of her cold behavior and verbal abuses to Subaru, Beatrice can't stand if people are hurt in front of her and becomes one of people that Subaru can trust.
voice_actor_name: Arai, Satomi, Buckland, Kira, Ortiz, Verania, Gawlich, Cathlen, Vieira, Jéssica

name: Carmilla
about:
Carmilla is described as giving off a fragile expression. She has long, light pink hair that goes down to her hips, and a very refined face with round, red eyes. Her appearance is described as uncommonly adorable rather than being standout beautiful.

Carmilla is the Witch of Lust.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Iwami, Manaka, Reimold, Lisa, Moreno, María José, Cunha, Isabelle

name: Corneas, Regulus
name_kanji: レグルス・コルニアス
about:
Regulus Corneas is a Sin Archbishop of the Witch Cult, representing greed.



(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Ishida, Akira, McCarley, Kyle, Castañeda, Arturo, Ávila, Daniel

name: Daphne
about:
Witch of Gluttony. Daphne's reason for living is to feel full, causing her to care more about amount more than taste, though because she is bulimic she sometimes throws up what she eats. She created the Demon Beasts to try and get rid of hunger, however she doesn't care if people die because of them, stating that those who try to eat others should be wary of being eaten themselves.

Her body was placed in a diagonal coffin, tightly secured with physical restraints, with her eyes covered very tightly with a black blindfold.

(Source: Re:Zero Wikia)
voice_actor_name: Touyama, Nao, Marie, Michelle, Valadez, Azucena, Marina, Jéssica

name: Echidna
about:
Echidna is described to give others a white impression, with long snow white hair and beautiful skin. Only her intellectual looking eyes and dress are black, the two colors drawing out her beauty, and she is mentioned to be beautiful enough that anyone would be fascinated by her.

Echidna is the Witch of Greed.

(Source: Re;Kingdom Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Sakamoto, Maaya, Quinones, Anairis, Rangel, Leyla, Viotti, Luísa, Oeffinger, Marieke

name: Pack
about: Pack is Emilia's magical creature. He has the appearance of a cat and has strong ice powers. He calls Emilia his daughter.

name: Ram
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: February 2
Height: 154 cm

Ram is one of the twin maids working for Roswaal L Mathers. She is seemingly self centered and does things at her own pace, however, in actuality she maintains a distance from people to ascertain them. She believes that Roswaal is the greatest and no one else is as precious, except for her sister Rem.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Rem
about:
Age: 17
Birthday: February 2
Height: 154 cm (5'0)

Rem is one of the twin maids working for Roswaal L Mathers. She tends to speak in a superficially polite manner and sometimes acts without thinking. She holds both worshipping respect and guilt toward her sister for an incident in the past; because of this, Rem tends to think of herself as inferior.



(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Albedo
about:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Floor Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervises the activities of the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above all the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the sister of Nigredo and Spinel. She was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist is a pair of black angel wings.

Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands, and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest. In combat, she wears an impressive black full plate armor with a unique helm and carries a battle-axe with her.

Like Shalltear, Albedo has a true form as a heteromorphic race NPC. Shalltear called her a "big mouthed gorilla" when they quarreled, so her true form may be quite large in size.

Extremely loyal and extremely in love, Albedo is completely infatuated with Momonga, often showing obsessive tendencies when it comes to his affairs. She is always vying for Momonga's affection, showcasing outbursts of jealousy whenever anyone else appears to be getting close to him. This is because the last thing Momonga did in Yggdrasil was to use his administrative privileges to edit her character history, adding the she is "madly in love" with him.

Among all the Guardians, Albedo is the most vocal when it comes to expressing opinions. She will openly denounce any statement or action deemed inappropriate, reaching the point where Momonga sometimes considers it an annoyance.

As the Overseer of the Floor Guardians, she is very levelheaded. Albedo can make calm and collected judgments that Ainz, sometimes, doesn't think of. She takes Ainz's orders as top priority and absolute, punishing anyone, even a Floor Guardian, who'd dare belittle his orders. Like many others in Nazarick, she absolutely loathes humans and views them as an inferior species.

In the web novel version, Albedo does not exist.


(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Aqua
about:
Birthday: August 1
Height: 158 cm
Weight: 49 kg
Three sizes: B83-W56-H83

The goddess of water who judged humans to send to the RPG world, up until Kazuma dragged her along with him. She is an energetic and simpleminded girl who likes to receive reverence for her status and gets upset easily. As an Archpriest and a goddess, she is powerful against demons and the undead, and is able to resurrect recently deceased people as well as purify water supplies. Rather than learning skills which would benefit her party, she spends most of her skill points learning Party Tricks.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Degurechaff, Tanya
name_kanji: ターニャ・デグレチャフ
about: Tanya Degurechaff is a cute, adorable and pretty-good looking little girl. But deep inside, she is highly power-hungry, amoral, ruthless, sadistic and hot-tempered. Especially when she is in battle against her enemies, she shows utter ruthlessness and bloodlust just to accomplish her missions. Tanya also strongly disapproves of failure and disobedience from her subordinates. She is loyal to her own job and always wants to finish it as soon as possible. Tanya will never let anyone discriminate her appearance because of how fast she goes through the ranks in the military.

name: Emilia
about:
Birthday: September 23
Height: 164 cm (5'4.5")

The main female protagonist. She is a silver-haired half-elf girl who is one of the candidates to become the next ruler in the royal election. name: Momonga
about:
Ainz Ooal Gown (アインズ・ウール・ゴウン), formerly known as Momonga (モモンガ), is the main protagonist of the Overlord series. He is the guild master of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.

A cautious and stingy person, Momonga always tries to plan and control details, avoiding any haphazard actions. Because he doesn't underestimate his opponents, he will usually overkill them. Since being transferred to a new world and becoming an actual Undead being, Momonga could feel himself becoming very cold and calculating, his emotions repressed.

Loyal to his friends and creations, since becoming Lord Ruler of Nazarick in the new world he acts with a certain degree of nobility for his devoted followers. Momonga only does things that will benefit Nazarick or himself, whether it's information or prestige. Although he does have a sense of justice and doesn't hate humans as much as his followers, he holds no attachment to them, and he feels nothing toward their deaths.


(Source: Overlord Wikia)

name: Natsuki, Subaru
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: April 1
Height: 173 cm (5'8")

On the way home from the convenience store, he suddenly finds himself transported into another world. name: Satou, Kazuma
about:
Age: 17 Height: 165 cm

The main protagonist of KonoSuba. A sixteen-year-old Japanese teenager who became a game-obsessed shut-in after having his heart broken over his childhood friend during middle school. He is sent to the parallel reality after dying from acute stress reaction, forcing Aqua to come with him after she irritates him with her attitude. Kazuma is classed as an Adventurer which, despite being the lowest ranked class, allows him to learn various skills from other classes, albeit at an increased cost. With his ability, Kazuma learns basic skills such as stealing, archery, monster detection, and basic magic.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Serebryakova, Viktoriya Ivanovna
name_kanji: ヴィクトーリヤ・イヴァーノヴナ・セレブリャコーフ
about:
Viktoriya Ivanovna Serebryakova is a mage and a conscript in the Empire's army, and in the past were a member of Platoon 3 under Tanya's leadership. After that, she joined the new Wing Battalion named "V601" to serve as Tanya's adjutant.

(Source: Youjo Senki Wikia)

name: Alpha, Yuri
name_kanji: ユリ・アルファ / yuri・α
about:
Yuri is the vice-captain of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a beauty with an intelligent look, wearing glasses and a choker. She wears her hair tied into a low-cropped bun at the back of her head. Lacking a metal plate in front of her skirt, her dress emphasizes mobility rather than defense. She is equipped with spiked gauntlets.

As shown in her karma value, Yuri is good-hearted and one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Thus, she felt relief when Ainz said not to kill humans without proper reason. When given permission to do as she pleases, she chooses to help people in destitution. She uses "boku" as a first-person pronoun when speaking in private, revealing a somewhat childish nature.

Her behavior is strict like a teacher's. Due to her personality, she often works as a chairperson.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Arakuremono
about:
An anime-exclusive character. The first person Kazuma speaks with in Axel's guildhall.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Clarence, Tio
about: Tio is a "pervert" with the main status of M but she is honest and the words this one speakeas are similar to the old legends. Her "M" personality was made into this because she was defeated by Hajime's party in the northern mountains of the village of Ul. She devoted herself to Hajime to become his slave and called Hajime "Master."

name: Haulia, Shea
about: Shea first appeared when Hajime and Yue were traveling in the Raisen Grand Canyon while being chased by a monster like a "shameless rabbit." She was in this situation because she foresaw Hajime would help her family. She soon became their traveling companion in the long run, having the attitude to get clingy to Hajime with energetic words and actions.

name: Myuu
about: A young girl from the Sea-Dweller Tribe.

name: Nagumo, Hajime
about:
Hajime was a complete otaku and always came to class with a sleepy expression. He was always bullied and was disliked by both of his male and female classmates for being close to their idol-like classmate Kaori. After wishing for his annoying classmates to be summoned to another world, the next thing he saw was they were on top of a pillar like structure in another world to become heroes.

He obtained the job of "Synergist" and continued to be bullied due to also being weak in this new world. He eventually fell into an abyss due to being hit by a classmate's fireball where he survived though a hell-like environment to become the powerful man he is today.

Hajime at the beginning of the story is said to have black hair and also has a slim body. He also had a kind face and attitude. But after falling in the abyss and eating a wolf-like monster, his body began to violently degenerate. When he drunk the sacred water, it made his body heal by destroying his bones and muscles then healing over and over again until he got a very muscular body due to overcompensation.

Due to the stress of breaking and healing, his hair turned white, a victim of the Marie Antoinette syndrome. His eyes also turned red and his body gained tattoo-like red lines which is the sign of him becoming a demonic monster similar to the monsters he ate that also possessed red lines along their bodies.

His personality was at first kind though he was considered incompetent. But after falling in the abyss, he became cruel and would kill any person who wants to cause him misfortune. He would also smile in front of danger which made Shia call him a new species of monster called "Predator." He may be cruel but he cares for his comrades.

(Source: Arifureta Wiki)

name: Shirasaki, Kaori
about:
Kaori is one the most caring personalities in the series. She is a classmate of Hajime's back in their original world. She admires Hajime for his "strong" personalty and is the only classmate who pays attention to Hajime's existence in class even if she is popular in their school.

When summoned to another world, she receives the "Healer" job.

name: Yue
about:
Yue is a vampire who was imprisoned in the abyss. She was betrayed by her uncle and peers because of her monstrous magic and regeneration that made her nearly immortal.

With a fateful encounter, Yue met Hajime in a sealed room in the abyss. After being rescued, Yue was the person who suppressed Hajime's madness before he became a monster and she soon became Hajime's "special" person after what transpired in the Abyss.

Her appearance was described to be like the highest grade bisque doll with blonde hair and crimson eyes. She is 323 years old despite her small physique because she is a Vampire Princess. Her name Yue isn't her real name and was only given by Hajime so that she could leave her dark past and move on.

name: Hatayama, Aiko
about: The teacher of the class. She has the Agriculturalist class. Her short height and enthusiastic attitude has earned her respect and admiration from the majority of her students.

name: Haulia, Shea
about: Shea first appeared when Hajime and Yue were traveling in the Raisen Grand Canyon while being chased by a monster like a "shameless rabbit." She was in this situation because she foresaw Hajime would help her family. She soon became their traveling companion in the long run, having the attitude to get clingy to Hajime with energetic words and actions.

name: Hiyama, Daisuke
about: One of Hajime's classmates. He's the leader of those that harass Hajime.

name: Loggins, Meld
about: He is the Knight Commander of the Heiligh Kingdom. He was responsible for overseeing the training of the summoned heroes from the other world.

name: Sakagami, Ryuutarou
about: Kouki's best friend. He's a muscle brained character and has a low opinion of Hajime.

name: Yaegashi, Shizuku
about: Kaori's best friend. She's the childhood friend of Kouki and her family runs a dojo.

name: Alice
about: The girl who followed the White Rabbit into Wonderland. In contrast to her novel counterpart, she is depicted with red hair instead of blonde, a hat, and a red and white dress similar in design to her Disney counterpart's blue and white dress.

name: Benny Bunny
about: Alice's rabbit companion in her adventures throughout Wonderland. Found when Alice buys a magic hat in an old shop, Benny turns out to be the nephew of the White Rabbit, so he gets along fairly well with most of the Wonderlanders. He is always uncomfortable whenever they have to go to the Jabberwocky though, as the dragon is set on making rabbit stew out of him.

name: Alice's Father
about: Alice's father.

name: Caterpillar
about: Ostensibly the wisest out of all of the Wonderlanders, the Caterpillar can also be considered the sanest or most normal real-world-wise. Usually found in an area filled with mushrooms, the Caterpillar smokes from his hooka while listening to the different woes of the Wonderlanders. Alice usually comes to him for advice, which has developed into the two of them having a close friendship.

name: Celia
about: Alice's Sister. Likes to read books without pictures.

name: Cheshire Cat
about: A striped cat with the power to vanish himself and others. He's a bit of a bumbler.

name: Dormouse
about:
Another tea party attendee. The Dormouse is often asleep and therefore aloof. Although he receives a lot accidental abuse from other characters, he never complains. He also seemingly does not do anything besides dozing, although he is seen playing cymbals on one occasion.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Duchess
about: Rarely seen without The Cook, she has a piglet as a child whom gets casually thrown about.

name: Degurechaff, Tanya
name_kanji: ターニャ・デグレチャフ
about: Tanya Degurechaff is a cute, adorable and pretty-good looking little girl. But deep inside, she is highly power-hungry, amoral, ruthless, sadistic and hot-tempered. Especially when she is in battle against her enemies, she shows utter ruthlessness and bloodlust just to accomplish her missions. Tanya also strongly disapproves of failure and disobedience from her subordinates. She is loyal to her own job and always wants to finish it as soon as possible. (Source: Youjo Senki Wikia)

name: Grantz, Warren
name_kanji: ヴォーレン・グランツ

name: Koenig, Wilibald
name_kanji: ヴィリバルト・ケーニッヒ
about: Wilibald Koenig is the 3rd Company commander of V601 under the command of Tanya Degurechaff.

name: Neumann, Rhiner
about: Rhiner Neumann is serving as the 4th Company Commander of V601 under the command of Tanya Degurechaff.

name: Iwatani, Naofumi
about:
Age: 19
Race: Human
Country: Japan (former), Melromarc: Rock Valley
Occupation: University Student (former), Legendary Hero
Weapon: Legendary Shield

Naofumi Iwatani is the main protagonist of The Rising of the Shield Hero.

He was a university student before being summoned to another world, where he had to fight against the waves of calamity, as one of the 4 cardinal heroes summoned. He was, however, the shield hero, regarded by many and especially people in Melromarc as the weakest of the heroes.

Due to his status as shield hero, many refused to join his side, the only exception being Myne Sophia. Myne however falsely accuses him of sexual assault causing him to lose his dignity and all his money
Due to this, the once cheerful Naofumi became a cynical character who lost the ability to trust in people.

He buys the slave Raphtalia and the bird Filo, but treats them like his daughters rather than his slaves.


(Source: Shield-Hero Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Ishikawa, Kaito, Alonso, Renan, Fu, Stephen, Bravo, Alan, Matthys, Nicolas, Schalla, Björn
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Portuguese (BR), English, Spanish, French, German

name: Raphtalia
about:
Age: 10 (mentally), 17 (biologically)
Height: 5'6" (168 cm)
Raphtalia is a Tanuki-type Demi-Human who was the first real member of the Shield Hero's party after he purchased her as a slave.

She has undergone some significant changes throughout the story. When Raphtalia is first introduced, she is a child that has long, unmanaged hair and a dirty cloth gown. After being purchased by Naofumi, he gave her a haircut to an acceptable length, gave her a bath, and bought her a much more suitable set of clothes to adventure in.

After several weeks of traveling with Naofumi, Raphtalia's body inexplicably changes and she gained the appearance of a teenager or young adult. It is revealed that demi-humans grow in relation to the progression of their levels, which led to Raphtalia's rapid development.


(Source: Shield-Hero Wiki)

voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Spanish, French, Portuguese (BR), German

name: Amaki, Ren
about:
Age: 16

Ren Amaki is the Sword Hero, one of the four holy heroes summoned in Melromarc.

Ren comes from an Alternative Japan. In the world he lives in everything is much more advanced and futuristic. In his world, every game in the modern era is run on VRMMO.

One day while on the way home from school, Ren was caught up in a murder case. The murder case was pretty well known around the town he lived in. Ren mentioned how he remembers saving his best friend and how the criminal arrested. Ren didn't go into too much detail after that but started rubbing his side when talking, it was suspected that Ren was probably stabbed on the side of his body during the struggle then later died from blood loss.

Before he knew it he woke up he found himself summoned to another world. The world reminded him a lot of the VRMMO he played in the previous world, Brave Star Online.

Ren is a person who acts cool and tries very hard to portray a loner's image. He runs his party like a guild, only working with the other members when the prey he seeks to kill is too strong for him to hunt alone. His attitude towards his comrades is that weaker members should work to individually increase their powers to catch up to the stronger ones.


(Source: Shield-Hero Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Matsuoka, Yoshitsugu, Van Santfoort, Maxime, Coronel, Bruno, Luna, Leandro, Lee, Alan

name: Beloukas
about: The slave dealer that sells Naofumi Iwatani many slaves. He also conducts slave and monster seal rituals. Despite his appearance and his trade, he is an honest salesman. Upon Naofumi's request, he searches for and collects slaves who were former villagers of Raphtalia's village.
voice_actor_name: Ogata, Kenichi, Bodson, Pierre, Todaro, Frank, Ramos, Mauro

name: Berg, L'Arc
about:
He is carefree and laid back, taking a very relaxed path to every problem. He is, according to Naofumi, an older-brother kind of character. Even though he has become a king, he likes his freedom. Just like Glass, he has a warrior spirit which is shown during his fight with Naofumi.

He is a good judge of character just by looking at someone. He has a childish side which was made evident when he became giddy over the ship ride to Cal Mira Archipelago. He has a habit of calling the younger persons "Kiddo." He has high morals and doesn't want to hurt anyone who is irrelevant to his mission. He is charismatic enough to attract good people to his side.

(Source: The Rising of the Shield Hero Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Lognay, Pierre, Fukuyama, Jun, Minei, Alex, Saab, Alejandro, Ruiz, Miguel Ángel

name: Tokisaki, Kurumi
nicknames: Nightmare, Worst Spirit, Spirit of Time
about:
Birthday: June 10
Height: 157 cm (5'2")
Code name: Nightmare
Spirit number: 3
Species: Spirit
Angel: Zafkiel
Weapon: Clock type
Astral Dress: Elohim
Affiliation: Raizen High School (temporary)
Hobbies: Killing people, teasing Shidou
Likes: Weaponry, sweets, kitties
Dislikes: Humans, AST 
Strength: 109
Consistency: 80
Spiritual power: 220
Agility: 103
Intelligence: 201
Rank: S-Class Spirit
Famous quote: "I want his power. I want to make him mine and become one with him."

Kurumi Tokisaki is the main antagonist in the series. She is the third Spirit to be encountered in the series and is the most dangerous and lethal Spirit. She is heavily obsessed with Shidou and has the ability to manipulate time. Her codename is Nightmare. She has a split personality: that of a gentle, mysterious high school girl with a slow talking pattern, and that of a psychopathic killer. Kurumi is very aggressive in her actions which makes it harder for Shidou to capture her. Kurumi can be described a person whose personality is hard to read, possessing a well-polished dislike of humanity that borders on mistrust, something she shared with many Spirits in their debut. She is a skilled actress, capable of putting on the façade of an innocent, curious young girl when she needs to, shown when she registered as a student at the Raizen High School, even speaking in a very polite manner; however, under that mask lies a psychotic woman, prone to fits of insane laughter that possesses no regard for human life, regarding them as a food source to restore her own time, and thus, a disposable commodity. There is a twisted justice behind her methods, however, as the people that she brutally murdered were would-be rapists and animal abusers. In hindsight, Kurumi possesses some degree of innocence that her psychotic behavior have not entirely ruined; she has a soft spot for small animals and other creatures. She once slaughtered four humans not because she needed to replenish her time, but because they were trying to kill a kitten, this is the closest to a humanizing emotion that she has. Mana reported that Kurumi is the most dangerous spirit known, who has personally killed over 10,000 people which does not include the spacequake's victims within that statistics. Kurumi used unstated and unexplained methods to personally transfer into Shidou Itsuka's high school and classroom so she can get closer to him. Her purposes and reasons in this transfer are simple; consume Shidou Itsuka, in doing so gain their memories, goals, fears and obsessions. In some non-canon stories, the clone Shidou seduced shows some "independent" attitude, almost rebellious, and openly acts lovey-dovey with Shidou, which causes troubles to the "main" Kurumi and even leads to confrontation with her.



Kurumi has the ability to manipulate the 4th dimension, mainly time, but her main power is associated with controlling shadows. Shadow is her primary power while Time is her secondary power in terms of usage. Combined with the power of time, she can create a clone with all her experiences, memories, abilities, etc. These clones however are shadows of her past selves who contain feelings the current Kurumi no longer possesses, Kurumi will kill these clones if they are swayed away from her goals. These clones are less powerful than Kurumi herself as she has mentioned in the last chapter of volume 3 and in the epilogue of volume 4. She can form a single clone by shooting herself with Zafkiel or bring out all of her clones at once from a pool of shadows which she also uses to draw them all back in and all the time they've collected. She can also call her clones partially through small fields of shadows, most often to hold someone in place and prevent them from moving. To activate any power she needs, she first needs to call her Angel (regardless of whether or not the Angel has been summoned already or not), and to position both of her guns just like a clock: The musket on 12 and the flintlock points at the number of the bullet. Next she needs to shoot the bullet at the target with the hand gun. In case she needs it for herself, she will be required to shoot it at her head. She also has the ability to call and dismiss spacequakes at will, as shown in the series while she confronts Shidou on the school's rooftop.

(Source: Wikipedia, DAL Wiki)

name: White Queen
about:
Height: 160 cm (5'2")
Age: 17-18 (Physically)
Gender: Female
Occupation: Dominion
Species: Spirit
Angel: Lucifugus (狂々帝, Kyōkyōtei, lit. Lunatic Emperor)
Weapon: Astronomical Clock, Saber, Gun
Astral Dress: Unknown
Hobbies: Ruling her Dominion, waging wars with other Dominions, committing spiritcide, killing and torturing other Kurumi's clones, conquesting other worlds.
Dislikes: Kurumi Tokisaki
Allies: Bishop, Rook and Knight
Enemies: Kurumi Tokisaki
Rank: SS-Class threat
Famous quote: "You think you can kill me? That’s utterly amusing."
List of the bullets:

Aries Bullet [Taleh]: Effects Unknown.

Taurus Bullet [Shor]: Effects Unknown.

Gemini Bullet [Teomim]: Effects Unknown.

Cancer Bullet [Sartan]: Warps spacetime in order to protect the user or assault the enemy.

Leo Bullet [Arie]: 'Eats' space, consuming in the same way [Yud Aleph] eats time.

Virgo Bullet [Betulah]: Create a crack in space and allow a person to travel between places.

Libra Bullet [Moznaim]: Rules over space and can reverse cause and effect within that space.

Scorpio Bullet [Akrab]: Puts the user's symbol on the target and turn the target into a rook under their control.

Sagittarius Bullet [Kashat]: Effects Unknown

Capricorn Bullet [G'di]: Effects Unknown

Aquarius Bullet [D'li]: Heals the target completely.

Pisces Bullet [Dagim]: Effects Unknown

White Queen wears a white military dress decorated with epaulettes, and a white admiral's cap with an emblem similar to that of a rising sun on the front of it. In the middle of the emblem is a clock face. She also wears white gloves and white, heeled boots. She has long white hair usually tied in symmetrical twin tails. Her right eye is red-tinted while her left eye appears as a blue clock face. She is stated to look identical to Kurumi, aside from the obvious colour scheme differences.

Rather than a battle maniac, the White Queen is a strategist. She performed infiltration, acts of terrorism, and experiments to change Empty into monsters to strengthen her army. She also captured and tortured Cistus to study and exploit Zaphkiel's power. The White Queen is also callous, aggressive and intelligent. These traits combined together make for a formidable opponent, and this was acknowledged by the other Dominions. She has immense power, and all the tools at her disposal to back it up. She is considered and careful when planning attacks and engaging in battle, and will sacrifice her own soldiers when needed to ensure a victory. She also has the capacity to forward plan, and is uninhibited by taboos in the Neighboring World, one of these including encroaching on other Regions. The White Queen is goal-oriented and believes that her goal is far more important than the lives of her enemies and allies, as shown by how readily she sacrifices her own troops.



(Source: DAL Wik, Villains Wiki, Amino)

name: Clarence, Tio
about: Tio is a "pervert" with the main status of M but she is honest and the words this one speakeas are similar to the old legends. Her "M" personality was made into this because she was defeated by Hajime's party in the northern mountains of the village of Ul. She devoted herself to Hajime to become his slave and called Hajime "Master."
voice_actor_name: Hikasa, Youko, Franchi, Glaucia, Garrett, Morgan, Olea, Vanessa, Dietz, Janina

name: Haulia, Shea
about: Shea first appeared when Hajime and Yue were traveling in the Raisen Grand Canyon while being chased by a monster like a "shameless rabbit." She was in this situation because she foresaw Hajime would help her family. She soon became their traveling companion in the long run, having the attitude to get clingy to Hajime with energetic words and actions.
voice_actor_name: Takahashi, Minami, Guarnieri, Isabella, Lee, Amanda, Monroy, Vianney, Gries, Jana Dunja

name: Nagumo, Hajime
about:
Hajime was a complete otaku and always came to class with a sleepy expression. He was always bullied and was disliked by both of his male and female classmates for being close to their idol-like classmate Kaori. After wishing for his annoying classmates to be summoned to another world, the next thing he saw was they were on top of a pillar like structure in another world to become heroes.

He obtained the job of "Synergist" and continued to be bullied due to also being weak in this new world. He eventually fell into an abyss due to being hit by a classmate's fireball where he survived though a hell-like environment to become the powerful man he is today.

Hajime at the beginning of the story is said to have black hair and also has a slim body. He also had a kind face and attitude. But after falling in the abyss and eating a wolf-like monster, his body began to violently degenerate. When he drunk the sacred water, it made his body heal by destroying his bones and muscles then healing over and over again until he got a very muscular body due to overcompensation.

Due to the stress of breaking and healing, his hair turned white, a victim of the Marie Antoinette syndrome. His eyes also turned red and his body gained tattoo-like red lines which is the sign of him becoming a demonic monster similar to the monsters he ate that also possessed red lines along their bodies.

His personality was at first kind though he was considered incompetent. But after falling in the abyss, he became cruel and would kill any person who wants to cause him misfortune. He would also smile in front of danger which made Shia call him a new species of monster called "Predator." He may be cruel but he cares for his comrades.

(Source: Arifureta Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Fukamachi, Toshinari, Figueira, Daniel, Shipman, Matt, Miranda, Cuauhtémoc, Hohm, Leonard

name: Shirasaki, Kaori
about:
Kaori is one the most caring personalities in the series. She is a classmate of Hajime's back in their original world. She admires Hajime for his "strong" personalty and is the only classmate who pays attention to Hajime's existence in class even if she is popular in their school.

When summoned to another world, she receives the "Healer" job.
voice_actor_name: Oonishi, Saori, Lua, Bianca, McIntosh, Skyler, Möller-Architektonidou, Eleni

name: Yue
about:
Yue is a vampire who was imprisoned in the abyss. She was betrayed by her uncle and peers because of her monstrous magic and regeneration that made her nearly immortal.

With a fateful encounter, Yue met Hajime in a sealed room in the abyss. After being rescued, Yue was the person who suppressed Hajime's madness before he became a monster and she soon became Hajime's "special" person after what transpired in the Abyss.

Her appearance was described to be like the highest grade bisque doll with blonde hair and crimson eyes. She is 323 years old despite her small physique because she is a Vampire Princess. Her name Yue isn't her real name and was only given by Hajime so that she could leave her dark past and move on.
voice_actor_name: Kuwahara, Yuuki, Alencar, Bianca, Ballard, Tia, Hernández, Melissa, Maire, Laura

name: Amanogawa, Kouki
name_kanji: 天之河 光輝 / 天之川 光輝
about: Childhood friend of Shizuku. He is self-righteous and has an arrogant sense of justice. When the situation goes against Amanogawa's intentions, he unconsciously misinterprets the situation to his own convenience. He sometimes acts unknowingly like a "dense protagonist."

name: Bagwa, Freid
about:
Freid explored the Great Labyrinth in the Frost Caverns of Schnee, and managed to acquire Ancient Magic which allowed him to control Monsters, but at the cost of losing many of his subordinates to the Labyrinth's trials. He then began to use this newfound power to tip the scales of Demons' war against humanity in the Demons' favor.

When the heroes arrived at Tortus in order to fight the demons, he dispatched his subordinate Cattleya with a detachment of Monsters to the Great Orcus Labyrinth where they were training in order to either recruit or kill them, as well as to obtain the Ancient Magic in contained in the process.

(Source: Arifureta Wiki)

A blue dragon girl who obeys what Azusa says. Since she's a dragon like Laika, there is somewhat of a rivalry between them, but she's an optimistic and energetic girl. Unlike Laika, she has a tail in human form.

(Source: Volume 3 Character Information)
voice_actor_name: Waki, Azumi, Cunha, Isabelle, Eikermann, Elise, Gris, Gaby, Connors, Amber Lee

name: Ferdinand
about:
Ferdinand is the head priest in the temple of Ehrenfest, as well as the patron and educator of Myne in the temple. Ferdinand teaches and guides her to be a 'proper' shrine maiden and noble lady.

Ferdinand is a serious, disciplined and pragmatic person. He has a bit of a fussy personality, leading him to take on all sorts of responsibilities, including Myne's education. Ferdinand is meritocratic in spite of his social status, despising incompetence and laziness the most, and earning him the reputation of a harsh disciplinarian who would cut off anyone who couldn't meet his standard. The same trait leads him to favor Myne ever since their first interaction, calling her worthwhile to educate.

(Source: Ascendance of a Bookworm Wiki)

name: Lutz
about: Lutz has golden hair and jade eyes. He is the fourth and youngest son of Karla and Died. His older brothers are Zasha, Sieg and Ralph. He is close friends with Myne and works closely with her to monitor her health as well as help her created new products.
voice_actor_name: Tamura, Mutsumi, Tirado, Jeannie, Rodríguez Ramírez, Ángel Iván

name: Myne
about:
Former name (before reincarnation): Motosu Urano (本須 麗乃)

Originally a young woman from our world who just finished her studies to become a librarian and died buried in her own books after an earthquake caused her bookshelves to fall on her, she found herself reincarnated in a very frail body of a 5-year-old young girl called Myne in a fantasy world.

She loves books above everything else and living a quiet life surrounded by books is her long life goal.

She has read a massive amount of books in her former life and has a good memory of the content that especially interested her.

While originally her motivation was only books and she didn't care about anything else, she becomes more and more involved in many other things, as she start to care and love more and more her new family and many other peoples she encounters.

Her body is so frail that she easily get tired after walking for a bit, and whenever she forces herself too much she gets strong fevers that can last for days.

She has a strong talent to teach others and motivate them in their studies.

She is usually very level headed but will go berserk whenever books get involved. The peoples around her know that tendency and will try to reason her whenever she becomes too reckless. As time passes, she became more receptive to those words, especially when they come from Ferdinand and Lutz.

name: Benno
about:
Merchant and owner of the Gilberta Company, a major clothing and accessories store located on the north end of town. Corinna is his sister.

He is first introduced as Otto's acquaintance from when Otto was a trader. Later, it is revealed that he and Otto are brothers-in-law.

name: Corinna
about: She's Otto's wife.

name: Delia
about:
Delia is one of the orphans who becomes an apprentice gray shrine maiden. Delia is assigned as one of Myne's attendants along with Gil and Fran by the High Bishop to spy on her. She dreams of being the mistress of the Bishop and live comfortably.

(Source: Ascendance of a Bookworm Wiki)

name: Eva
about: Myne and Turi's mother. She has green like jade hair and green close to yellow-green eyes. She works at a dyery.

name: Lutz
about: Lutz has golden hair and jade eyes. He is the fourth and youngest son of Karla and Died. His older brothers are Zasha, Sieg and Ralph. He is close friends with Myne and works closely with her to monitor her health as well as help her created new products.
