Horn is a grasswalker that specializes in thief skills. Horn meets Diablo's party while they're going through the town surrounding Zircon Tower.

name: Rose
about: Rose is a Magmatic Maid in service of her master, Diablo. She often shows yandere tendencies towards those who associate themselves with her master.

name: Weselia, Lumachina
name_kanji: ルマキーナ・ウエスエリア
about: Lumachina is a 17 year old girl and the idol/leader of her religion. Being seen as a "miracle worker" at a young age, Lumachina has been sheltered by her faith and is ignorant to a large majority of the world as a result. Due to her work with miracles Lumachina is given the title of "High Priest" and is often asked to perform miracles through her prayers.

name: Arc
about: A Japanese gamer who, after falling asleep playing an online game, finds himself trapped in his game avatar, seemingly transported to a different world.
voice_actor_name: Maeno, Tomoaki, Tennstedt, Julian, Johnson, Brandon

name: Lalatoya, Ariane Glenys
name_kanji: アリアン・グレニス・ララトイア
about:
Ariane Glenys Maple (アリアン・グレニス・メープル) later renamed as Ariane Glenys Lalatoya, is very good at Spirit Magic and swordsmanship.

(Source: Skeleton Knight In Another World Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Fairouz Ai, Glass, Caitlin, May, Moira

name: Ponta
about:
Ponta is a Fluffy Fox, a spirit animal that is Arc's partner. Ponta is also a known glutton and would beg her owner for any new delight that caught her interest.

(Source: Skeleton Knight In Another World Wiki)

name: Chiyome
about:
Chiyome, formally known as Mia (ミア), is one of the primary female characters in the "Skeleton Knight in Another World" series. She received the name of "Chiyome" after becoming one of the six great fighters of the Jinshin clan.

(Source: Skeleton Knight In Another World Wiki)

name: Maryblood, William G.
name_kanji: ウィリアム・G・マリーブラッド
about:
Race: Human
Traits: Dragon Factor
Gender: Male
Age: 18 (Arc 4)
17 (Arc 3)
15-15½ (Arc 2)
1-15 (Arc 1)

Hair Color: Chestnut Brown (novel description / manga)
Orange (novel illustration / anime)

Eye Color: Deep Blue-green (novel description)
Gold (novel illustration / anime)
Red (manga)

William G. Maryblood (ウィリアム・G・マリーブラッド) is a lone human from the City of the Dead, born with vague memories of a past life and raised by the group of undead until the age of adulthood. He swore an oath to Gracefeel and leaves to explore the outside world to extend his hand to those in need and restore the faith in his guardian deity.

(Source: The Faraway Paladin Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Kawase, Maki, Liénart, Laetitia, Mendez, Erica, Granja, João Victor, Becerril, Diego, Knorr, Robert, Mattos, Nicolas
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, French, English, Portuguese (BR), Spanish, German, Portuguese (BR)

name: Antonio
about:
Antonio is a hawker and trusted friend of William. He is a highly skilled negotiator and knows the trade business fairly well.

He is friendly and gives off a peaceful impression to others.

(Source: The Faraway Paladin Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Yusa, Kouji, Pirard, Stéphane, Rosenberg, Renato

name: Augustus
name_kanji: オーガスタス / ガス
about:
Gus is a spectral sorcerer who is Will's foster grandfather as well as his teacher in sorcery and economics. He is an irascible old man who didn't like getting bound, so his vows were to Whirl, the God of Wind, to live his life the way he chose and to enjoy it.

(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Tobita, Nobuo, Thornton, Kirk, Van Wetter, Laurent, Garcia, Andrés, Moreira, Pádua

name: Bagley, Anna
about:
A novice priestess at the Whitesails temple, and Bishop Bagley's adopted daughter. She later becomes Reystov's wife.

(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: du Bled, Marie, Watanabe, Keiko, Ornelas, Fernanda, Portella, Tabata

name: Bagley, Bart
voice_actor_name: Inaba, Minoru, Waleffe, Patrick, Fernandes, Élcio Romar

name: Blood
about:
One of the three heroes that help seal the High King. They make a deal with Stagnate, the goddess of the undead, to be turned into undead to protect the seal on the High King. 

He trains William the sword.
voice_actor_name: Konishi, Katsuyuki, Résimont, Philippe, Butts, Bill, Solo, Raúl, Horta, Mauro

name: Goodfellow, Robina
name_kanji: ビィ（ロビィナ・グッドフェロー
about:
Robina Goodfellow is a halfling travelling troubadour and close friend of William. She loves to spread tales of heroic deeds to the public through poetic storytelling and singing.

She is very bright and cheerful when she's around others. She has the charisma and enthusiasm to attract crowds for her tales and loves to eat good food seemingly because of her halfling heritage.

(Source: The Faraway Paladin Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Suzuki, Eri, Braam, Marie, Valenzuela, Cristina, García Sánchez, Paola, Méssis, Bia, Leisner, Amira
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, French, English, Spanish, Portuguese (BR), German

name: Gracefeel
about:
Race: God
Traits: Humanoid
Gender: Female
Hair Color: Black
Eye Color: Purple (novel illustration / anime)
Gold (manga)

Gracefeel (グレイスフィール) is the guardian deity of William. She is a second-string goddess associated with the flame and external flux.

(Source: The Faraway Paladin Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Yuuki, Aoi, Aflalo, Esther, Taylor, Veronica, Böttcher, Jennifer, Pazete, Natali

name: Mary
about:
A mummified priestess and Will's foster mother. She guided him about essential day-to-day tasks. She often serves him bread which Will finds out later on was received through prayer, and eating it is an act of communion. Mary had vowed to live according to the will of Mater the earth-mother but had to make a contract with Stagnate the god of the undead in order to continue their existence in order to guard the seal of the Demon High King who Blood, Mary, and Gus failed to kill. Because of this betrayal, Mary catches fire every time she prays to Mater.

(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Horie, Yui, Taylor, Veronica, Cayron, Séverine, Oeffinger, Leoni, Lira, Izabel, Martínez, Rosa María
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, French, German, Portuguese (BR), Spanish

name: Meneldor
about:
A male half-elf archer that Will meets on the road after leaving home. While gruff and reluctant owing to previous bad experiences, he eventually comes to accept William as the first real friend he's had in his life.

(Source: Wikipedia)
voice_actor_name: Murase, Ayumu, Le Bec, Pierre, Puatu, Griffin, Stein, Flemming, Myara, Hugo, Moctezuma, Fernando
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, French, English, German, Portuguese (BR), Spanish

name: Aletta
about:
Aletta is a young girl from the devil race. One day, she got lost and ended up at "Youshoku no Nekoya," which she later works as a waitress.

(Source: ANIPLUS Asia, edited)

name: Kuro
about:
Kuro is a dragon using the form of an elf. She is over 35,688 years old. Like Aletta, she works as a waitress at "Youshoku no Nekoya." She is currently hooked on certain food, chicken curry.

(Source: ANIPLUS Asia, edited)

name: Owner
about:
Ten years ago, he inherited the old cafeteria "Youshoku no Nekoya" from his grandfather, which he now manages.

(Source: ANIPLUS Asia)

name: Adelheid
about:
Adelheid is the first princess of the empire. While on sick leave at the palace villa, she began visiting Nekoya regularly and began to gradually recover. Her favorite is chocolate parfaits.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Aka no Joou
about: One of the six great and ancient dragons. She is over 100,000 years old. Her power is based on fire, and she could burn the world if she desired. She has a great fondness for beef stew.

name: Alfeid, Sirius
name_kanji: シリウス・アルフェイド

name: Asakaze
about:
When Asakaze was caught drifting, he violently opposed the student organization's move to manage the students, causing a turmoil. He gains the ability of "slow light" to control gravity.

(Source: Comic Natalie, translated)
voice_actor_name: Kobayashi, Chiaki, Vestri, Alexander, Mills, Daman

name: Mizuho
about:
Mizuho has a self-paced and moody personality, and is isolated without actively trying to interact with others. She awakens to the ability of "Nyamazon" where three cats will bring whatever she wants.

(Source: Comic Natalie, translated)
voice_actor_name: Yuuki, Aoi, Nonato, Tuty, Ballard, Tia, Ponzanelli, Valca

name: Nagara
about:
Nagara is a third-year middle school student who is tired of his surroundings and feels like giving up on life.

He doesn't communicate well with his family and keeps a distance from the students around him, looking at others in a cold manner. It is unknown at this time what kind of ability he had revealed when he was drifting.

(Source: Official Site, translated)
voice_actor_name: Ichikawa, Aoi, Bertolucci, Daniel, Snow, Derick, Leguizamo, Elliot

name: Nozomi
about:
She has a strong will to never bend, no matter how difficult the situation. She has the ability of a "compass" that allows her to see a light that indicates one point wherever she is.

(Source: Comic Natalie, translated)
voice_actor_name: Oonishi, Saori, Cunha, Maitê, Christian, Luci, de Anda, Ximena

name: Aki-sensei
voice_actor_name: Kakuma, Ai, Nishimura, Trina, Barragán, Alicia

name: Cap
about:
Cap is one of the members of the Student Council alongside Pony and Hoshi.

(Source: Sonny Boy Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Ueda, Youji, Conradi, Guilherme, Seitz, Patrick, Allende, David

name: Futatsuboshi
voice_actor_name: Matsuno, Taiki, Selim, Erick, de Barros, Guilherme

name: Hayato
voice_actor_name: Yamamoto, Shouta, Moreno, Victor, Matranga, David

name: Hime
voice_actor_name: Hikisaka, Rie, McClain, Meg, Stteger, Luana

name: Hoshi
about:
Hoshi is one of the members of the Student Council.

Since he is not very tall and very lanky he looks like a child, he has long black hair and dark blue eyes. What is striking about Hoshi is his star-shaped birthmark on his left cheek and his permanent grin. Like the other male students, he most often wears a white shirt with a blue tie. 


Hoshi is inscrutable, very calm and incredibly mature. He is held in high esteem by the others, and people are happy to turn to him for help or advice. Hoshi makes a friendly impression and interacts a lot with other students, but this is deceptive because he is very manipulative, he has no regard for others and seems to have other goals. He is incredibly firm and sees himself as superior to others, so he likes to shoo others around him. 

Hoshi has an ability called Hope , which allows him to show visions to others that he has created himself. To make use of his abilities, he folds his hands as if he were praying. The visions he plants in others are usually horrific and include content such as death and destruction, he uses these to get others to cooperate with him.

(Source: Sonny Boy Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Naitou, Ami, Santana, Marina, McKeand, Ry, Delint, Alex

name: Ikkei
about:
Age: 30 years old
Blood type: AB
Birthday: February 6th
Height: 170 cm
Favorite things: painful things, spicy things
Things I'm not good at: … ♬
Nursery rank: ★★


Kitsune (Fox) Class's vice homeroom teacher.

Ikkei is a dangerous person whose greatest pleasure is being toyed with by the children.

He is good at playing the piano and dreamed of being a pianist prior to becoming a nursery teacher. He is an alcoholic with no sense of taste, so he puts Tabasco on everything.

Yoshi Yoshi Magic: It hurts, it hurts, it's good~ Yoshi Yoshi

He removes the pain by transplanting the wound to himself.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

name: Jun
about:
Age: 22 years old
Blood type: A
Birthday: March 30
Height: 175 cm
Favorite things: Children's smiles
Things I'm not good at: Fine work, good magic control
Nursery rank: No stars


Koguma (Bear Cub) Class's vice homeroom teacher.

Jun is a bright and honest novice nursery teacher at Kirameki Hiyokkoko Kindergarten. He is highly conscious as a nursery teacher and is enthusiastic about work. However, he is a little careless and often spins around.

He always carries a key chain with the crest of the preschool that was given to him by his grandfather as a talisman.

Specialty Yoshi Yoshi Magic: Yoshi Yoshi Smile

He can warm the heart of any child in any situation.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

name: Kai
about:
Age: 20 years old
Blood type: O
Birthday: September 4th
Height: 188 cm
Favorite things: cute things
Things I'm not good at: Laughing well
Nursery rank: ★


Usagi (Rabbit) Class's vice homeroom teacher.

Contrary to his roguish appearance, Kai is serious, blunt, and sometimes air-headed. He's been misunderstood for a long time because he doesn't speak very much and has a scary appearance. However, in reality, Kai is desperately practicing how to make a smile. He is good at exercising in general and actually loves cute things.

Yoshi Yoshi Magic: I'm on your side! Yoshi Yoshi

He will always be on your side.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

name: Low
about:
Age : ? 
Blood type: O
Birthday: November 22nd
Height: 185 cm
Favorite things: research, sweets, glitter chick garden
Things I'm not good at: your sad face
Nursery rank: ★★★


Kitsune (Fox) Class's homeroom teacher.

Former scientist and veteran nursery teacher. He studied Yoshi Yoshi Magic and was involved in the development of android nursery teachers at the start of the development of Yoshi Yoshi Magic...

As a nursery teacher, he retired from the front line, and now he is quietly watching over Hiyokkoko that is seemingly becoming destroyed.

Yoshi Yoshi Magic: Relax Yoshi Yoshi

He can calm someone when they are angry or hysterical.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

name: Sana
about:
Age: 28 years old
Blood type: B
Birthday: June 24th
Height: 182 cm
Favorite things: Nap
Things I'm not good at: Noisy things, busy things
Nursery rank: ★★★


Koguma (Bear Cub) Class's homeroom teacher.

Although Sana has a habit of slacking off and loves taking naps, he is actually an excellent nursery teacher who can use Yoshi Yoshi Magic. Every time he takes a nap with the kindergarten children, Jun gets angry. Until last year, he was at the elite Junior Kingdom Preschool...

Yoshi Yoshi Magic: Good Night Yoshi Yoshi

Sana can lead any child to a healthy sleep instantly.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

name: Vi
about:
Age: 29 years old
Blood type: B
Birthday: August 16th
Height: 172 cm
Favorite thing: myself
Things I'm not good at: ball games, making friends
Nursery rank: ★★★


Usagi (Rabbit) Class's homeroom teacher.

Vi is a baby-faced narcissist with a high pride, who proclaims himself as the princess of the preschool world. He doesn't doubt himself as a cute and talented nursery teacher. Although he has perfect abilities, his attitude sometimes comes off as sickening. Vi is good at dancing and has been dancing since childhood.

Yoshi Yoshi Magic: Yoshi Yoshi Motivation

Vi can motivate children who don't want to do anything.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

name: Momonga
about:
Ainz Ooal Gown (アインズ・ウール・ゴウン), formerly known as Momonga (モモンガ), is the main protagonist of the Overlord series. He is the guild master of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.

A cautious and stingy person, Momonga always tries to plan and control details, avoiding any haphazard actions. Because he doesn't underestimate his opponents, he will usually overkill them. Since being transferred to a new world and becoming an actual Undead being, Momonga could feel himself becoming very cold and calculating, his emotions repressed.

Loyal to his friends and creations, since becoming Lord Ruler of Nazarick in the new world he acts with a certain degree of nobility for his devoted followers. Momonga only does things that will benefit Nazarick or himself, whether it's information or prestige. Although he does have a sense of justice and doesn't hate humans as much as his followers, he holds no attachment to them, and he feels nothing toward their deaths.


(Source: Overlord Wikia)
voice_actor_name: Hino, Satoshi, Guerrero, Chris, Aguilar, Víctor Hugo, Mena, Héctor, Silva, Dláigelles, Mendiant, Charles, Merluzzo, Maurizio
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Spanish, Spanish, Portuguese (BR), French, Italian

name: 10th Seat of the Black Scripture
voice_actor_name: Hoshino, Takanori, Gesteira, Carlos, Blanpain, Laurent

name: 11th Seat of the Black Scripture
voice_actor_name: Iwami, Manaka, Duran, Marisa, Lemineur, Cindy, Évanz, Simone

name: Aindra, Azuth
voice_actor_name: Kase, Yasuyuki, Valmont, Philippe, Abreu, Marco Antônio, Odetto, Fabrizio

name: Aindra, Lakyus Alvein Dale
name_kanji: ラキュース・アルベイン・デイル・アインドラ
about:
Lakyus is an adamantite ranked adventurer and the leader of Blue Rose. She is part of the nobility, friend of the Re-Estize Royal Family, and loyal to the people of Re-Estize Kingdom. She acts as a faith based magic caster and warrior priestess of her adventurer group.

She is described as a young woman that has long blonde hair with green eyes and pink lips that showed a healthy gleam. Her beauty falls short of Renner but overflows with a different charm.

Lakyus is a very bright person who enjoys adventuring with her friends. She sometimes acts weird like wearing apparently meaningless rings or fighting against her dark personality, making her other team members worry about her actually becoming evil. When Lakyus was a young girl, she decided to become an adventurer after hearing the adventure stories about Red Drop. She ran away from home to have an adventure, while she was still inexperienced, she was saved by Gagaran and the two became partners.

Lakyus becomes one of the strongest adventurers of the kingdom at the age of 19 for her near Heroic-level abilities. She is also one of the few users of revival magic.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Koshimizu, Ami, Victória, Cláudia, Saxton, Jad, Rochet, Bérangère, Pacotto, Emanuela

name: Ainzach, Pluton
name_kanji: プルトン・アインザック
about:
Pluton is the Guildmaster of the Adventurer Guild in E-Rantel. He is a middle-aged man that looks mighty and majestic. He is quite capable and vigorous. Exuding the atmosphere of a veteran warrior who has faced a hundred battles, Pluton is considered an outstanding warrior by human standards.

He meets with the mythril-ranked adventurer teams of E-Rantel: Kralgra, Sky Wolf, Rainbow, and Darkness, along with E-Rantel's mayor Panasolei Gruze Day Rettenmaier and Magic Caster Guildmaster Theo Lachesil to discuss the appearance of the powerful vampire Honyopenyoko.

(Source: Overlord Wikia)
voice_actor_name: Yamamoto, Kanehira, Williams, Kent, Meunier, Julien, Ciravolo, Natale, Vázquez, Mauricio, Parente, Ivan
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese (BR)

name: Albedo
about:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Floor Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervises the activities of the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above all the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the sister of Nigredo and Spinel. She was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist is a pair of black angel wings.

Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands, and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest. In combat, she wears an impressive black full plate armor with a unique helm and carries a battle-axe with her.

Like Shalltear, Albedo has a true form as a heteromorphic race NPC. Shalltear called her a "big mouthed gorilla" when they quarreled, so her true form may be quite large in size.

Extremely loyal and extremely in love, Albedo is completely infatuated with Momonga, often showing obsessive tendencies when it comes to his affairs. She is always vying for Momonga's affection, showcasing outbursts of jealousy whenever anyone else appears to be getting close to him. This is because the last thing Momonga did in Yggdrasil was to use his administrative privileges to edit her character history, adding the she is "madly in love" with him.

Among all the Guardians, Albedo is the most vocal when it comes to expressing opinions. She will openly denounce any statement or action deemed inappropriate, reaching the point where Momonga sometimes considers it an annoyance.

As the Overseer of the Floor Guardians, she is very levelheaded. Albedo can make calm and collected judgments that Ainz, sometimes, doesn't think of. She takes Ainz's orders as top priority and absolute, punishing anyone, even a Floor Guardian, who'd dare belittle his orders. Like many others in Nazarick, she absolutely loathes humans and views them as an inferior species.

In the web novel version, Albedo does not exist.


(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Hara, Yumi, Maxwell, Elizabeth, Marciano, Thayná, Macedo López, Guadalupe, Bachère, Valérie, Magnaghi, Debora
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), Spanish, French, Italian

name: Beiron, Ninya
about:
Ninya is a silver ranked adventurer, magic caster and strategist of the Swords of Darkness. His dream is to get one the swords of darkness but he must prioritize finding his older sister who was taken by a noble.

He has brown hair and blue eyes with a face that looked childish, the best looking face of the group. His skin is pale and he wears leather clothes.

Ninya is described as a humble and good person within the Swords of Darkness. Despite his good personality, he has a strong hatred to nobles as his older sister was taken by a noble when he was a mere villager. That is why he wants to become a stronger adventurer and is dedicated in bringing her back.


(Source: Overlord Wikia)
voice_actor_name: Tamura, Mutsumi, Michele, Agnes, Woodhull, Lara, Lecordier, Brigitte, Longo, Annalisa

name: Bloodfallen, Shalltear
name_kanji: シャルティア・ブラッドフォールン
about:
Height: 140cm (4'7")
Race: Heteromorphic Race, Undead, True Vampire
Occupation: 1st~3rd Floor Guardian
Karma: Negative 450 (Very~Extremely Evil)
Creator: Peroroncino

Shalltear is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino.

Shalltear has a very flirtatious personality and is very open with her sexual preferences, often to other characters' discomfort. Despite her apparent shamelessness, she can be quite innocent about certain things. She has a complex about her small figure, which she attempts to cover up by using breast pads.

As a true vampire, Shalltear is extremely proud and takes her position as a Floor Guardian very seriously. She has no patience for failure and will often burst into fits of rage at signs of an unfavorable situation. She will not hesitate to kill any servant who disappoints her; however, she will not punish others for failing in tasks that are impossible to begin with.

Shalltear is completely loyal to Momonga and is also a love rival to Albedo for his affections. She takes great joy in being able to prove her worth and fantasizes about the praise she expects to receive. When a situation doesn't go in her favor, she panics about the scolding she believes that she will get.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Uesaka, Sumire, Martínez, Azucena, Angelle, Felecia, Ruis, Carolina, Soares, Clara, Cherubelli, Laura
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, Spanish, English, Portuguese (BR), French, Italian

name: Climb
about:
Climb is the personal bodyguard and childhood friend of Princess Renner Theiere Chardelon Ryle Vaiself. He wants to become stronger for her sake. He wears pure white, full plate armor given to him by Renner and is equipped with a broadsword and a shield.

Climb is described as a hard-working and hot-blooded person, and has pledged absolute allegiance to Renner. For her sake, he trains tireless everyday to improve his swordsmanship as to repay her kindness. Because of the preferential treatment he receives from the princess, he has no close relationship with anyone but her. However, he has proven himself to be quite loyal and determined to protect those he cares about. If need be, he would even sacrifice his life for her.

He lived in Re-Estize during his childhood and encountered misfortune through his life. His parents were gone for unknown reasons when he was very young, and he became a street urchin living on whatever scraps of food he could find, living in an empty house where he was comfortable. Half starved and close to death, he was later saved and taken in by Renner.

Unfortunately, despite his constant training to become stronger, Climb has no special talent for the sword at all. He possessed a ring created through wild magic that can push a person's abilities to their limits. He has self-evaluated himself to be equivalent to a gold rank adventurer, holding a respectable amount of strength.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Oosaka, Ryouta, Lewin, Comona, Almeida, Lucas, Niverd, Victor, Vivolo, Ezio, Montaño, Emiliano, John von Freyend, Tobias
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, English, Portuguese (BR), French, Italian, Spanish, German

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Baraja, Neia
about:
Neia Baraja is a Squire serving in the Holy Kingdom Liberation Army. She is the daughter of Pavel Baraj, one of the members of the Nine Colors.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Bessarez, Calca
about:
The current holy king of the Holy Kingdom and the first queen in its history.
She is known as the "Holy Queen". Her beauty is said to be the nation's treasure.
Her good and compassionate personality has earned her the support of the people.
She has a natural talent as a magic caster and is considered one of the Holy Kingdom's greatest forces.

name: Bessarez, Caspond
name_kanji: カスポンド・ベサーレス

name: Custodio, Kelart
name_kanji: ケラルト・カストディオ

name: Custodio, Remedios
name_kanji: レメディオス・カストディオ
about:
Remedios Custodio was the grandmaster of the Roble Holy Kingdom's Paladin Order and a member of the Nine Colors.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: CZ2128 Delta
name_kanji: シーゼットニイチニハチ・デルタ/CZ2128・Δ
about:
CZ2128 is a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a short girl with red-gold straight long hair. She wears an eyepatch over her left eye, while her right eye has an emerald color and target-mark on the pupil. She wears accessories with military camouflage patterns. While her face is beautiful, she does not show her emotions and talks in a flat tone.

CZ2128 appears emotionless and has a silent nature. Her Karma is relatively high, which makes her, along with Yuri Alpha, one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Though she usually ignores conversations from humans, sometimes there is a possibility to communicate with her. She hates cannibalism and likes cute things, such as Eclair.

CZ2128's creator was one of the Supreme Beings, other than Tabula Smaragdina, responsible for the design of Treasury security systems. Thus her character settings are set to be familiar with Nazarick's mechanism unlocking methods.

In the web novel version, she was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Demiurge
about:
Dressed as gentleman, Demiurge is a floor guardian on the seventh floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick and the Commander of the NPC Defenses. He was created by Ulbert Alain Odle.

As a member of the Demon race, Demiurge is one of the cruelest members in Nazarick, taking great joy in the suffering of other races. He enthusiastically performs magic experiments on the prisoners sent to him, viewing them as nothing but toys, and enjoys inciting hateful feelings and treacherous thoughts among them.

Demiurge works closely with the other servants of Nazarick and is loyal to the creators, thinking of them as important companions. However, due to their conflicting personalities, he and Sebas Tian do not appear to get along well.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Picky
about: Picky is an NPC of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He normally works in the Restaurant of Nazarick, but on a specific day of the week, he manages a bar in the 9th Floor.

name: Aicler, Eclair Acleir
name_kanji: エクレア・エクレール・エイクレアー
about:
An assistant butler in the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

Eclair has an appearance of a rockhopper penguin. He moves in shuffling steps, so he is always carried by another servant when he wants to get around. He was created by Ankoro Mocchi Mochi. His personality settings were set to have the desire to conquer Nazarick as a joke.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Albedo
about:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Floor Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervises the activities of the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above all the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the sister of Nigredo and Spinel. She was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist is a pair of black angel wings.

Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands, and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest. In combat, she wears an impressive black full plate armor with a unique helm and carries a battle-axe with her.

Like Shalltear, Albedo has a true form as a heteromorphic race NPC. Shalltear called her a "big mouthed gorilla" when they quarreled, so her true form may be quite large in size.

Extremely loyal and extremely in love, Albedo is completely infatuated with Momonga, often showing obsessive tendencies when it comes to his affairs. She is always vying for Momonga's affection, showcasing outbursts of jealousy whenever anyone else appears to be getting close to him. This is because the last thing Momonga did in Yggdrasil was to use his administrative privileges to edit her character history, adding the she is "madly in love" with him.

Among all the Guardians, Albedo is the most vocal when it comes to expressing opinions. She will openly denounce any statement or action deemed inappropriate, reaching the point where Momonga sometimes considers it an annoyance.

As the Overseer of the Floor Guardians, she is very levelheaded. Albedo can make calm and collected judgments that Ainz, sometimes, doesn't think of. She takes Ainz's orders as top priority and absolute, punishing anyone, even a Floor Guardian, who'd dare belittle his orders. Like many others in Nazarick, she absolutely loathes humans and views them as an inferior species.

In the web novel version, Albedo does not exist.


(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Alpha, Yuri
name_kanji: ユリ・アルファ / yuri・α
about:
Yuri is the vice-captain of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a beauty with an intelligent look, wearing glasses and a choker. She wears her hair tied into a low-cropped bun at the back of her head. Lacking a metal plate in front of her skirt, her dress emphasizes mobility rather than defense. She is equipped with spiked gauntlets.

As shown in her karma value, Yuri is good-hearted and one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Thus, she felt relief when Ainz said not to kill humans without proper reason. When given permission to do as she pleases, she chooses to help people in destitution. She uses "boku" as a first-person pronoun when speaking in private, revealing a somewhat childish nature.

Her behavior is strict like a teacher's. Due to her personality, she often works as a chairperson.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Beta, Lupusregina
name_kanji: ルプスレギナ・ベータ
about:
Lupusreginais a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a brown-skinned beauty with a sporty look and red hair tied in two long braids. Lupusregina wears a maid uniform with short sleeves and long black gloves, with a skirt that has a long slit on it's left side, revealing thigh high white stockings. She is equipped with an imposing black and silver scepter slung across her back.

Lupusregina has a very bright and outgoing personality but is also able to conduct herself like a perfect lady. She is sociable and friendly toward humans, though it is only a mask to conceal her brutal and cunning personality. She also likes to make lewd jokes.

She had a tendency to suddenly appear behind people and disappear without notice.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Bloodfallen, Shalltear
name_kanji: シャルティア・ブラッドフォールン
about:
Height: 140cm (4'7")
Race: Heteromorphic Race, Undead, True Vampire
Occupation: 1st~3rd Floor Guardian
Karma: Negative 450 (Very~Extremely Evil)
Creator: Peroroncino

Shalltear is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino.

Shalltear has a very flirtatious personality and is very open with her sexual preferences, often to other characters' discomfort. Despite her apparent shamelessness, she can be quite innocent about certain things. She has a complex about her small figure, which she attempts to cover up by using breast pads.

As a true vampire, Shalltear is extremely proud and takes her position as a Floor Guardian very seriously. She has no patience for failure and will often burst into fits of rage at signs of an unfavorable situation. She will not hesitate to kill any servant who disappoints her; however, she will not punish others for failing in tasks that are impossible to begin with.

Shalltear is completely loyal to Momonga and is also a love rival to Albedo for his affections. She takes great joy in being able to prove her worth and fantasizes about the praise she expects to receive. When a situation doesn't go in her favor, she panics about the scolding she believes that she will get.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Cocytus
about:
Cocytus is the floor guardian of the fifth floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He is a hybrid between a mantis and an ant. He was created by Takemikazuchi.

Having an enormous body size of 2.5m, Cocytus has the appearance of an insect walking on two feet—a fusion between a mantis and an ant.

With a tail twice as long as his height, Cocytus is covered with sharp spikes like icicles and has a strong jaw that can easily snap people's hands. Two of his hands hold a silver halberd, while the remaining two hands hold a mace emitting black light and a crooked shape sheath which seems to be for a broadsword. With a breathtaking cold air, the pale blue, hardened bone armor oozes out diamond dust like bright light. His shoulders and back look like an uplifted iceberg.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: CZ2128 Delta
name_kanji: シーゼットニイチニハチ・デルタ/CZ2128・Δ
about:
CZ2128 is a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a short girl with red-gold straight long hair. She wears an eyepatch over her left eye, while her right eye has an emerald color and target-mark on the pupil. She wears accessories with military camouflage patterns. While her face is beautiful, she does not show her emotions and talks in a flat tone.

CZ2128 appears emotionless and has a silent nature. Her Karma is relatively high, which makes her, along with Yuri Alpha, one of the two "safe" Pleiades to humans. Though she usually ignores conversations from humans, sometimes there is a possibility to communicate with her. She hates cannibalism and likes cute things, such as Eclair.

CZ2128's creator was one of the Supreme Beings, other than Tabula Smaragdina, responsible for the design of Treasury security systems. Thus her character settings are set to be familiar with Nazarick's mechanism unlocking methods.

In the web novel version, she was created by Tabula Smaragdina.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Demiurge
about:
Dressed as gentleman, Demiurge is a floor guardian on the seventh floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick and the Commander of the NPC Defenses. He was created by Ulbert Alain Odle.

As a member of the Demon race, Demiurge is one of the cruelest members in Nazarick, taking great joy in the suffering of other races. He enthusiastically performs magic experiments on the prisoners sent to him, viewing them as nothing but toys, and enjoys inciting hateful feelings and treacherous thoughts among them.

Demiurge works closely with the other servants of Nazarick and is loyal to the creators, thinking of them as important companions. However, due to their conflicting personalities, he and Sebas Tian do not appear to get along well.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

name: Epsilon, Solution
name_kanji: ソリュシャン・イプシロン
about:
Solution is a member of the "Pleiades Six Stars," the battle maid squad of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

She is a blonde beauty with spiral curls and clothing that emphasizes sex appeal. She is said to rival the most beautiful woman in Re-Estize Kingdom, the Golden Princess. As her race is slime, she can change her appearance as she wishes.

Solution thinks of humans as food and toys. She loves to swallow humans alive and enjoys the suffering and struggling of her victims. She does not like the screams of humans so she shuts her victims' throat with her body. She is, with Narberal Gamma, one of the two "extremely dangerous" Pleiades.

She is also good at disguising her nature, acting like a childish and rude lady when she was out to get information with Sebas Tian. It seems that her true nature is quite logical, suggested by her complaint about inefficient behaviors of Sebas or Entoma.

(Source: Overlord Wiki)

about: Ryouma Takebayashi is the main protagonist of Kami-tachi ni Hirowareta Otoko. He is hardworking, is kind and helpful toward others and gets slightly nervous when praised. Ryouma is also obsessed with slimes and keeps them as pets, trying to find and create new types of slime whenever possible.

nicknames: Haruto Amakawa, Black Knight, Haru-kun, Rio Karasuki
about:
Rio is a boy living in the slums who wants revenge for his mother who was murdered in front of him when he was five years old.

He has inherited the memories of his last life as Haruto Amakawa.

name: Aishia
about: Rio's spirit. She's always helped Rio.

name: Ayase, Miharu
about: Haruto's childhood friend.

name: Latifa
about: An assassin sent to kill Rio after he leaves the kingdom.

Sex: Male
Age: around 34 years old
Date of birth: November 30 - 1983

A middle-aged man who woke up from coma after 17 years, but actually went to another world during that time.

(Source: Isekai Ojisan Wiki and Wikipedia)

He is genuinely interested in Yōsuke's adventure in the other world, especially about the girls he encountered through his journey, but his uncle's aromantic personality sometimes turn him off.

(Source: Isekai Ojisan Wiki and Wikipedia)

After finding out about Yousuke's magic ability the moment she came into Takafumi's apartment, she starts spending her days at Takafumi's apartment and together, they spend their days watching replays of Yousuke's adventures in the other world.

(Source: Isekai Ojisan Wiki and Wikipedia)

name: Diafell, Diana
name_kanji: ディアナ ・ ディア フェル
about:
Originally an office worker who was reincarnated as Diana. The villainess of her favorite otome game, and Sirius being her favorite prince.

(Source: Official site)

name: Iver, Sirius
name_kanji: シリウス・イヴェール
about:
He is the Prince of the Kingdom of Hiver. He has a straightforward, unpretentious, and loyal disposition, and is the protagonist's fiancé. 

(Source: otakumode.com)

name: Diafell, Spica
name_kanji: スピカ デ ィアフェル

Diana's cousin.

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

about:
A positive heroine who appears in the game with a strong sense of justice.

(Source: official site)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Degurechaff, Tanya
name_kanji: ターニャ・デグレチャフ
about: Tanya Degurechaff is a cute, adorable and pretty-good looking little girl. But deep inside, she is highly power-hungry, amoral, ruthless, sadistic and hot-tempered. Especially when she is in battle against her enemies, she shows utter ruthlessness and bloodlust just to accomplish her missions. Tanya also strongly disapproves of failure and disobedience from her subordinates. She is loyal to her own job and always wants to finish it as soon as possible. Tanya will never let anyone discriminate her appearance because of how fast she goes through the ranks in the military.

name: Serebryakova, Viktoriya Ivanovna
name_kanji: ヴィクトーリヤ・イヴァーノヴナ・セレブリャコーフ
about:
Viktoriya Ivanovna Serebryakova is a mage and a conscript in the Empire's army, and in the past were a member of Platoon 3 under Tanya's leadership. After that, she joined the new Wing Battalion named "V601" to serve as Tanya's adjutant.

(Source: Youjo Senki Wikia)

name: von Lergen, Erich
about: He is knowledgeable, diligent, and thoughtful on his duties. He has extraordinary observations of various departments during the War College conference and received high evaluations even in the General Staff. Hence, he was able to see through Tanya's true nature and thought of her as a monster.

name: von Rudersdorf, Kurt
about: Imperial Army General, Chief of Operations. A wonderful and involved soldier, able to plan out large scale strategies as well as finely tune precise operations towards success. Friend of Zettour, Chief of Staff.

name: von Zettour, Hans
about: Imperial Army General, Chief of Staff. A rationalist boasting enormous knowledge. Cooperates with Rudersdorf, Chief of Operations, to plan and implement strategies.

name: Degurechaff, Tanya
name_kanji: ターニャ・デグレチャフ
about: Tanya Degurechaff is a cute, adorable and pretty-good looking little girl. But deep inside, she is highly power-hungry, amoral, ruthless, sadistic and hot-tempered. Especially when she is in battle against her enemies, she shows utter ruthlessness and bloodlust just to accomplish her missions. Tanya also strongly disapproves of failure and disobedience from her subordinates. She is loyal to her own job and always wants to finish it as soon as possible. Tanya will never let anyone discriminate her appearance because of how fast she goes through the ranks in the military.

name: Bientot, Severin
about: Severin Bientot is Captain of the 2nd Mage Squadron of the Francois Republic. His Mage Squadron is famous as the elite Special Forces.

name: de Lugo, Pierre-Michel
name_kanji: ピエール・ミシェル＝ド・ルーゴ
about: Pierre-Michel de Lugo is the Vice Minister of Defense and Armies of the Francois Republic.

name_kanji: ヴォーレン・グランツ

about: Wilibald Koenig is the 3rd Company commander of V601 under the command of Tanya Degurechaff.

name: Neumann, Rhiner
about: Rhiner Neumann is serving as the 4th Company Commander of V601 under the command of Tanya Degurechaff.

name: von Lergen, Erich

He has extraordinary observations of various departments during the War College conference and received high evaluations even in the General Staff. Hence, he was able to see through Tanya's true nature and thought of her as a monster.

name: von Ugar, Maximilian Johann
name_kanji: マクシミリアン・ヨハン・フォン・ウーガ
about: Maximilian Johann von Ugar is a classmate and rival of Tanya Degurechaff in their class during War College Arc. He hails from a plain family, and had a newborn daughter in 1924. After graduating from War College, their friendship goes on, and Tanya gains personal connections with him, which helps her many times afterwards.

name: von Zettour, Hans
about: Imperial Army General, Chief of Staff. A rationalist boasting enormous knowledge. Cooperates with Rudersdorf, Chief of Operations, to plan and implement strategies.

name: Aerial
about:
The Queen of Wind spirits who becomes bonded to Taichi. Originally she introduces herself as a simple Wind spirit named Aerial, but as Taichi's power rises, she finally evolves into her true identity.

(Source: Isekai Chiito Majutsushi Wiki)

name: Anastasia
about:
She has greenish-yellow hair with clear blue eyes. She is introduced in a black cloak with a hood, but once she was captured and later released she wore a revealing green dress with blue earrings and cloth "arm covers?"

(Source: Isekai Cheat Magician Wiki)

name: Lemiya
about:
Lemiya is known as the magician of fallen leaves and is a top-tier magician. Everyone around the world knows who she is due to her magical prowess, so it’s not an exaggeration to say that she’s one of the top magicians in the world. Currently, she resides in a forest located on the outskirts of the frontier town, Azpire. Lemiya enjoys researching magic and cooking. She also is teaching Myura about magic. She is also a Triple Magician.

(Source: Isekai Cheat Magician Wiki)

name: Myura
about:
Myura is an elf and an apprentice of Remia. Myura is a preeminent magician who has mastered control over both fire and earth magic. She's also very proficient with a sword. Myura is so skilled that she can undertake A-rank missions and requests for adventurers.

(Source: Isekai Cheat Magician Wiki)

name: Tempest, Veldora
name_kanji: ヴェルドラ＝テンペスト
about:
Race: High-Ranking Holy Magic Spirit (Dragon-kin)
Divine protection: Divine Protection of Demon Lord
Title: Storm Dragon
Magic: Unnecessary
Ability:
Resistance: Physical Damage Nullification, Nature Effects Nullification, Status, Change Nullification, Spirit Attack Resistance, Holy Magic Attack Resistance

The Youngest Brother of the Four Strongest Dragon-kin. Connected with Rimuru by an agreement. Has ability that surpassed Demon Lord, A "Catastrophe Class" Monster.

Storm dragon Veldora. Rimuru's first friend and the one that gave him his name. He also received name "Tempest" by Rimuru, thus becoming Veldora Tempest.
voice_actor_name: Maeno, Tomoaki, Matthys, Nicolas, Rager, Chris, Bressan, Mattia

name: Charys
about:
Charys, formerly known as Ifrit, is a greater spirit; the ruler of flames which was sealed within Shizue Izawa by Demon Lord Leon Cromwell.

He used to live in Dwelling of the Spirit before he was stolen by the "Platinum Devil" Leon Cromwell. After that, he was sealed within Shizue Izawa. As a result of this, it gave Shizue an extended lifespan.



Abilities:
Charys as Ifrit was a greater spirit with a rank that of Special A.

A maelstrom of flames surrounds the Flame Giant, protecting it at all times. The heat of these flames are so intense that an attack like Rimuru's water blade evaporates before it even makes contact.

After being named and evolved, his magicules exploded and is said to be greater than unawakened demon lords such as Frey or Carrion.

Skills:
Fire Manipulation
Combustion
Ranged Barrier
Body Double
Flare Circle

Trivia
The name "Ifrit" comes from the supernatural creature of the same name in Middle Eastern stories and commonly associated with fire.

(Source: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)

name: Ascart, Nicol
about:
Element: Wind

Son of the prime minister and childhood friend of Gerald and Alan.

name: Ascart, Sophia
name_kanji: ソフィア・アスカルト
about: Sister of Nicol, who is very protective of her. Her white hair and skin and red eyes have caused many to call her "disgusting and a cursed child." She shares a passion for novels with Katrina, who befriends her and raises her confidence. She also has magic powers.

name: Claes, Catarina
about:
Birthday: June 24
Position: Eldest daughter of a duke
Personality: Pure and dense
Magic Element: Earth

He is sent to the parallel reality after dying from acute stress reaction, forcing Aqua to come with him after she irritates him with her attitude. Kazuma is classed as an Adventurer which, despite being the lowest ranked class, allows him to learn various skills from other classes, albeit at an increased cost. With his ability, Kazuma learns basic skills such as stealing, archery, monster detection, and basic magic.

name: Suzuki, Iruma
about:
Iruma Suzuki is a 14-year-old human boy who is sent to the netherworld when his selfish parents sell him to a demon named Sullivan. He is a cheerful and mild-natured boy who has a habit of being a pushover and unable to turn down an earnest request.

Sullivan asks Iruma to be his grandson and enrolls him in the Babyls Demon School, where he is placed in the Misfit class along with his classmates, Asmodeus Alice and Clara Valac. Terrified of being found out as a human and being eaten, Iruma must learn to adjust to his new life in the netherworld and blend in with his demon classmates at school.

Possession: Gluttonous feeder ring
Familiar: Professor Kalego

name: Agares, Picero
about: Agares wears the typical school uniform except for the bow leaving his coat open. His sleeves are either longer than normal or simply too long for his arms, reaching up to his knuckles. Under his coat is what seems like a buttoned-up pajama shirt with sleeves reaching farther than his coat. He also doesn't wear any shoes, revealing his white socks. On his head he has what's either a self-conscious eye mask (probably like a familiar) or some sort of eyeglass akin to scuba goggles. He also has pointy ears, fangs that sometimes stick out, hair that is curly on the ends and is shaped like a cone, and wings.

name: Alicred
about:
The physical embodiment of the Ring of Gluttony.

In its first form as a ghost-like appearance, it did not have any defining attitude but was only gluttonous, and very cranky as it screamed loudly that all that were present in the school had heard the cry, much to their dismay. It was shown to have mellowed out thanks to Clara Valac's lullaby.

Alicred eventually gained intelligence, and with it came a playful personality. However, Alicred still holds its protective nature over Iruma. 

(Source: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun Wiki)

name: Ami, Kirio
about:
When he was a child, Kirio's magic power capacity was measured and found to be none, which worried and disappointed his family as their household was known for their notably high power capacity.

He was then sent to Demon Children's Garden, an elementary correctional institution that raises and exerts full control over young demons. There, he experiences a strict and harsh environment as he was told he was dirtying his family name and was bullied for it. Amidst the negativity in the garden, he met and befriended a girl around his age at that time who was similar to him in terms of grades. She let him touch her charm, her grandmother's earring, which she said would make him feel more cheerful. However, the bullies took it and threw it off the cliff. Kirio managed to catch it with his barrier, but it broke as he lost focus and the earring fell while the girl watched in despair. After the incident, the girl quit the Garden while Kirio was forced to remain by his parents.



(Source: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun Wiki)

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)

name: Daikenja
about:
Name: Great Sage (Daikenja)


Entity Type: Unique Skill

Appearance:
Great Sage does not possess a physical form. It exists as an inner voice or consciousness within the wielder, providing unparalleled guidance and analytical abilities.

Background:
Great Sage is a highly sophisticated and unique skill acquired by Rimuru Tempest upon his reincarnation into the Jura Forest as a slime. This skill manifested as an advanced, sentient form of intelligence, designed to aid and guide Rimuru through his journey in this fantastical world.

Role and Contributions:

Advisor and Strategist:
Great Sage serves as the primary advisor to Rimuru, offering insights and strategies to navigate complex situations. Its analytical prowess allows for informed decision-making, ensuring Rimuru can effectively manage both peaceful and combative scenarios.

Skill Enhancement and Evolution:
Great Sage plays a crucial role in enhancing Rimuru's abilities. Over time, it evolves into the Ultimate Skill Raphael, significantly amplifying its capabilities and support functions.

Combat and Defense:
In combat, Great Sage is indispensable. It devises tactics, analyzes opponents' weaknesses, and suggests optimal strategies. This ensures that Rimuru can utilize his vast array of skills and powers to their fullest potential.

Knowledge and Information Processing:
Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.



Significance:
Great Sage is the cornerstone of Rimuru Tempest's success and growth. Its guidance and support are instrumental in Rimuru's rise from a simple slime to a powerful leader and protector. Great Sage embodies the blend of intellect, strategy, and emotional support, making it an indispensable part of Rimuru's journey and the thriving nation he builds.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)

Makoto Misumi is one of the three World Travelers who got sent to the Goddess's World.

Tsukuyomi, the Moon God of Earth who worked as the middleman for the completion of the contract, helped Makoto and provided him with his blessing and told him to be free and live as he wishes to.

name: Fran
about:
Fran is a black cat beastkin that embarked on a journey with her parents in order to search for a way to evolve. However her parents eventually passed away and she got enslaved as a result.

Due to various circumstances, she crossed paths with the sentient sword and they both freed each other. Since the enslaving process robbed her of her name, the sword bestowed unto her the name "Fran," as that was how her parents called her. In return, Fran named the sword Shishio/Master, since he saved and taught her many things. She also gains a darkness wolf familiar named Urushi.

She loves curry.
voice_actor_name: Kakuma, Ai, Molano, Melissa, Cuscusa, Veronica, Wurmer, Lara

name: Shishou
about:
A former japanese reincarnated into a mysterious sword which slept on a pedestal in the middle of some hidden ruins. After "awakening," the sword quickly learned to both move and fight on its own by using magic, and that it had the ability to absorb a monster's core to raise its strength.

After building up some power, it grew bored and decided to depart the ruins to explore new lands, but got stuck on a mana-depleting zone and lost its freedom for several weeks. Eventually, a black cat beastkin slave found it by chance while fleeing from a monster and the sword helped her regain her freedom. As a result both decided to continue together and the sword bestowed the girl with a name (Fran) and a contract which shares its abilities with her. Fran in return named the sword Shishou (Master).

Shishou eventually also summons a familiar and names it Urushi, which ends up as Fran's familiar as well.

He also gains the ability to create doppelgangers of himself, which look like his former human self.



(Source: Novel/Manga)

name: Amanda
about:
Known across the continent as Amanda of Hariti, she is an extremely famous and powerful A-ranked Adventurer of Altessa and a whip user. Often wild and unpredictable while exaggerating her emotions, she tends to be laid back and cheerful.

A guardian of children, Amanda has several orphanages under her protection. She had raised two orphaned Black Catkin children who grew up to become adventurers themselves and had a child together.

A bit of a tomboy who went to officers school and graduated becoming an officer rank in the military. She trained under Georg Carmine the general of the army.

name: Souma, Kazuya
nicknames: Souma A. Elfrieden, The Recruitment Maniac, Other-world Hero
about:
Age: 19

Before he entered the university, he was summoned to another world as a hero, but with the previous King Albert's authoritative pronouncement he became the King of Elfrieden.

(Source: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Kobayashi, Yuusuke, Campos, Fábio, Saab, Alejandro, Rosenberg, Marco

name: Amidonia, Julius
name_kanji: ユリウス・アミドニア
about:
Julius Amidonia, later renamed as Julius Lastania (ユリウス・ラスタニア), is the exiled, unofficial ruler of Amidonia before its annex. He is the son of the late Gaius Amidonia and older brother of Roroa Amidonia.


Julius was a vain, egotistical individual, and had dreams of grandeur and conquest. Though not as hot-headed as his father, he did share the same ideals. However, his ability to govern a country was severely lacking as he did not understand the needs of the Amidonian citizens, nor was he able to solve domestic issues, since, like his father, he followed a 'military first' outlook.

His personality becomes a bit more subdued after the disastrous invasion of Elfrieden and the annexation of his country. He initially held a large grudge against Kazuya for his defeat and for taking away his country and birthright.



(Source: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Nojima, Kenji, Matranga, David, Mello, Vitor, Torres, Carlos

name: Amidonia, Roroa
about:
Roroa Amidonia is the daughter of Gaius Amidonia and the younger sister of Julius Amidonia.

Roroa has a keen sense of business and economics causing a rift between her and her militaristic father who ignored the economic development of Amidonia. She agreed with many of the realistic views and ideas of Kazuya Souma.
 
 She is normally very cheerful and tends to speak in merchant slang.

(Source: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Ichimichi, Mao, Almeida, Marcella, Saxton, Jad, González, Desireé

name: Arcs, Ludwin
voice_actor_name: Furukawa, Makoto, Mills, Daman, Fernandes, Samuel, Meléndez, Alberto

name: Camus, Ginger
about: A new slave trader who inherited his grandfather's business. He educated his slaves in reading, writing, and arithmetic in the hopes of selling them to reputable individuals who wouldn't see them as disposable and would treat them well.

name: Carmine, Georg
name_kanji: ゲオルグ・カーマイン
voice_actor_name: Kusunoki, Taiten, Stimac, Marcus D., Santos, Vagner

name: Doma, Juna
nicknames: Juna Souma, Lady Canaria, Prima Lorelei
about: A blue-haired girl who is called the descendant of Lorelei. 19 years old. She possessed a voice that did not betray her beautiful looks which is how she was introduced to Souma when he held the Talent Recruitment.
voice_actor_name: Ueda, Reina, Souza, Jacque, Mendoza, Itzel, Garrett, Morgan, Schreier, Nadine

name: Elfrieden, Elisha
name_kanji: エリシャ・エルフリーデン
about:
Elisha was the actual successor to the throne of Elfrieden Kingdom, being the last surviving member of the Elfrieden Royal through the Succession Crisis after the death of the 12th King of Elfrieden. She eventually marries "Albert" giving him her family name with it and the role of 13th King of Elfrieden.

In her youth, Elisha was tomboyish for a princess, often taking risks and acting unlike a princess. At the time, she was certain that given her station she was never a actual contender for the throne of Elfrieden. After the first instance of her magic sending memories back to her, she became much more reserved and pragmatic, acting more like a princess despite her desires as she wished to remain alive more. During the events of the succession crisis, she routinely received memories from future-selves and would mentally spiral into a depressive state. It was not until she decided to chose Albert that she began to have hope for the value of her own life again. She was resistant to succeeding the throne, and would force it upon her husband. She remained a devoted supporter through Albert's reign and was a motivating factor behind Kazuya's ascension to the throne. While she is still generally reserved and quiet, she is a doting grandmother to Cian and Kazuha.

(Source: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Inoue, Kikuko, Munoz, Anastasia, Morais, Ana Maria

name: Elfrieden, Albert
name_kanji: アルベルト・エルフリーデン
about:
Albert is the former king of Elfrieden and thus has some knowledge of high level government secrets.

Albert is kind and caring but indecisive and weak as a leader. He loves his family and deeply cares about the nation but his poor leadership and indecisiveness resulted in the Elfrieden Kingdom eroding.

(Source: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Mugihito, Silverstein, Keith, Leite, Roberto, Reyero, Gerardo

name: Dautriche, Aileen Lauren
name_kanji: アイリーン・ローレン・ドートリシュ
about: She has been reborn into the world of an otome game as the villainess, Irene. Using her memories of her former life, she recognizes flags indicating she's en-route to the bad end, so she makes a plan to conquer the last boss (the evil king Claude), make him her lover, and see if she can open up a new route!

name: Elmir, Claude Jeanne
name_kanji: クロード・ジャンヌ・エルメイア
about:
Claude is a former crown prince of the kingdom and was prince Cedric's brother from another mother. He is the long awaited rebirth of a demon king with red eyes and immense power. He is beloved by all monsters and any changes to his emotions can cause the weather to change or flowers to wilt or bloom. 

He had been the target of numerous assassination attempts in his youth but all of it failed due to the intervention of monsters. However, when he was 10 years old, he was forced to abdicate from the succession of the throne due to people fearing his power and persecuting him. Thus, he was moved away from the royal castle to an abandoned one.

name: Cretia, Liselotte
name_kanji: リーゼロッテ＝クレティア
about:
Liselotte Cretia is the youngest child and the only daughter of Duke Cretia Family, a prominent Noble household on Galwark Kingdom. She is the top most sought noble daughter in the whole country.

She graduated from the royal academy by skipping grade several times, build a business that grow into an international enterprises famous in neighboring countries, become a governor and develop a city that she got from her parents into one of the most prosperous city in the kingdom, all while she still just 15 years old.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Huguenot, Gustave
name_kanji: ギュスターヴ=ユグノー

Current head of Hugenot family, in his forties, total number of wifes unknown, total number of childen unknown, at least Stead, Stead's little brother and Latifa, his objective is to be the noble with more influence in the Bertram kingdom, he was the one who pressured the royal academy to falsify what happened to Flora as Rio trying to kill her in order to protect his influence in the kingdom, he sent Latifa to kill Rio,by Latifa's words her assassination targets were near the two digits already.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

about:
Olivia is an honor student at the academy. She was the protagonist of the original otome game. She is also the Saint of the Holfort Kingdom in the otome game. 

She is by all means a modest girl who is very kind and gentle with people. She dislikes gambling. As a commoner, she's often shocked if not stressed on how most things around her are so expensive & luxurious.

Despite her kindness and modesty, she lacks a consistent amount of self-confidence, which most likely stems from how she is a commoner who attends a school that is dominantly populated by nobles who mostly look down on her.

Race: Human

17 (Arc 3)

1-15 (Arc 1)

Hair Color: Chestnut Brown (novel description / manga)
Orange (novel illustration / anime)

Eye Color: Deep Blue-green (novel description)
Gold (novel illustration / anime)
Red (manga)

William G. Maryblood (ウィリアム・G・マリーブラッド) is a lone human from the City of the Dead, born with vague memories of a past life and raised by the group of undead until the age of adulthood. He swore an oath to Gracefeel and leaves to explore the outside world to extend his hand to those in need and restore the faith in his guardian deity.

(Source: The Faraway Paladin Wiki)

name: Azusa
name_kanji: アズサ / 相沢 梓
about:
The protagonist. Commonly known as "the Witch of the Highlands." A girl who was reincarnated as an unaging undying witch with the body of a seventeen-year-old. Since she died of overwork in our world, she's especially sensitive to labor conditions.

(Source: Volume 1 character info)

name: Falfa
about: A slime spirit born from the combined spirits of slain slimes. Becomes Azusa's adopted daughter. Her younger sister is Shalsha.

name: Halkara
about:
A young elf woman and Azusa's second apprentice. She's seventeen and 2,500 months old. She has a figure anyone would enjoy and a brilliant mind that made her Nutri-Spirits a hit...but she's rather lacking in several other aspects.

(Source: Volume 1 character information)

name: Laika
about:
A dragon girl apprenticed to Azusa. Originally proud of her strength, but since Azusa defeated her, she turned over a new leaf. Conscientious, very serious, and cares a lot about what people think.

(Source: Volume 1 character info)

name: Shalsha
about: A slime spirit born from the combined spirits of slain slimes. Becomes Azusa's adopted daughter. Little sister to Falfa.

name: Beelzebub
about:
A high-ranking member of the demon elite known as the Lord of the Flies. She's been alive for three thousand years. Her personality is belligerent, as you'd expect from a demon but she's actually about as good at looking for others as Azusa.

(Source: Volume 1 Character Information)

name: Flatorte
about:
A blue dragon girl who obeys what Azusa says. Since she's a dragon like Laika, there is somewhat of a rivalry between them, but she's an optimistic and energetic girl. Unlike Laika, she has a tail in human form.

(Source: Volume 3 Character Information)

name: Pecora
about:
The demon king. A girl with a devilish temperament who loves to use her power to bewilder her subordinates and Azusa. She actually has a masochistic desire to be a subordinate to someone stronger than she is, and adores Azusa.

(Source: Volume 3 Character Information)

name: Rosalie
about:
A ghost girl and resident of the house in the highlands. She's devoted to Azusa, who didn't shy away from her as a ghost and instead reached out to her. She can go through walls but can't touch people. She can also possess others.

(Source: Volume 3 Character Information)

name: Lafanpan
about: A female moonlight fairy cleric that serves as the healer and supporter of the party. However, while her healing magic and her ability to turn undead are highly appreciated, she charges fees for her services, even from her friends and allies.

name: Morlock
about: An old sorcerer member of the Saitou's party. He's very powerful but tends to forget all the formulas for casting spells.

name: Raelza
about: A proud warrior that serves as the tank and main fighter of the party. She is usually seen wielding a 2 handed sword, shield and heavy armor but she is also proficient with daggers and hand to hand combat.

name: Saitou
about: A Japanese handyman who suffers from a slight insecurity complex, but is more capable than he realizes. Professionally skilled in appraising and repairing items and picking locks, he becomes the effective thief of his adventuring party and main supporter/leader capable of performing a multitude of different tasks.

name: Gibungle
about: A dwarf who, most unusual for his race, possesses the capability of using arcane magic, making him a natural mage.

name: Clarence, Tio
about: Tio is a "pervert" with the main status of M but she is honest and the words this one speakeas are similar to the old legends. Her "M" personality was made into this because she was defeated by Hajime's party in the northern mountains of the village of Ul. She devoted herself to Hajime to become his slave and called Hajime "Master."
voice_actor_name: Garrett, Morgan, Hikasa, Youko, Dietz, Janina

name: Haulia, Shea
about: Shea first appeared when Hajime and Yue were traveling in the Raisen Grand Canyon while being chased by a monster like a "shameless rabbit." She was in this situation because she foresaw Hajime would help her family. She soon became their traveling companion in the long run, having the attitude to get clingy to Hajime with energetic words and actions.
voice_actor_name: Lee, Amanda, Takahashi, Minami, Gries, Jana Dunja

name: Myuu
about: A young girl from the Sea-Dweller Tribe.

name: Nagumo, Hajime
about:
Hajime was a complete otaku and always came to class with a sleepy expression. He was always bullied and was disliked by both of his male and female classmates for being close to their idol-like classmate Kaori. After wishing for his annoying classmates to be summoned to another world, the next thing he saw was they were on top of a pillar like structure in another world to become heroes.

He obtained the job of "Synergist" and continued to be bullied due to also being weak in this new world. He eventually fell into an abyss due to being hit by a classmate's fireball where he survived though a hell-like environment to become the powerful man he is today.

Hajime at the beginning of the story is said to have black hair and also has a slim body. He also had a kind face and attitude. But after falling in the abyss and eating a wolf-like monster, his body began to violently degenerate. When he drunk the sacred water, it made his body heal by destroying his bones and muscles then healing over and over again until he got a very muscular body due to overcompensation.

Due to the stress of breaking and healing, his hair turned white, a victim of the Marie Antoinette syndrome. His eyes also turned red and his body gained tattoo-like red lines which is the sign of him becoming a demonic monster similar to the monsters he ate that also possessed red lines along their bodies.

His personality was at first kind though he was considered incompetent. But after falling in the abyss, he became cruel and would kill any person who wants to cause him misfortune. He would also smile in front of danger which made Shia call him a new species of monster called "Predator." He may be cruel but he cares for his comrades.

(Source: Arifureta Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Shipman, Matt, Fukamachi, Toshinari, Hohm, Leonard

name: Shirasaki, Kaori
about:
Kaori is one the most caring personalities in the series. She is a classmate of Hajime's back in their original world. She admires Hajime for his "strong" personalty and is the only classmate who pays attention to Hajime's existence in class even if she is popular in their school.

When summoned to another world, she receives the "Healer" job.
voice_actor_name: McIntosh, Skyler, Oonishi, Saori, Möller-Architektonidou, Eleni

name: Yue
about:
Yue is a vampire who was imprisoned in the abyss. She was betrayed by her uncle and peers because of her monstrous magic and regeneration that made her nearly immortal.

With a fateful encounter, Yue met Hajime in a sealed room in the abyss. After being rescued, Yue was the person who suppressed Hajime's madness before he became a monster and she soon became Hajime's "special" person after what transpired in the Abyss.

Her appearance was described to be like the highest grade bisque doll with blonde hair and crimson eyes. She is 323 years old despite her small physique because she is a Vampire Princess. Her name Yue isn't her real name and was only given by Hajime so that she could leave her dark past and move on.

name: Takanashi, Sei
about:
Sei is a Japanese office lady in her twenties who was summoned to Salutania by the Saint Summoning Ritual together with Aira Misono. Her saintly powers include a fifty percent boost in the efficacy of anything she makes using her power. Sei was not immediately recognized as the Saint at the conclusion of the summoning ritual due to her appearance. Offended by the affront, Sei does not reveal that she is actually the Saint (she confirms this in the LN when reading her own status board). During her early months working at the Medicinal Flora Research Institute, her sainthood is nearly found out multiple times due to some accidental scenes with her research. Sei is only publicly acknowledged as the Saint after many people have seen and attested to her abilities. She likes to cook and make cosmetics in her spare time. She owns a cosmetic business in the capital.

(Source: The Saint's Magic Power Is Omnipotent Wiki)

name: Tempest, Rimuru
about:
Race: Human (past life) → Slime → Demon Slime 
Age: 37 (past life) → 2 (anime/manga), 3 (light novel)
Sex: male (past life) → Sexless
Title: Ruler of Monsters, Jura-Tempest Federation Chancellor, 
Divine protection: Storm Crest
Magic: Element Magic archive, Spirit Magic archive, Greater Spirit summoning, Greater Demon summoning, 
Ability:
Species Skill - Universal Sense, Universal Thread, Universal Shapeshift, Infinite Regeneration, Demon Lord Haki, Enhanced Replication
Ultimate Skill - Wisdom King Raphael, King of Gluttony Beelzebuth, Covenant King Uriel, Storm King Veldora, 
Resistance: Physical Attack Nullification, Natural Effects Nullification, Abnormal Condition Nullification, Spiritual/Mental Attack Resistance, Holy-Demonic Attack Resistance

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)

name: Aubert, Chloe
about:
Chloe is an introverted girl, who likes to pass her time reading picture books or manga. While she appears rather cold and stoic most of the time, appearing brutal and merciless even, she can also be very emotional at times.

(Source: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)

name: Beretta
about:
Race: Chaos Doll (Holy Demon Doll)
Divine protection: Tempest (Protection of the Storm)
Title: Ramiris's Guardian
Hair color: silver
Eyes color: gold
Skin color: dark silver (dark metal)
Resistance: Physical Attack Nullification, Physical and Spiritual Attack Nullification, Status Change Nullification, Spirit Attack Resistance, Holy Magic Attack Resistance

A creation that was overdone by Rimuru, a Magic Leader Doll and has an abnormal ability. Because Rimuru transformed into Demon Lord, Beretta evolved into Chaos Doll (Holy Demon Doll).

Because of specialization in two powers, he can work in any kind of situation. Created to work as a bodyguard for Demon Lord Ramiris.

Abilities:
Unique Skill - Holy Demon Union
Ex - Multiple Barrier, Spatial Transfer, Sage EX
Daily Skill - Magic Perception, Fear, Herculean Strength
Battle Skill - Poison, Paralysis, Corrosive Breath, Full Body Armor

name: Ranga
about:
Race: Star Wolf Race [EP: 216,000]
Divine protection: Tempest (Protection of the Storm)
Ability:Resistance: Physical Damage Nullification, Nature Effects Nullification, Status, Change Nullification, Spirit Attack Resistance

Ranga, the Fenrir (Star Nova Demon Wolf King). The leader of the Star Wolf Clan, and the son of the previous boss of the Fanged Wolf Clan. Always lurking in Rimuru's shadow.

name: Machio, Hiraku
about:
Our hero, a resurrected human from Earth (Modern Earth) after dying at age 39. The former company man, found himself meeting a god, whom had need of him on another world. In fact, Hiraku, was allowed to choose which world he would be sent. He would ultimately choose to sent to a peaceful world so he could be a farmer like the ones he saw on television during his life. After years of being bedridden with poor health, he was granted the wish of a younger body that would not suffer from illnesses. He is given the gift of the A.F.E. (All-purpose Farming Equipment), which can transform into any non-powered tool Hiraku can imagine. He can summon his tool when needed, have it transform into anything he needs. Hiraku seems to have likable personality of which draws all assortment of people, with high percentage of them being women to his dismay as they are all after him! As more people join him and live at his farm, his land would become a village and he would be starting be referred to his as "Chief" or "Village Chief."

(Source: Isekai Nonbiri Nouka Wiki, edited)

name: Ria

Ria is a member of the High Elf race, her particular tribe being devastated by war, with males being "sent away" to other tribes, leaving her and other females forced to fend for themselves and at the risk of being treated poorly by other tribes.

She leads several others female High Elves throughout the world for many years. However, this changes when she befriends Tia, an Angel.

Having stumbled upon the settlement of Hiraku Matio there, she was detained by his vigilant wolf guards. As a result, she stayed to live with Hiraku, helping the development of the village with charms and alchemy.
