name: Nagumo, Hajime
about:
Hajime was a complete otaku and always came to class with a sleepy expression. He was always bullied and was disliked by both of his male and female classmates for being close to their idol-like classmate Kaori. After wishing for his annoying classmates to be summoned to another world, the next thing he saw was they were on top of a pillar like structure in another world to become heroes.

He obtained the job of "Synergist" and continued to be bullied due to also being weak in this new world. He eventually fell into an abyss due to being hit by a classmate's fireball where he survived though a hell-like environment to become the powerful man he is today.

Hajime at the beginning of the story is said to have black hair and also has a slim body. He also had a kind face and attitude. But after falling in the abyss and eating a wolf-like monster, his body began to violently degenerate. When he drunk the sacred water, it made his body heal by destroying his bones and muscles then healing over and over again until he got a very muscular body due to overcompensation.

Due to the stress of breaking and healing, his hair turned white, a victim of the Marie Antoinette syndrome. His eyes also turned red and his body gained tattoo-like red lines which is the sign of him becoming a demonic monster similar to the monsters he ate that also possessed red lines along their bodies.

His personality was at first kind though he was considered incompetent. But after falling in the abyss, he became cruel and would kill any person who wants to cause him misfortune. He would also smile in front of danger which made Shia call him a new species of monster called "Predator." He may be cruel but he cares for his comrades.

(Source: Arifureta Wiki)

When summoned to another world, she receives the "Healer" job.

Her appearance was described to be like the highest grade bisque doll with blonde hair and crimson eyes. She is 323 years old despite her small physique because she is a Vampire Princess. Her name Yue isn't her real name and was only given by Hajime so that she could leave her dark past and move on.

voice_actor_name: Inada, Tetsu, DiMascio, Anthony, Rodas, Cyrus, Martim, Rodrigo

name: Gil
about:
Gil is a troublemaker apprentice priest from the orphanage who spent more time being punished than not. He is assigned as one of Main's attendants along with Delia and Fran when she joins the Church.

(Source: Ascendance of a Bookworm Wiki, edited)

name: Lutz
about: Lutz has golden hair and jade eyes. He is the fourth and youngest son of Karla and Died. His older brothers are Zasha, Sieg and Ralph. He is close friends with Myne and works closely with her to monitor her health as well as help her created new products.

name: Myne
about:
Former name (before reincarnation): Motosu Urano (本須 麗乃)

Originally a young woman from our world who just finished her studies to become a librarian and died buried in her own books after an earthquake caused her bookshelves to fall on her, she found herself reincarnated in a very frail body of a 5-year-old young girl called Myne in a fantasy world.

She loves books above everything else and living a quiet life surrounded by books is her long life goal.

She has read a massive amount of books in her former life and has a good memory of the content that especially interested her.

While originally her motivation was only books and she didn't care about anything else, she becomes more and more involved in many other things, as she start to care and love more and more her new family and many other peoples she encounters.

Her body is so frail that she easily get tired after walking for a bit, and whenever she forces herself too much she gets strong fevers that can last for days.

She has a strong talent to teach others and motivate them in their studies.

She is usually very level headed but will go berserk whenever books get involved. The peoples around her know that tendency and will try to reason her whenever she becomes too reckless. As time passes, she became more receptive to those words, especially when they come from Ferdinand and Lutz.

name: Benno
about:
Merchant and owner of the Gilberta Company, a major clothing and accessories store located on the north end of town. Corinna is his sister.

He is first introduced as Otto's acquaintance from when Otto was a trader. Later, it is revealed that he and Otto are brothers-in-law.

name: Delia
about:
Delia is one of the orphans who becomes an apprentice gray shrine maiden. Delia is assigned as one of Myne's attendants along with Gil and Fran by the High Bishop to spy on her. She dreams of being the mistress of the Bishop and live comfortably.

(Source: Ascendance of a Bookworm Wiki)

name: Eva
about: Myne and Turi's mother. She has green like jade hair and green close to yellow-green eyes. She works at a dyery.

name: Ferdinand
about:
Ferdinand is the head priest in the temple of Ehrenfest, as well as the patron and educator of Myne in the temple. Ferdinand teaches and guides her to be a 'proper' shrine maiden and noble lady.

Ferdinand is a serious, disciplined and pragmatic person. He has a bit of a fussy personality, leading him to take on all sorts of responsibilities, including Myne's education. Ferdinand is meritocratic in spite of his social status, despising incompetence and laziness the most, and earning him the reputation of a harsh disciplinarian who would cut off anyone who couldn't meet his standard. The same trait leads him to favor Myne ever since their first interaction, calling her worthwhile to educate.

(Source: Ascendance of a Bookworm Wiki)

name: Fran
about:
Fran used to serve Ferdinand as an attendant. However, when Myne joined the Church, he was assigned to her instead. He becomes her chief attendant, keeping the others (and her) organized.

(Source: Ascendance of a Bookworm Wiki, edited)

name: Frida
about: She is the guild master's granddaughter.

name: Kokonoe, Yae
about: A samurai from the land of the gods, Iishen. Not the best-mannered person around and can be rather clumsy, but rather looks up to Touya and his ability to be humble and choose to help others, which is the reason she decides to join him on the journey.
voice_actor_name: Akasaki, Chinatsu, Rojas, Michelle, Palomanes, Luisa, Boquet, Cathy, Mercado, Marysol

name: Leen
about: An elder of the fairy folk. Self-proclaimed 612 years old. When out in public hides her wings using light magic. Often is accompanied by Paula; a teddy bear she controls using her null attribute magic.
voice_actor_name: Uesaka, Sumire, Rial, Monica, Saddy, Flávia, Rojas, Annie, Landresse, Sophie

name: Amano, Erika
about:
Birthday: April 6
Blood Type: AB
Height: 160 cm

A popular Instagram celebrity who is the biological daughter of the family that raised Nagi. She first meets him while taking videos at a park, and makes him pretend to be her boyfriend to escape from an arranged marriage. Her parents arrange her to be engaged with Nagi and for them to live together in a single house. After her school discovers the pictures she took with him, she is forced to transfer to Nagi's school. She decided to start an Instagram account in order to reach someone she had been looking for.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kaga, Michio
about: Michio is a Japanese high school student who was transported to another world. A rather reasonable and calm young man who decided to realize his dream of a quiet, comfortable life and a harem of several slaves in the new world. Despite the fact that he was often bullied in the old world, he did not get angry, but this causes him to sometimes manifest difficulties in communication and emotional tightness, as well as a thirst for human intimacy, love and friendship. Treats his slaves as family members, or rather wives, and expects the same attitude and trust in return. He takes care of his harem, does not force them to do anything and, on the contrary, provides them with everything they need and beyond: from food and clothing to weapons and education, helps them to level up and improves living conditions.

name: Roxanne
about:
Age: 16
Race: Wolfkin

Roxanne is described as stunningly beautiful with enchanting reddish brown eyes, magnificent lips, thick chestnut brown hair, and big breasts. Her height is similar to Michio's, a little over 160 cm. She has soft floppy dog ears on her head.

Roxanne was introduced during Michio's first visit to Vale by Alan the slave merchant. Alan had offered her to Michio, but seeing that Michio couldn't afford her at the time, Alan offered to hold her for 10 days while Michio gathered money. On the 10th day after Alan's offer, Michio returned and purchased Roxanne. Together, they left and headed for the Pavilion Inn. After a minor misunderstanding, Michio told Roxanne that he came form a distant land and admitted that he lacked common sense of the area. He requested that she assist in teaching him common sense as well as how to read and write in the Brahim language to which she hesitantly agreed.

In combat, she carefully watches the enemy so she that she can understand how it's going to move, so that she would only need to move her body a little. The secret of Roxanne's insane ability came from playing with monsters ever since she was a kid, however, she could play like that only because she could dodge.

(Source: Slave Harem Wikia)

name: McMillan, Raeliana
name_kanji: 레리아나 맥밀런 / レリアナ・マクミラン
about:
Age: 18 
Nickname: Raeli
Relationship status: engaged 
Eunha Park wakes up one day in a place she doesn't recognize. Suddenly she realizes that she has been reincarnated into the world of a novel. Namely as the supporting character Raeliana McMillain who is killed by her fiancé. Now Eunha aka Raeliana is trying to change her destiny. Her only option is to ask the high-ranking noble Noah Wynknight for an engagement contract. So her ex-fiancé wouldn't do anything if she has the most powerful duke as her fiancé...would he?

Raeliana is a very open and extroverted person. She is shown to be sarcastic and dramatic at times. Also, she isn't shy and says everything she thinks about without holding anything in. Raeliana is brave and barely fears anything nor does she let people look down on her. She is really soft to her loved ones, especially Rosemary, her little sister. In difficult times, she keeps a cool head and tries to find solutions without panicking. The only one who can actually make her flustered is her contract fiancé Noah Wynknight.

Euphyllia is a person blessed by the spirits and possesses affinity for all magical spirits which allows her to use magic of any element.

name: Wynn Palletia, Anisphia
name_kanji: アニスフィア・ウィン・パレッティア
about:
The first princess of the Kingdom of Palettia. She was reincarnated from her previous life with all her memories of modern technology, making her a keen inventor in her current life. While considered odd and only interested in her inventions, she actually thinks of her country more than anyone else. Because of her conspicuous eccentricities, she uses the name of Princess Strange Violent as she pleases. She has memories of being Japanese in her previous life and has a strong admiration for magic.

(Source: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei Wikia)

(Source: Official site, translated, edited)

about: Tio is a "pervert" with the main status of M but she is honest and the words this one speakeas are similar to the old legends. Her "M" personality was made into this because she was defeated by Hajime's party in the northern mountains of the village of Ul. She devoted herself to Hajime to become his slave and called Hajime "Master."

name: Haulia, Shea
about: Shea first appeared when Hajime and Yue were traveling in the Raisen Grand Canyon while being chased by a monster like a "shameless rabbit." She was in this situation because she foresaw Hajime would help her family. She soon became their traveling companion in the long run, having the attitude to get clingy to Hajime with energetic words and actions.

name: Nagumo, Hajime
about:
Hajime was a complete otaku and always came to class with a sleepy expression. He was always bullied and was disliked by both of his male and female classmates for being close to their idol-like classmate Kaori. After wishing for his annoying classmates to be summoned to another world, the next thing he saw was they were on top of a pillar like structure in another world to become heroes.

He obtained the job of "Synergist" and continued to be bullied due to also being weak in this new world. He eventually fell into an abyss due to being hit by a classmate's fireball where he survived though a hell-like environment to become the powerful man he is today.

Hajime at the beginning of the story is said to have black hair and also has a slim body. He also had a kind face and attitude. But after falling in the abyss and eating a wolf-like monster, his body began to violently degenerate. When he drunk the sacred water, it made his body heal by destroying his bones and muscles then healing over and over again until he got a very muscular body due to overcompensation.

Due to the stress of breaking and healing, his hair turned white, a victim of the Marie Antoinette syndrome. His eyes also turned red and his body gained tattoo-like red lines which is the sign of him becoming a demonic monster similar to the monsters he ate that also possessed red lines along their bodies.

His personality was at first kind though he was considered incompetent. But after falling in the abyss, he became cruel and would kill any person who wants to cause him misfortune. He would also smile in front of danger which made Shia call him a new species of monster called "Predator." He may be cruel but he cares for his comrades.

(Source: Arifureta Wiki)

name: Shirasaki, Kaori
about:
Kaori is one the most caring personalities in the series. She is a classmate of Hajime's back in their original world. She admires Hajime for his "strong" personalty and is the only classmate who pays attention to Hajime's existence in class even if she is popular in their school.

When summoned to another world, she receives the "Healer" job.

name: Yue
about:
Yue is a vampire who was imprisoned in the abyss. She was betrayed by her uncle and peers because of her monstrous magic and regeneration that made her nearly immortal.

With a fateful encounter, Yue met Hajime in a sealed room in the abyss. After being rescued, Yue was the person who suppressed Hajime's madness before he became a monster and she soon became Hajime's "special" person after what transpired in the Abyss.

Her appearance was described to be like the highest grade bisque doll with blonde hair and crimson eyes. She is 323 years old despite her small physique because she is a Vampire Princess. Her name Yue isn't her real name and was only given by Hajime so that she could leave her dark past and move on.

name: Amanogawa, Kouki
name_kanji: 天之河 光輝 / 天之川 光輝
about: Childhood friend of Shizuku. He is self-righteous and has an arrogant sense of justice. When the situation goes against Amanogawa's intentions, he unconsciously misinterprets the situation to his own convenience. He sometimes acts unknowingly like a "dense protagonist."

name: Hatayama, Aiko
about: The teacher of the class. She has the Agriculturalist class. Her short height and enthusiastic attitude has earned her respect and admiration from the majority of her students.

name: Heilig, Liliana S. B.
name_kanji: リリアーナ・S・B・ハイリヒ
about: She is the princess of the Heilig Kingdom.

name: Hoelscher, Gahard D.
name_kanji: ガハルド・D・ヘルシャー

name: Hoelscher, Baius D.
name_kanji: バイアス・D・ヘルシャー

name: Dautriche, Aileen Lauren
name_kanji: アイリーン・ローレン・ドートリシュ
about: She has been reborn into the world of an otome game as the villainess, Irene. Using her memories of her former life, she recognizes flags indicating she's en-route to the bad end, so she makes a plan to conquer the last boss (the evil king Claude), make him her lover, and see if she can open up a new route!

name: Luciel
about: Luciel was initially a salaryman in his 30s, his life entirely focused on work and promotions, until one day he was suddenly shot in the chest. Despite trying his hardest to stay alive, and even buying himself a few extra seconds, he eventually passed away and met a God of Fate, who let him remake himself in preparation for his reincarnation in a new world. Since he wanted to live a nice, long, healthy life this time around, he of course chose to be a healer! Now, he just has to focus on his survival, putting in blood, sweat, and tears toward that goal.

Replaced the Rajah Emperor's firstborn son.
Considers Pride his masterpiece.

name: Sui
about:
A slime Mukouda befriended as his familiar due to its general cuteness and usefulness when cleaning his garbage from another world. It usually hangs inside of Mukouda's bag, as a travel companion to him and Fel.

Thought to be a regular water slime at first, Sui, thanks to Mukouda's food providing ridiculous stat boosts, quickly learns how to use magic, how to speak, and how to produce high grade medicine.

Sui is shown as being highly excitable and very supportive, extruding a positive attitude towards life, be it helping out its companions or killing powerful monsters.

When Sui likes something, it creates a heart-shaped emote inside of it's body.

name: Tempest, Rimuru
about:
Race: Human (past life) → Slime → Demon Slime 
Age: 37 (past life) → 2 (anime/manga), 3 (light novel)
Sex: male (past life) → Sexless
Title: Ruler of Monsters, Jura-Tempest Federation Chancellor, 
Divine protection: Storm Crest
Magic: Element Magic archive, Spirit Magic archive, Greater Spirit summoning, Greater Demon summoning, 
Ability:
Species Skill - Universal Sense, Universal Thread, Universal Shapeshift, Infinite Regeneration, Demon Lord Haki, Enhanced Replication
Ultimate Skill - Wisdom King Raphael, King of Gluttony Beelzebuth, Covenant King Uriel, Storm King Veldora, 
Resistance: Physical Attack Nullification, Natural Effects Nullification, Abnormal Condition Nullification, Spiritual/Mental Attack Resistance, Holy-Demonic Attack Resistance

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)

name: Ivy
about:
In a world where all people receive skills from God, she is a young girl who received a tamer skill. However, her rank is the weakest: "starless." As the starless are considered ominous, she was abandoned by her family and chased away from her village. In reality, Ivy was reincarnated from another world. At times, her memories from her previous world give her advice, but they are of little use.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Sora
about:
A rare slime which is rarely seen. It has no official name, and is often called names such as  "the weakest slime" or "crumbling slime." According to the catalogue of magical beings, "it is so weak that it may disappear if a strong wind blows or if it is poked." It becomes Ivy's friend, and they start their journey together. It eats a whole bottle of blue potion.

(Source: Official site, translated)

about: Yogiri's classmate and travel companion who he protects. She isn't compatible with the Battle Song program.

name: Takatou, Yogiri
about: A high school student who gets trapped in the alternate world with Tomochika Dannoura. He has a power that he has kept hidden most of his life, the power to force instant death.

about: Mokomoko Dannoura is a ghost and one of the main characters in the series. She was the responsible person for not letting Sion's system be installed on Tomochika as a way of protecting her, and later reveals herself to the latter, and eventually to Yogiri.

name: François, Claire
about:
Claire François is a proud noble who in the original [Revolution] is the villainess who bullies the heroine.

(Source: novelupdates)

name: Taylor, Rae
about:
Rae Taylor hails from our world where she died from being overworked. Her original last name was Oohashi before it was changed to Taylor when she became the protagonist of her favorite otome game: Revolution.

Following her death, she found herself in the Academy being harassed by her favorite character of her favorite otome game: Claire François. She has intimate knowledge of her new world from being a fan fiction writer and knows the world and characters better than anyone. In addition, she commands two of the four available elements in Revolution's world at a super high aptitude, the highest rank.

Rae is an out lesbian who makes her affections for Claire obvious from the moment she finds herself within the game and, despite the game intending her to romance a prince, dedicates her life to Claire.

Claire's maid who has worked for her as long as she can remember, sharing a bond that is closer to sisterly. She is a commoner who is the eldest daughter of one of the kingdom's wealthy merchant families, the Aurousseaus of the Aurousseau Commercial Firm.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Black Mask

name: Fran
about:
Fran is a black cat beastkin that embarked on a journey with her parents in order to search for a way to evolve. However her parents eventually passed away and she got enslaved as a result.

Due to various circumstances, she crossed paths with the sentient sword and they both freed each other. Since the enslaving process robbed her of her name, the sword bestowed unto her the name "Fran," as that was how her parents called her. In return, Fran named the sword Shishio/Master, since he saved and taught her many things. She also gains a darkness wolf familiar named Urushi.

She loves curry.

name: Shishou
about:
A former japanese reincarnated into a mysterious sword which slept on a pedestal in the middle of some hidden ruins. After "awakening," the sword quickly learned to both move and fight on its own by using magic, and that it had the ability to absorb a monster's core to raise its strength.

After building up some power, it grew bored and decided to depart the ruins to explore new lands, but got stuck on a mana-depleting zone and lost its freedom for several weeks. Eventually, a black cat beastkin slave found it by chance while fleeing from a monster and the sword helped her regain her freedom. As a result both decided to continue together and the sword bestowed the girl with a name (Fran) and a contract which shares its abilities with her. Fran in return named the sword Shishou (Master).

Shishou eventually also summons a familiar and names it Urushi, which ends up as Fran's familiar as well.

He also gains the ability to create doppelgangers of himself, which look like his former human self.



(Source: Novel/Manga)

name: Fou Bartfort, Leon
name_kanji: リオン・フォウ・バルトファルト
about: Leon is the protagonist of The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs, having died and been reincarnated into an otome game he was playing before his death.

name: Olivia
about:
Olivia is an honor student at the academy. She was the protagonist of the original otome game. She is also the Saint of the Holfort Kingdom in the otome game. 

She is by all means a modest girl who is very kind and gentle with people. She dislikes gambling. As a commoner, she's often shocked if not stressed on how most things around her are so expensive & luxurious.

Despite her kindness and modesty, she lacks a consistent amount of self-confidence, which most likely stems from how she is a commoner who attends a school that is dominantly populated by nobles who mostly look down on her. 



(Source: The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs Wiki Wiki)

name: Rapha Redgrave, Angelica
name_kanji: アンジェリカ・ラファ・レッドグレイブ
about:
Angelica Rapha Redgrave is the daughter of Duke Redgrave and the former fiancé of Prince Julius Rapha Holfort. In the original otome game, Angelica was the first antagonist.

Angelica originally was supposed to be very hot-headed which would be her eventual downfall but because of Marie, we get to see more of who she is.





(Source: The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs Wiki)

name: Luxion
about: Luxion was originally a cash shop item in the original Otome Game but now is the deuteragonist of the story, being part of major story events.

In truth, she is the princess of the magical land of Nokanatika, sent to Earth to hide her. Ten years later, she returns to marry a man and give him the power of the Ring King. When Satou follows her, she bestows the power on him instead.

about:
Paimon is a non-playable character in Genshin Impact and accompanies the Traveler throughout their adventure in Teyvat as their guide. She met the Traveler by being fished out of a lake in which she mentions she would've drowned if not being fished out. She is currently representing Genshin Impact and is on the Genshin Impact app, website, and social media icons.

(Source: Wiki)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Albedo
about:
Albedo is an alchemist based in Mondstadt, in the service of the Knights of Favonius. "Genius," "Kreideprinz," or "Captain of the Investigation Team"... Such titles and honors are of no consequence to him when there is so much more research to conduct. The pursuit of fortune and connections cannot hold a candle to his heart's desire—acquiring the limitless, obscure knowledge left behind by previous generations of scholars.

(Source: Official Site)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Arataki, Itto
name_kanji: あらたきいっと / 荒瀧一斗
about:
Descendant of the oni, of intrepid spirit and noble heart. Fast as the wind and mighty as thunder.

(Source: Official website)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Beidou
about:
Captain of the Crux, with quite the reputation in Liyue.
There are those who say she can split mountains and part the sea. Others say she draws lightning through her sword. Some say that even the mightiest of sea beasts are no match for her.
For those not from Liyue, it may sound like a hearty joke, but those that have sailed with her will say—
"No matter what sea beasts there may be, Beidou will be sure to split them all in two."

(Source: Official site)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Bennett
about:
Bennett is the only active member of his own adventure group, known as "Benny's Adventure Team," after all the other members decided to "take leave" following a series of unfortunate incidents. As a result, the team is currently on the verge of being dissolved.

Being unable to break the poor boy's heart, Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild has kept "Benny's Adventure Team" on the books, whilst also hiding from him the fact that all the other members have long since officially left the team.

(Source: Official site)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Chongyun
about:
Chongyun is an exorcist who roams the land with Liyue as his base of operations, evil spirits fleeing wherever he goes. As the heir to a clan of exorcists, he has always possessed abilities superior to most. However, these abilities are not the result of training, but of an inborn trait—a pure-yang spirit.

(Source: Official site, edited)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Collei
about:
A Trainee Forest Ranger who is under the tutelage of Tighnari. She started her academic career a little later than her peers, so she is currently working hard to catch up.
She hides the other side of her personality deep under the surface of optimism and kindness.

(Source: Official website)

name: Cyno
about:
The General Mahamatra of the Akademiya, leader of all the Matras. He has a unique sense of humor that never fails to leave a deep impression.

(Source: Official website)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Dori
about:
Dori is a merchant in Sumeru who has a fondness for glittering Mora.
With her persuasive eloquence, she is able to sell various strange and mysterious products for a very high price.

(Source: Official website)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)

Divine protection: Tempest (Protection of the Storm)
Title: Oni King
Height: 180 cm
Ability:
Resistance: Physical Damage Nullification, Pain Nullification, Status Change Nullification, Spirit Attack Resistance, Nature Effects Resistance

Benimaru is a majin in the service of Rimuru Tempest. He is the Minister of Defense for the Jura-Tempest Federation, acting as the Commander-in-Chief for its military during wartime. He holds a place in the Twelve Guardian Lords, as well as the Big Four, being its leader and being counted as one of Rimuru's Top Three strongest subordinates, alongside Diablo and Zegion.
voice_actor_name: Furukawa, Makoto, Fajardo, Ricco, Rossatto, Raphael, Vivolo, Ezio, Van Santfoort, Maxime

name: Blanc
about:
Testarossa, also known as Blanc (原初の白ブラン buran, lit. "Primordial of White"). She is one of the Primordials that joined Tempest after Diablo recruited them, and the one who caused the infamous "Lake Shore Dyed Scarlet Incident".

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Uchiyama, Yumi, Young, Stephanie, Cinalli, Beta, Valenti, Federica

voice_actor_name: Okitsu, Kazuyuki, Pimenta, Luis Felipe, Ippoliti, Giuseppe

name: Chiffon
voice_actor_name: Nazuka, Kaori, Mackay, Lydia, Franchi, Glaucia, Sorrentino, Katia, Ostrowski, Marielle

name: Daikenja
about:
Name: Great Sage (Daikenja)


Entity Type: Unique Skill

Appearance:
Great Sage does not possess a physical form. It exists as an inner voice or consciousness within the wielder, providing unparalleled guidance and analytical abilities.

Background:
Great Sage is a highly sophisticated and unique skill acquired by Rimuru Tempest upon his reincarnation into the Jura Forest as a slime. This skill manifested as an advanced, sentient form of intelligence, designed to aid and guide Rimuru through his journey in this fantastical world.

Role and Contributions:

Advisor and Strategist:
Great Sage serves as the primary advisor to Rimuru, offering insights and strategies to navigate complex situations. Its analytical prowess allows for informed decision-making, ensuring Rimuru can effectively manage both peaceful and combative scenarios.

Skill Enhancement and Evolution:
Great Sage plays a crucial role in enhancing Rimuru's abilities. Over time, it evolves into the Ultimate Skill Raphael, significantly amplifying its capabilities and support functions.

Combat and Defense:
In combat, Great Sage is indispensable. It devises tactics, analyzes opponents' weaknesses, and suggests optimal strategies. This ensures that Rimuru can utilize his vast array of skills and powers to their fullest potential.

Knowledge and Information Processing:
Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.



Significance:
Great Sage is the cornerstone of Rimuru Tempest's success and growth. Its guidance and support are instrumental in Rimuru's rise from a simple slime to a powerful leader and protector. Great Sage embodies the blend of intellect, strategy, and emotional support, making it an indispensable part of Rimuru's journey and the thriving nation he builds.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)

name: Kagenou, Cid
nicknames: Minoru Kagenou, Shadow, Jimina Seinen/Mundane Mann, John Smith, Suzuki Hope
about: Cid is the founder and leader of the secret organization Shadow Garden under the moniker Shadow to help realize his fantasy of becoming an "Eminence in Shadow." However, unbeknownst to him, his fabrications are often revealed to be quite genuine in reality.
voice_actor_name: Yamashita, Seiichirou, Aubert-Carlin, Alan, Gibbs, Adam, Fukuyama, Jun, Vivolo, Ezio, Di Benedetto, Massimo
voice_actor_lang: Japanese, French, English, Japanese, Italian, Italian

name: Alpha
about:
Alpha is the second-in-command of Shadow Garden, as well as a descendant of the elf Hero Olivier. After being cured of Demon Possession by Cid Kagenou, she would devote her life to his cause, becoming the first member to be recruited into his organization. She is strict, but attentive to the feelings of subordinates. Alpha found and recruited six core members of the organization in an effort to destroy the cult of the demon Diablos.

(Source: The Eminence In Shadow Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Seto, Asami, Blanc, Laura, Kelly, Christina, Simonelli, Federica, Markiefka, Angelina

name: Aurora
about:
Aurora is a witch from the distant past. She is regarded as the Witch of Calamity and has some connection with the Order of Diabolos and possibly, the Three Heroes. 



(Source: The Eminence In Shadow Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Nazuka, Kaori, Calene-Black, Shelley, Silvestri, Ilaria, Hénocq, Virginie, Dietz, Janina

name: Beta
about:
Beta is the third member of Shadow Garden, supporting her master Shadow against the Order of Diabolos. Outside of her Shadow Garden activities, she adopts the identity of Natsume, an up-and-coming author of numerous original pieces of literature.

(Source: The Eminence In Shadow Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Minase, Inori, Marié, Émilie, Wild, Annie, Cherubelli, Laura, Ewelina, Anna

name: Chi
about: Chi is a member of the secret organization Shadow Garden. She is a friend of Omega, with whom she works under the guidance of Epsilon. Like many members of Shadow Garden, she is named after a letter of the Greek alphabet.
voice_actor_name: Minami, Mayu, Coates, Kalin, Cardani, Emanuela, Bataille, Amandine, Widera, Marie-Jeanne

name: Crimson
voice_actor_name: Sugita, Tomokazu, Colombo Giardinelli, Andrea, Schatz, Valéry, Lubowski, Manou

name: Delta
nicknames: Sarah, Delta the Loose Cannon, Delta the Suicidal Weapon
about:
Delta is a member of Shadow Garden, being fourth of the original Shadow Seven to join the organization after her Demonic Possession was healed by her master Shadow. As the most physically gifted of the Seven, Delta is also often the most destructive and brutal of the group due to her lack of sense and self-control.

(Source: The Eminence In Shadow Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Fairouz Ai, Hervieux, Charlotte, Troup, Raven Justine, Sorrentino, Katia, Schmidt, Lara

name: Elisabeth
nicknames: Queen of Vampires, Monarch, Blood Queen
about: Elizabeth is one of three monarchs of Outlaw City and the Queen of Vampires.
voice_actor_name: Hayami, Saori, Roberts, Brianna, Tedesco, Jessica, Baroin, Chantal, Stichler, Christine

name: Epsilon
about:
Epsilon is fifth member of Shadow Garden. Due to her insecurities with having a flat-chest, she manipulated her slime-body suit every year to slowly increase the mass on her chest, eventually, developing a fake large breast. As a consequence of this, she developed extreme magic control earning her the title, "The Precision."

(Source: The Eminence In Shadow Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Kanemoto, Hisako, Evans, Ellen, Bersani, Giulia, André, Marine, Wick, Andrea

name: Alan
about: He is the son of a great minister from the Brancott Kingdom.

name: Dolkness, Yumiella
name_kanji: ユミエラ・ドルクネス
about: The heroine of the otome game, in whose body an ordinary Japanese girl was reborn. The daughter of the Earl of Dolkness. A villainess wielding dark magic and a hidden final boss. Remembering her past life, Yumiella does not intend to confront the main character Alicia Ehnleit and create chaos in the game. She just wants to live a peaceful life away from the romantic hustle and bustle. As an avid gamer in the real world, Yumiella decided to use her gaming skills to raise her level in order to defeat the Demon Lord on her own if necessary.

name: Adolf
about: A general who works for the King.

name: Ares, William
about:
A master swordsman who also doesn't believe that Yumiella is level 99. He constantly challenged Yumiella to fights despite being outclassed. He even believed she was the Demon Lord at first, thinking she would commit wicked deeds in the future, despite the fact that it was confirmed that she definitely wasn't due to the Demon Lord being a man. As the story progresses, he slowly loses his dislike of Yumiella.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Ashbatten, Patrick
name_kanji: パトリック・アッシュバトン
about:
The son of a lord on the frontier, who is quite good at wind magic. He is one of the only students who didn't fear Yumiella. At first, he approached her after realizing her peculiar method of doing things is going to get herself or others killed. He soon develops feelings for her, but isn't able to get them across for the longest time. He does later become Level 99 like her, meeting her (fake) standard for a marriage partner.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Ehnleit, Alicia
name_kanji: アリシア・エンライト
about:
The heroine of the game. She is fearful of Yumiella, due to her light magic making her perceive the latter as a dark smoke with glowing eyes; however, she soon began to warm up to her. Alicia attempts to meet Yumiella halfway in order to befriend her, but at some points, the capture targets block her due to their distrustfulness of Yumiella, even hindering Alicia from leveling up, leaving her weak and unprepared to face the Demon Lord.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Grimsarde, Oswald
name_kanji: オズワルド・グリムザード
about:
A magic prodigy, able to wield the four classical elements even better than Edwin can. Yumiella gave him an inferiority complex by destroying a target dummy Oswald could only put a dent in, leading him to swear revenge. However, his resentment of Yumiella begins to fade as the story progresses.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Hillrose, Eleanora
name_kanji: エレノーラ・ヒルローズ
about:
The daughter of Duke Hillrose, the leader of the radical nobles. She initially approached Yumiella to have her join her faction, but ends up revealing herself to be a lovestruck, naïve girl hopelessly in love with Prince Edwin. Her "friends" use Eleonora as a scapegoat to pick on Alicia, though she is unaware that their actions are making her look bad in Prince Edwin's eyes. Eleonora befriends Yumiella over their shared love of dragons and the fact that Yumiella isn't taking advantage of her, being able to be honest and open with her alone. Like Patrick, she does not fear Yumiella and may possibly have feelings for her.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: King Valschein
about:
The Kingdom's ruler and Edwin's father. Unlike his son, he is more supportive of Yumiella and intends to use her to help in their fight against the Demon Lord. Yumiella pretends to agree as she really isn't interested in serving him.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Linus
about:
A spy from the Kingdom of Remlest who once tried to get Yumiella to move to his kingdom.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Emilia
about:
Birthday: September 23
Height: 164 cm (5'4.5")

The main female protagonist. She is a silver-haired half-elf girl who is one of the candidates to become the next ruler in the royal election. Subaru first meets her when her insignia is stolen by Felt as she needs to possess it to be eligible to participate in the election. She introduces herself as Satella when she and Subaru met during the first timeline before introducing herself by her real name when she got her insignia back.

Emilia is good natured and likes to take care of others, though she herself refuses to admit it, instead thinking of it as her own selfishness. She is indifferent to her own appearance, leaving Puck to take care of her clothes and hair. Because her appearance is similar to the Witch of Envy, she has received unfair discrimination from others. She sometimes acts like a child and is unacquainted with the world as she used to live in the woods with other Elves, though despite this she still works hard to become a ruler.

name: Natsuki, Subaru
about:
Age: 17→18
Birthday: April 1
Height: 173 cm (5'8")

On the way home from the convenience store, he suddenly finds himself transported into another world. He has the ability that he calls "Return by Death" to go back in time when he dies, with only himself being aware of the reversal of time. Despite being a hikikomori and gamer in his real world, Subaru does a bit of workout and seems to know basic hand-to-hand combat, making him not completely weak.

While Subaru tends to not read the situation, he is loyal to those he holds dear, willing to help them, even if that means taking the thorny path. He has his resolve confirmed through the many situations and circumstances he faces in the fantasy world, originally having been one to always take the "easy" route. As a hikikomori, he is hopeful of the possibilities that being sucked into a new realm brings, but later realizes the realities of the predicament he is in. Ultimately, he resolves himself to be faithful and protective of the ones that he cares most about.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Aldebaran
about:
Race: Human
Age: around 40
Height: 173 cm (5'8")
Weight: Around 70 kg

Aldebaran, commonly known as Al is Priscilla Barielle's knight,

Al has a frivolous and goofy personality, and having spent more than ten years in a different world, he was easily able to get along with Subaru. Despite being Priscilla's knight, he doesn't really recognize himself as one, seeing himself as her caretaker, while Priscilla herself sees him as a handyman and a fool to entertain her. He has no qualms about their relationship. He also brags that the only way he can fight is by outwitting people and catching them by surprise.


(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Argyle, Felix
name_kanji: フェリックス・アーガイル / フェリス
about:
Age: 19→20
Birthday: January 16
Height: 172 cm (5'8")

Crusch's knight, who is skilled in water magic, which includes healing. He refuses to use a sword. Even though he has a feminine and cat-like appearance, Felix is male. Having stated that he is a man "in both body and soul." He often speaks in the third person, using both male and female pronouns for himself, but only using female denominators to tease the other characters. A "beast human" hybrid, Felix was locked up at birth and later rescued by Crusch herself.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)

name: Astrea, Heinkel
name_kanji: ハインケル・アストレア
about:
Heinkel Astrea is the Deputy Commander of the Royal Guards and Reinhard van Astrea's father. He is also the current Patriarch of House Astrea.
Months after the Sanctuary Incident, Heinkel came in contact with Priscilla Barielle, forming an alliance and joining her royal election camp, with his main goal obtaining the Dragon's Blood to cure his sleep-bound wife.

name: Barielle, Priscilla
name_kanji: プリシラ・バーリエル
about:
Age: 19→20
Hair: Orange
Eyes: Red
Height: 164 cm (5'5")

Priscilla is the head of the Barielle House and a candidate to become the 42nd King of Lugnica.

She's a former Vollachian princess, but was betrayed and had to flee to Lugunica.

She is a person who stands out in every aspect, is very smart and loves to read, has been described as someone so beautiful that one could forget to breathe in her presence, her usual behavior is arrogant and self centered but even so the people from Barielle Barony loves her. She usually solves her and people problems by herself. 

Regarding her combat skills, she possess the Yang Sword, an incredible speed and fighting abilities, and her incredible luck which hasn´t been explained yet.

(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Batenkaitos, Lye
name_kanji: ライ・バテンカイトス
about:
Lye Batenkaitos is a Sin Archbishop of the Witch Cult, representing the gourmet aspect of gluttony.





(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Baumann, Frederica
name_kanji: フレデリカ・バウマン
about:
Frederica is a maid working for Roswaal L. Mathers and a member of the Emilia Camp.

(Source: Re:Zero Wikia)

name: Beatrice
about: A mysterious mage who was hired by Roswaal to keep his ancient magical tomes safe in his enormous library. She has the ability to warp any room in the mansion to this library whenever she chooses, but can't completely leave the mansion. Despite of her cold behavior and verbal abuses to Subaru, Beatrice can't stand if people are hurt in front of her and becomes one of people that Subaru can trust.

name: Corneas, Regulus
name_kanji: レグルス・コルニアス
about:
Regulus Corneas is a Sin Archbishop of the Witch Cult, representing greed.



(Source: Re:Zero Wiki)

name: Fina
about:
Fina is a kind, honest, and hardworking girl. Having been forced to care for her family at a very young age, she is very responsible and mature. 

She has greenish-brown hair, half of which is usually tied at the back with a large pink ribbon. She has kind lime-green eyes and is usually seen smiling.

Fina wears an ankle length tea-green dress with a light brown vest worn over it. Occasionally she also wears a shoulder bag that contains most of her necessary belongings such as daggers and knives for skinning and money.



(Source: Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear Wiki)

name: Foschurose, Shia
name_kanji: シア・フォシュローゼ
about:
Shia had a very prideful and arrogant personality before meeting . Initially, she believed that she is one of the strongest students at her school and that no girl is stronger than her. But after suffering a devastating defeat at the hands of Yuna, she becomes less conceited.

Shia is the elder sister of  and the daughter of  and . She currently lives with her mother in the Royal Capital and attends the Royal Academy, while her sister and father live together in Crimonia.

Shia wears her blonde hair split into two pig tails, with a strand of hair falling out on both sides. Shia is often seen in a typical school uniform which has a sleeveless navy-greyish jumper worn on top of her white shirt and a black tie. She wears a red and white checkered skirt and thigh length socks. Like her younger sister, Shia has purple eyes and has a paler skin colour.

(Source: Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear Wiki)

name: Yuna
about: Yuna is the protagonist of Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear. She is a shut-in fifteen year old who fanatically played VRMMO World Fantasy Online when she receives a bear costume from the creators of the game and joins a new world.

name: Farrengram, Misaana
name_kanji: ミサーナ・ファーレングラム

name: Foschurose, Noire
name_kanji: ノアール・フォシュローゼ

name: Shuri
about:
Shuri is the youngest daughter of Tirumina and Roy (deceased). Her older sister Fina often helps take care of her, alongside Gentz who sees the two girls as his own daughters, and takes of her mother while she is ill. 

She loves bears. Especially Yuna.

name: Kischa, Rosell
about:
The youngest child of the Kischa family, which makes its living by hunting. Unlike his siblings, he was born weak and timid, leading his family to believe he lacks talent.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Louvent, Ars
about:
Eldest son of the weak noble family Louvent, he was reincarnated in another world and acquired the skill Appraisal. He uses his skills to scout out gifted people hidden around the world to become his vassals, and aims to create an unrivaled fiefdom in his turbulent world.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Muses, Rietz
about:
A young Marcan man who is discriminated against. When he was on the streets with no help from anyone else, he had a fateful encounter with Ars.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Reis, Charlotte
name_kanji: シャーロット・レイス
about:
An orphan girl who lived without relatives in the castle city of Canare. For some reason, she was on the run from slavers when she was rescued by Ars and his friends.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Garnier, Albert
name_kanji: アルベール・ガルニエ

name: Grangeon, Thomas
name_kanji: トーマス・グランジオン

The protagonist of Genshin Impact.

about:
The Raiden Shogun is the awesome and terrible power of thunder incarnate, the exalted ruler of the Inazuma Shogunate.

With the might of lightning at her disposal, she commits herself to the solitary pursuit of eternity.

(Source: Official website)

name_kanji: やえみこ / 八重神子
about:
Yae Miko is the head shrine maiden in charge of Grand Narukami Shrine. She is a descendant of Kitsune lineage, Eternity's servant and friend, and the intimidating editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House, a publisher of light novels.

The enigmatic Guuji, with many identities, may never be fully understood by mortals for what she truly is in her heart of hearts.

(Source: Official website)

name_kanji: かえではらかずは / 楓原萬葉
about:
A wandering samurai from Inazuma with a modest and gentle personality.

Beneath a youthful and carefree demeanor lies a heart that carries a great many burdens from the past. Seemingly easygoing, Kazuha has his own code of conduct. 

(Source: Official website)

about:
Ayaka Kamisato is the daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan from Inazuma. She is dignified, elegant, wise, determined, sincere, and pleasant to others. Universally loved by the Inazuma people, she has earned the title of Shirasagi Himegimi.

(Source: Official website, edited)

about:
Current head of the Kamisato Clan, and accordingly, the Yashiro Commissioner. He always has a way of attaining his purpose in a well-thought-out manner. However, few people understand what the "goal" he holds most dear is.

(Source: Official website)

name: Paimon
about:
Paimon is a non-playable character in Genshin Impact and accompanies the Traveler throughout their adventure in Teyvat as their guide. She met the Traveler by being fished out of a lake in which she mentions she would've drowned if not being fished out. She is currently representing Genshin Impact and is on the Genshin Impact app, website, and social media icons.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Sangonomiya, Kokomi
name_kanji: さんごのみやここみ / 珊瑚宮心海
about:
Kokomi is the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, and also serves as its supreme leader.

She is well-versed in the art of war, is good at strategizing, and has keen insights into military affairs. She is also adept at handling domestic affairs, diplomacy, and other matters.

Still, this unfathomable leader has a mysterious side to her...

(Source: Official website)

name: Kong
about:
The protagonist of Genshin Impact.

name: Nahida
about:
Lesser Lord Kusanali dwells deep in the Sanctuary of Surasthana, and has never really been in the limelight, nor has she even been mentioned much.
Her burden is heavy, but though she may experience loneliness, and though darkness is all she sees before her, she will not stop moving forward.

(Source: Official website)
voice_actor_name: Tamura, Yukari, Hua, Ling, Campbell, Kimberley Anne

name: Alhaitham
name_kanji: アルハイゼン / 艾尔海森
about:
The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, Alhaitham is endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free—free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

(Source: Official website)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Collei
about:
A Trainee Forest Ranger who is under the tutelage of Tighnari. She started her academic career a little later than her peers, so she is currently working hard to catch up.
She hides the other side of her personality deep under the surface of optimism and kindness.

(Source: Official website)

name: Cyno
about:
The General Mahamatra of the Akademiya, leader of all the Matras. He has a unique sense of humor that never fails to leave a deep impression.

(Source: Official website)

name: Dehya
about:
A member of "The Eremites," a loosely-organized mercenary organization. She is brave, powerful, and enjoys an excellent reputation among mercenaries.

(Source: Official website)

name: Dori
about:
Dori is a merchant in Sumeru who has a fondness for glittering Mora.
With her persuasive eloquence, she is able to sell various strange and mysterious products for a very high price.

(Source: Official website)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name_kanji: ドニアザード / 迪娜泽黛
about:
Dunyarzad is the daughter of the Homayani family, and a self-proclaimed follower of Lesser Lord Kusanali. 

(Source: Genshin Impact Wiki)

No voice actors have been added to this character. Help improve our database by searching for a voice actor, and adding this character to their roles .

name: Nilou
about:
Star of the Zubayr Theater. Her dance is as graceful as a water lily in first bloom, pure and pristine.
But she is by no means a haughty and cold person. Even the most hurried traveler will not forget her innocent and radiant smile.

(Source: Official website)

Benimaru is a majin in the service of Rimuru Tempest. He is the Minister of Defense for the Jura-Tempest Federation, acting as the Commander-in-Chief for its military during wartime. He holds a place in the Twelve Guardian Lords, as well as the Big Four, being its leader and being counted as one of Rimuru's Top Three strongest subordinates, alongside Diablo and Zegion.

A first year student, the daughter of a family who's run a nearby temple for generations. A fan of reading, she has a deep fondness for Japanese literature. She's also a gifted singer, earning her a spot in the choir. Gentle and caring to those around her, but often finds herself going in circles anyway.

(Source: Official website)

A first-year student who's almost always nearby her good friend Hanamaru. Fearful and tends to cry a lot, but still has a tough interior, forged by her role as a girl in a rich, well known family. Always looked up to pop idols. Needlework is the only thing she's really great at.

(Source: Official website)

A third year student who leads the school council. From an old fishing family whose name is well known around the area. Prideful and perfectionistic in her own way, she can't abide it when things are done sloppily or incorrectly.

Kanan Matsuura is a third-year student living alone with her grandfather, who runs a diving shop on a nearby island. Breezily mature, she rarely sweats the details and usually maintains a calm, cool demeanor.

(Source: Official website)

name: Ohara, Mari
about:

Blood type: AB
BWH: 87-60-84
Height: 163 cm
Hobbies: Sports, horseback riding 
Skills: Flexibility, singing 
Food likes: Coffee, lemons
Food dislikes: Natto, kimchi 

Mari Ohara is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is 17 years old and a third year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. She was born on June 13. Her image color is purple.

Mari is of mixed descent. Her father is an American who runs a hotel-chain in Italy, while her mother is Japanese.

She does not feel she is very suited to become an idol. She has a bright personality and often prefers to take action by herself. She also tends to insert English words into her sentences, but if she becomes sad or serious, she uses them less.

Her hobbies are sports and horse-riding, her talent is in her flexibility and singing. Her favorite genre of music is industrial metal. She appears to be the composer for Aqours.

(Source: Love Live! Wiki & official website)

One of the Eight-Star Demon Lords, Ramiris of the Labyrinth. She is also the saints' guide, bestowing divine protection on heroes. She preserves the balance of the entire world.

about:
Liselotte Cretia is the youngest child and the only daughter of Duke Cretia Family, a prominent Noble household on Galwark Kingdom. She is the top most sought noble daughter in the whole country.

She graduated from the royal academy by skipping grade several times, build a business that grow into an international enterprises famous in neighboring countries, become a governor and develop a city that she got from her parents into one of the most prosperous city in the kingdom, all while she still just 15 years old.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

He has inherited the memories of his last life as Haruto Amakawa.

name: Aku
about: A girl from the village. Her parents died from an illness when she was young and she was about to be persecuted in the village when Maou-sama came in to save her. She pure-heartedly honors Maou like a father.

name: Elegant, Luna
about: Luna Elegant is the youngest of the "Three Saints." She has magical talent that is rare even among the saints. Because of that rare talent she grew up as if she were a rose among weeds. She is extraordinarily selfish.

name: Kunai, Hakuto
about:
Akira Oono, a.k.a. Hakuto Kunai (九内 伯斗, Kunai Hakuto), is the male protagonist of the series Maou-sama, Retry!. He was the creator of the game Infinity Game after 15 years the game was waxed, but he was dragged into another world trapped in the body of the Last Boss Hakuto Kunai.

(Source: Demon Lord, Retry! Wiki)

name: Fujisaki, Akane
about:
Akane Fujisaki is the NPC created by Akira Oono (Kunai, Hakuto) of the series Maou-sama, Retry!. Akane is of the same age as Ren, but she is completely opposite of Ren who is calm and composed; she is like a sun. Putting it bluntly, she is an idiot that doesn’t think. Akane likes anime, manga, and games; a severe case of otaku. If she were to learn that she is in a parallel world, there’s no doubt she would be the one who would get the happiest.

(Source: Maou-sama, Retry! Wiki)

name: Mink
about: Mink is very energetic and always ready to buy a fight. Mink had the illness called eighth-grade syndrome (Chuunibyou). Despite being a priest who uses the power of light to purify and heal, her spell chants have macabre phrases that are not expected of a priest. Mink is a world celebrity, a Star Player. There's adventurers who have been drawn in by her chants and poses, and have even begun to imitate her.

name: Rossetti, Dahliya
about: Formerly working in a company that deals with household appliances, she died on what can be seen as a case of heart attack. She is then reincarnated in another world as the daughter of Carlos Rosetti, a magical toolmaker that was granted the title of a baron.

about:
Race: Goblin (Day 1)

Affiliation: Goblin Community, Parabellum
Rank: Colonel/1st in the Goblin Community

Rou, whose former name was Tomokui Kanata, was a human with an esper ability. One day, he was killed by someone whom he regard as a sister and a stalker. Later, he woke to find out he was reincarnated as a goblin, a monster species considered to be of the lowest class. His memories as a human remained with him, however. Having a second chance at life, Rou was determined to live his life to the fullest.

(Source: Re:Monster Wikia, edited)

Fenrya, or known as Rys, is a demon. Her demon form is that of a white/silver Fang Wolf.  While her human form is a beautiful, long-haired demi-human with white/silver hair and blue eyes. She wears a pure blueish white dress that compliments her hair.

After tricking Flio and having him escort her toward the Delaveza Forest, she attacks him but loses to his overwhelming magic. After returning to human form, she declares that she will follow him and not attack humans anymore, in exchange of being his wife.

name: Mayudama
about: An Inari princess with fox ears and a tail. She followed Kouzou to another world as his caretaker.

name: Yukawa, Kouzou
about:
A hot spring maniac about 40 years old, he is also called the "hot spring hunter." While searching for a secluded hot spring, he slipped off a cliff and was reincarnated in another world.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Komachi
about: Ruirui's caretaker. Like Mayudama, she is an Inari princess, with whom she has a senpai-kouhai relationship.

name: Lilium
about: An elf girl who lives in another world. She sees Kouzou and Rangyoku soaking in the "Spring of Death", and attacks them believing that she are demonic beings. She has an older sister Ohendeku.

name: Ohendeku
about: Lilium's older sister and the chieftain of the elven tribe. Afraid of the onsen at first, she eventually is convinced by Kouzou to use it to solve the elf village's financial struggles.

name: Ruirui
about: A king who rules over another world. Like Kouzou, she has been reincarnated in another world. She usually hides the fact that he is a woman.

name: Allen

name: Class Rep
about:
Class Rep is one of Haruka's classmates who has been summoned to the Other World. Her real name has not been mentioned in the novels.

She is the leader of the Girls, as well as the de facto commander of any joint forces she became involved in. Sometimes she is called the "Translation Rep" because only she could get meaningful information out of Haruka's wandering ramblings.

(Source: Loner Life In Another World Wiki)

name: Ashrain, Seras
name_kanji: セラス・アシュレイン
about: Seras Ashrain was the former knight leader of the late Holy Kingdom of Neia. It was said that she was actually a princess of a High Elf country. She fled Neia before it was invaded and annexed by Bakuos Empire. She met Touka Mimori in the dark forest when she was in pursuit by the mercenary group called White Walker.

name: Filo
about:
Age: <1
Race: Filolial

Filo was originally hatched from a monster egg which Naofumi purchased from the slave trader.

Filo grew at an abnormally fast rate and in just a few days grown into a fully grown Filolial later developing into a rare species of Filolial Queen where she was later given the ability to transform into a humanoid form strongly resembling a Angel and the ability to talk due to her association with the Shield Hero and the effects of the Legendary Shield.

(Source: Shield-Hero Wiki)

name: Iwatani, Naofumi
about:
Age: 19
Race: Human
Country: Japan (former), Melromarc: Rock Valley
Occupation: University Student (former), Legendary Hero
Weapon: Legendary Shield

Naofumi Iwatani is the main protagonist of The Rising of the Shield Hero.

He was a university student before being summoned to another world, where he had to fight against the waves of calamity, as one of the 4 cardinal heroes summoned. He was, however, the shield hero, regarded by many and especially people in Melromarc as the weakest of the heroes.

Due to his status as shield hero, many refused to join his side, the only exception being Myne Sophia. Myne however falsely accuses him of sexual assault causing him to lose his dignity and all his money
Due to this, the once cheerful Naofumi became a cynical character who lost the ability to trust in people.

He buys the slave Raphtalia and the bird Filo, but treats them like his daughters rather than his slaves.


(Source: Shield-Hero Wiki)

name: Raphtalia
about:
Age: 10 (mentally), 17 (biologically)
Height: 5'6" (168 cm)
Raphtalia is a Tanuki-type Demi-Human who was the first real member of the Shield Hero's party after he purchased her as a slave.

She has undergone some significant changes throughout the story. When Raphtalia is first introduced, she is a child that has long, unmanaged hair and a dirty cloth gown. After being purchased by Naofumi, he gave her a haircut to an acceptable length, gave her a bath, and bought her a much more suitable set of clothes to adventure in.

After several weeks of traveling with Naofumi, Raphtalia's body inexplicably changes and she gained the appearance of a teenager or young adult. It is revealed that demi-humans grow in relation to the progression of their levels, which led to Raphtalia's rapid development.


(Source: Shield-Hero Wiki)

name: Tempest, Rimuru
about:
Race: Human (past life) → Slime → Demon Slime 
Age: 37 (past life) → 2 (anime/manga), 3 (light novel)
Sex: male (past life) → Sexless
Title: Ruler of Monsters, Jura-Tempest Federation Chancellor, 
Divine protection: Storm Crest
Magic: Element Magic archive, Spirit Magic archive, Greater Spirit summoning, Greater Demon summoning, 
Ability:
Species Skill - Universal Sense, Universal Thread, Universal Shapeshift, Infinite Regeneration, Demon Lord Haki, Enhanced Replication
Ultimate Skill - Wisdom King Raphael, King of Gluttony Beelzebuth, Covenant King Uriel, Storm King Veldora, 
Resistance: Physical Attack Nullification, Natural Effects Nullification, Abnormal Condition Nullification, Spiritual/Mental Attack Resistance, Holy-Demonic Attack Resistance

The main protagonist of the series and Founder as well as Chancellor and King of the monster nation known as the Jura-Tempest Federation. Originally Mikami Satoru, a 37-year-old general contractor, he was stabbed by a passing robber while protecting one of his co-workers and reincarnated in a new world as a slime, one of the lowest monsters on the food chain.

In spite of the situations he finds himself in, he often tends to be very easygoing, yet calculating and cautious. A pacifist at heart, he tries to avoid casualties and save people if possible and wishes to maintain good relations with humans.


(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki, edited)

name: Daikenja
about:
Name: Great Sage (Daikenja)


Entity Type: Unique Skill

Appearance:
Great Sage does not possess a physical form. It exists as an inner voice or consciousness within the wielder, providing unparalleled guidance and analytical abilities.

Background:
Great Sage is a highly sophisticated and unique skill acquired by Rimuru Tempest upon his reincarnation into the Jura Forest as a slime. This skill manifested as an advanced, sentient form of intelligence, designed to aid and guide Rimuru through his journey in this fantastical world.

Role and Contributions:

Advisor and Strategist:
Great Sage serves as the primary advisor to Rimuru, offering insights and strategies to navigate complex situations. Its analytical prowess allows for informed decision-making, ensuring Rimuru can effectively manage both peaceful and combative scenarios.

Skill Enhancement and Evolution:
Great Sage plays a crucial role in enhancing Rimuru's abilities. Over time, it evolves into the Ultimate Skill Raphael, significantly amplifying its capabilities and support functions.

Combat and Defense:
In combat, Great Sage is indispensable. It devises tactics, analyzes opponents' weaknesses, and suggests optimal strategies. This ensures that Rimuru can utilize his vast array of skills and powers to their fullest potential.

Knowledge and Information Processing:
Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.



Significance:
Great Sage is the cornerstone of Rimuru Tempest's success and growth. Its guidance and support are instrumental in Rimuru's rise from a simple slime to a powerful leader and protector. Great Sage embodies the blend of intellect, strategy, and emotional support, making it an indispensable part of Rimuru's journey and the thriving nation he builds.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)
voice_actor_name: Toyoguchi, Megumi, Rodak, Mallorie, Vechin, Gisele, Franzoso, Giulia, Loriaux, Fabienne

name: Lynette

A magician's assistant hidden in the shadows who refers to herself as a "Multi-Function Magic Assistant." Poker-faced, reticent to speak, and as unpredictable in her movements as a cat.

(Source: Official website)

name: Lyney
about:
A genius of a magician famed throughout Fontaine. He moves his audience with a combination of sleight of hand and the gift of the gab. Eloquent, ingenious, and with a mind as hard to fathom as a cat.

(Source: Official website)

name: Caspar, Navia
about:
The ever-beaming President of the Spina di Rosula, devoted to helping the people of Fontaine solve all kinds of thorny issues.

(Source: Official website)

name: Charlotte

Indefatigable reporter of The Steambird, constantly on the hunt for the "truth."

(Source: Official website)

name: Clorinde
name_kanji: クロリンデ / 克洛琳德

Clorinde is the mightiest Champion Duelist. Sword in hand, she defends justice in the Court of Fontaine.

(Source: Official website)

name: Egeria

Egeria, also known as the Mistress of Many Waters, was the original Hydro Archon and the predecessor of the latest Hydro Archon, Focalors.

(Source: Genshin Impact Wiki)

name: Freminet
about:
A taciturn young man and an expert diver, his heart remains as innocent as the fairytales that never cease to absorb him.

(Source: Official website)

name: Furina de Fontaine
about:
The "Regina of All Waters, Kindreds, Peoples and Laws" is deeply loved by her people.
She follows each and every trial held at the Opera Epiclese with an inextinguishable passion, and is always acutely aware of how the "audience" sees things.

(Source: Official website)

You wouldn't exactly describe the Iudex of Fontaine as "approachable." It's hard to say whether it's just in his nature, or because he has secrets to hide.

(Source: Official website)

Paimon is a non-playable character in Genshin Impact and accompanies the Traveler throughout their adventure in Teyvat as their guide. name: Kischa, Rosell
about:
The youngest child of the Kischa family, which makes its living by hunting. Unlike his siblings, he was born weak and timid, leading his family to believe he lacks talent.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Louvent, Ars
about:
Eldest son of the weak noble family Louvent, he was reincarnated in another world and acquired the skill Appraisal. He uses his skills to scout out gifted people hidden around the world to become his vassals, and aims to create an unrivaled fiefdom in his turbulent world.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Muses, Rietz
about:
A young Marcan man who is discriminated against. When he was on the streets with no help from anyone else, he had a fateful encounter with Ars.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name: Reis, Charlotte
name_kanji: シャーロット・レイス
about:
An orphan girl who lived without relatives in the castle city of Canare. For some reason, she was on the run from slavers when she was rescued by Ars and his friends.

(Source: Official site, translated)

name_kanji: マーヴィカ / 玛薇卡
about:
Mavuika, also known by her Goetic name Haborym, is the God of War and the current Pyro Archon presiding over Natlan.

(Source: Genshin Impact Wiki)

name_kanji: クフル・アハウ / 库胡勒阿乔

The self-proclaimed "Almighty Dragonlord," Ajaw's current "servant" is Kinich.

(Source: Genshin Impact Wiki)

name: Chasca
about:
Chasca hails from the Flower-Feather Clan. Among the tribes in Natlan, she is regarded as an peacekeeper, resolving tribal disputes without difficulty.

(Source: Genshin Impact Wiki)

name: Citlali
name_kanji: シトラリ / 茜特菈莉

Citlali is a fortune teller belonging to the Masters of the Night Wind tribe. Her services are occasionally consulted by Mualani.

Iansan is a fitness instructor and Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame Champion Mentor.

name: Kachina
about:
A young warrior of the Children of Echoes, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

(Source: Official website)

name: Kinich
about:
A saurian hunter who accompanies the one who calls himself "Dragonlord." He often accepts commissions that no one else wants, and is equally skilled at appraising the price.

(Source: Official website)

name: Mualani
about:
One of the shining stars of the People of the Springs' new generation of young guides. If you've come to Natlan for sightseeing, there's no better companion you could choose.

(Source: Official website)

Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.



Significance:
Great Sage is the cornerstone of Rimuru Tempest's success and growth. Its guidance and support are instrumental in Rimuru's rise from a simple slime to a powerful leader and protector. Great Sage embodies the blend of intellect, strategy, and emotional support, making it an indispensable part of Rimuru's journey and the thriving nation he builds.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki)

Luminous Valentine is a Demon Lord, the fifth seat of the Octagram, and the True Ruler of Holy Empire Ruberios. She is the ruler of all the vampires and one of the oldest demon lords.

about:

Divine protection: Tempest (Protection of the Storm)
Title: Oni King
Height: 180 cm
Ability:

Benimaru is a majin in the service of Rimuru Tempest. He is the Minister of Defense for the Jura-Tempest Federation, acting as the Commander-in-Chief for its military during wartime. He holds a place in the Twelve Guardian Lords, as well as the Big Four, being its leader and being counted as one of Rimuru's Top Three strongest subordinates, alongside Diablo and Zegion.

name: Clayman
about:
A former member of the Ten Great Demon Lords group and a self-proclaimed Demon Lord. Also known as the Marionette Master and with more than 500 years lived, he's a man that likes to manipulate his subordinates to make them do as he pleases.

(Source: Tensura Wiki)

name: Cromwell, Leon
name_kanji: レオン・クロムウェル
about: One of the 8 Star Demon Lords. A cold and laid-back individual, he states that he didn't really care in regards to who being a demon lord or whatever.

name: Daikenja
about:
Name: Great Sage (Daikenja)


Entity Type: Unique Skill

Appearance:
Great Sage does not possess a physical form. It exists as an inner voice or consciousness within the wielder, providing unparalleled guidance and analytical abilities.

Background:
Great Sage is a highly sophisticated and unique skill acquired by Rimuru Tempest upon his reincarnation into the Jura Forest as a slime. This skill manifested as an advanced, sentient form of intelligence, designed to aid and guide Rimuru through his journey in this fantastical world.

Role and Contributions:

Advisor and Strategist:
Great Sage serves as the primary advisor to Rimuru, offering insights and strategies to navigate complex situations. Its analytical prowess allows for informed decision-making, ensuring Rimuru can effectively manage both peaceful and combative scenarios.

Skill Enhancement and Evolution:
Great Sage plays a crucial role in enhancing Rimuru's abilities. Over time, it evolves into the Ultimate Skill Raphael, significantly amplifying its capabilities and support functions.

Combat and Defense:
In combat, Great Sage is indispensable. It devises tactics, analyzes opponents' weaknesses, and suggests optimal strategies. This ensures that Rimuru can utilize his vast array of skills and powers to their fullest potential.

Knowledge and Information Processing:
Possessing an immense database of knowledge about the world, its creatures, magic, and more, Great Sage processes information at incredible speeds, keeping Rimuru well-informed and prepared for any situation.

Emotional Support:
Beyond its technical functions, Great Sage provides emotional support, helping Rimuru maintain composure and focus during challenging times.

Abilities:

Thought Acceleration:
Speeds up the wielder's thought processes, enabling rapid analysis and decision-making.
Analysis and Assessment:
Analyzes objects, skills, and creatures to understand their properties and potential uses.
Parallel Processing:
Handles multiple tasks simultaneously without burdening the primary consciousness.
Auto Battle Mode:
Can autonomously take over combat functions, fighting on the wielder's behalf with precision and efficiency.
Skill Acquisition and Integration:
Assists in acquiring new skills and seamlessly integrating them into the wielder's repertoire.

name: Cretia, Liselotte
name_kanji: リーゼロッテ＝クレティア
about:
Liselotte Cretia is the youngest child and the only daughter of Duke Cretia Family, a prominent Noble household on Galwark Kingdom. She is the top most sought noble daughter in the whole country.

She graduated from the royal academy by skipping grade several times, build a business that grow into an international enterprises famous in neighboring countries, become a governor and develop a city that she got from her parents into one of the most prosperous city in the kingdom, all while she still just 15 years old.

(Source: Seirei Gensouki Wiki)

name: Rio
name_kanji: リオ / 天川 春人
nicknames: Haruto Amakawa, Black Knight, Haru-kun, Rio Karasuki
about:
Rio is a boy living in the slums who wants revenge for his mother who was murdered in front of him when he was five years old.

He has inherited the memories of his last life as Haruto Amakawa.

name: Aishia
about: Rio's spirit. She's always helped Rio.

name: Claire, Celia
about: A teacher who finds Rio in the slums.

name: Gavaness, Aria
about: Liselotte Cretia's most trusted aide and chief vassal, she serves her as her great chamberlain and personal escort, the strongest of all of her retainers.

name: Sendou, Aki
about:
Haruto's half sister, after the divorce she and her mother left the house where they used to live with Haruto and her supposed father and moved to another place. They lived alone for several years until her mother got married again with Takahisa and Masato's father. Several years later, after her first day at the middle school when she was going back home with her siblings, along with Miharu and Masato, she got dragged into Satsuki and Takahisa's hero summoning.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Sendou, Masato
about:
The second son of the man who got married with Haruto's and Aki's mother after the divorce, Takahisa's little brother, Haruto's and Aki's little step-brother, due to mentioning Haruto in front of Aki being taboo he was never told that Haruto was his older step brother living away with his own father, the first day of his sixth year at the elementary school he got dragged into Takahisa's and Satsuki's hero summoning.

(Source: Wiki)

name: Mafahl, Ruphas
name_kanji: マファアル ルーファス
about:
Overlord of Midgard in the year 2800, a flugel with the forbidden black wings, whose beauty and power is known worldwide.
